name: Intro
_source: speak;;In the continent of Yondo, these pillars of virtue are held in high regard:;;;cinematic;;;;;4
speak;;This is a story of truth...{br}and all its consequences.;;;cinematic;;;;;3
speak;Krista;Hey, watch it! You don't gotta be so rough.
speak;Gordon;Shut it, brat. Now, be a good girl and do as we say, got it?
speak;Krista;Forrest! I know you're out there! Help m--
speak;Bandit1;This kid's a loud one, boss. What do we do?
speak;Gordon;Make sure she's gagged tight and get out there!|Some Medean soldiers were spotted heading this way.|Oh, and make sure she's tied up tight too.|We don't want her escaping on us.
speak;Krista;Aw, yes! Operation: Kidnapping Fantasy is going smoothly.;;;thought_bubble
speak;Krista;Either way, I still got kidnapped and Forrest's trying to rescue me.|It's a win in my book!;;;thought_bubble
speak;Forrest;Kai, are you sure this is where those bandits are keeping Her Highness?
speak;Kai;I'm positive, Forrest. My eyes never deceive me.
speak;Trevor;Her Highness really needs better ways of entertaining herself.
speak;Kai;We could keep her under lock and key or something.
speak;Forrest;No matter. We must rescue Princess Krista!
speak;Gordon;Hey! You damn soldiers want your precious princess? Come get her!|No one faces Gordon of the Grash Mountains and makes it out alive!
speak;Forrest;If it's a fight they want, it's a fight they'll get.|Kai! Trevor! Let's go!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Forrest;Thank Medea you're safe. Here, let me untie you.
speak;Krista;Ow!|What was that pinch on the cheek for?
speak;Forrest;Your Highness, you know exactly what that was for.
speak;Forrest;You'll be given a more severe punishment when we return home.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Sven;So, you've bested my men. Not that it matters.
speak;Sven;We've done what we needed to do here.|Seizing the castle was merely an optional objective.
speak;Krista;What are you going on about? Who are you?!
speak;Sven;I'm under no obligation to explain myself to you.|However{tgm}...
speak;Sven;It's surprising to see someone like you here.
speak;Sven;No, perhaps "disappointing" is the word I should be using.
speak;Felicity;Leave. Now.|I have no intentions of associating myself with the likes of you.
speak;Sven;My, my. Someone likes to jump to conclusions.
speak;Sven;I was just making observations. Nothing more.|At any rate, I cannot waste time with you lot. I must report back to my Lord Milo.
speak;Krista;Felicity, what was that all about? What's up with that guy?
speak;Felicity;There's{tgm}...{tgm} a lot to cover, Your Highness.
speak;Khalid;Let's regroup and figure out what to do from here, then.
speak;Khalid;And to be honest, I don't like what that guy was saying earlier.|How they did what they came to do.
speak;Krista;Yeah, you have a point. Let's go, guys.

name: FightBeli
_source: speak;Beli;Hand over the girl, and no one gets hurt, got it?!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightGordon
_source: speak;Gordon;Try and attack me!{br}I dare you!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightKeisha
_source: speak;Keisha;Hehehe! Oh, you're actually trying to fight back?;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightAkira
_source: speak;Akira;Get out of the way!|This is between us and|that annoying brat of a mercenary!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightAkiraLin
_source: speak;Akira;Alright, you. The jig is up!|Just be a good girl and come quietly already.|The less you resist,|the less me and my boys will hurt ya, get it?;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Lin;Shut up and die like the scumbag you are.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightShigeo
_source: speak;Shigeo;Surrender now and maybe you'll end up surviving all this.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightShigeoKhalid
_source: speak;Shigeo;Another rider here? Samegoro said nothing about this.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Khalid;Hoping to get the upper hand on Krista, huh?|I won't allow that.{br}Not on my watch!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightShigeoAltena
_source: speak;Shigeo;Another rider here? Samegoro said nothing about this.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Altena;Though I know nothing of this land, I will not|turn a blind eye to those who cannot defend themselves.|Have at you!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightSumire
_source: speak;Sumire;No hard feelings. I have a job to do!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightAsuka
_source: speak;Asuka;I will protect the emperor with my life!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightNagisa
_source: speak;Nagisa;I won't let you get past me!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightSamegoro
_source: speak;Samegoro;Stand down, mortals!|You fight for nothing!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightSamegoroKrista
_source: speak;Krista;Come on, Samegoro!{br}Snap out of it!|I'm not Medea!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightSamegoroTsubaki
_source: speak;Tsubaki;Father, stop! Please! I{tgm}...{tgm} I don't want to fight you!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Samegoro;Give up, child. Your father holds no power over me.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightSamegoroAsuka
_source: speak;Asuka;I hoped it would not have to come to this.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightSamegoroKai
_source: speak;Kai;Is that you in there, Samegoro?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Samegoro;How perceptive of you.|The one you call "Samegoro" is not present.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightAgrona
_source: speak;Agrona;You wish to challenge me?|You have no idea what you are up against.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightSven
_source: speak;Sven;Go ahead. Soon you will realize it was for nothing.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightSvenKrista
_source: speak;Sven;You're the one Fueg's child fancied, hm?;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Sven;The boy had no idea what he was getting himself into.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Krista;Y-You know Ervan? How?{br}Who are you?!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Sven;You'll have to pry the answer out of my cold, dead hands,|child of Medea.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightSvenJudah
_source: speak;Judah;Stand down, or face the wrath of Fuegsol's finest!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Sven;Allow me to put you in your place, mortal.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightSvenKhalid
_source: speak;Sven;I did not expect you to return so soon.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Sven;Why do you humans have to be so unpredictable?;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Khalid;I don't know what you're doing here,|or what you're going on about.|All I know is that you're outta here!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightAgronaKrista
_source: speak;Agrona;You have it made it all the way here.|Perhaps we have underestimated you.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Krista;Who are you guys? Why are you doing this?|What the hell is Circ?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Agrona;Don't ask questions you're not prepared|to hear the answer to.|You may not like what you discover.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightAgronaKai
_source: speak;Agrona;Ah{tgm}...{tgm} I remember you.|I had wondered where you{br}went.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Kai;I was hoping to confront you when I had more answers.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Kai;Heh. Things are just not going my way lately.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightAgronaTsubaki
_source: speak;Agrona;You have joined the fray, Tsubaki?|I'm surprised.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Tsubaki;You'll pay for what you did to Father!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightTsubaki
_source: speak;Tsubaki;No! I{tgm}...{tgm} I won't let you hurt Father!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightTsubakiKai
_source: speak;Tsubaki;That doesn't matter right{br}now.|You're back! You must have come back to help Father.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightTsubakiRyuuji
_source: speak;Ryuuji;Ha! So, little Tsubaki's taking up the front lines now?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Tsubaki;What? Wait{tgm}...{tgm} Kenji?! Is it truly you?;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Ryuuji;Sure is. Now, I don't wanna cut this short, Tsubaki,|but we gotta get to the throne room.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightTsubakiSumire
_source: speak;Sumire;I apologize, Lady Tsubaki, but we gotta get to the emperor!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightTsubakiAsuka
_source: speak;Asuka;This is all to ensure your father's safety, Lady Tsubaki.|I apologize for what I have to do.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightNagisaSumire
_source: speak;Nagisa;Sumire? What do you think you're doing?!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Sumire;I'm sorry, Commander. But we gotta get to the emperor!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightNagisaKai
_source: speak;Kai;Shoot! What the hell are you doing here?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Nagisa;Like you have any right to be asking ME that.|You're a dead man, Kai!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightNagisaAsuka
_source: speak;Nagisa;Miss Asuka? Are you siding with the Medeans?!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Asuka;I apologize, Nagisa. This was a necessary step to take.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightNagisaRyuuji
_source: speak;Ryuuji;Heh, never imagined I'd be seeing you again,|but here we are.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Ryuuji;Really hate to do this, but we gotta get to the throne room.|Sorry, Nagisa.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightAsukaKai
_source: speak;Asuka;You know the consequences, Kai. Are you prepared to die?;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Kai;I don't mind if it's by your hands, Asuka.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Asuka;With what I've been hearing about you,|I can't tell if you're being genuine or not.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightAsukaRyuuji
_source: speak;Ryuuji;I thought you'd be at the emperor's side, Asuka.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Asuka;K-Kenji?! I thought{tgm}...{tgm} We all thought you were dead!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Ryuuji;Yeah, I've been gettin' that a lot lately.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Ryuuji;I hate to do this, Asuka, but we gotta get in the castle.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Asuka;I will not let you pass.|You will not get to Emperor Samegoro!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightSumireKai
_source: speak;Kai;Is that Sumire? Looks like she's asleep.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Kai;Sorry about this, but you're in the way here.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Kai;Sumire{tgm}...{tgm} Sorry about this, but you're in the way.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Sumire;K-Kai? {tgm}...{tgm} Fine. If that's how it is, you're going down!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightSumireRyuuji
_source: speak;Ryuuji;Looks like Sumire's on guard duty like always.|But why's she asleep? That isn't like her.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Ryuuji;Damn it, I'd hate to kick 'er while she's down, but{tgm}...;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Ryuuji;They still got ya on guard duty, Sumire?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Sumire;Huh? Wait, you're{tgm}...{tgm} Kenji? You're not dead!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Ryuuji;Unfortunately, this ain't time for happy reunions.|Step aside, Sumire.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Sumire;So, that's how it is{tgm}...{tgm} Fine!|If you're my enemy, I won't back down!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightSaburo
_source: speak;Saburo;Still not giving up, huh?{br}Big mistake!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightYukino
_source: speak;Yukino;I will not show mercy to the likes of you!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightYukinoKrista
_source: speak;Krista;"Hair dark as night, skin white as snow"{tgm}...{tgm}|You're that ghost the mayor was talking about, aren't you?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Yukino;A "ghost"?|Is that what the mayor is calling me now?;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Yukino;No matter. If you're siding with him,|then I have no choice but to cross blades with you!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightYukinoFemale
_source: speak;Yukino;What? You're not with Hayato's men{tgm}...;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightSaburoAnna
_source: speak;Anna;Try it, tough guy. I dare you!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightSaburoJake
_source: speak;Jake;Your reign of terror ends here, Saburo!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Saburo;Let's see about that. See if you can match me!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightKeishaRyuuji
_source: speak;Keisha;Well, well, well, the mighty Wyrmfang captain|graces us with his presence.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Keisha;This is our turf, you brute!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Ryuuji;What do you want me to do? Apologize?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Ryuuji;Apologizing implies that I actually care.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightLockeTaiga
_source: speak;Taiga;Well, well, if it isn't good ol' Locke!|I thought I recognized this ship.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Locke;Even fighting you is going to be so damn annoying.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Taiga;Is that how you greet an old crewmate?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Taiga;You can let out all those frustrations of yours now.|Come on! No holding back!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightLocke
_source: speak;Locke;Just come quietly and we won't have to resort to violence.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightShinobu
_source: speak;Shinobu;Anyone who dares to stand against|the Wyrmfang Pirates faces death!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightShinobuParker
_source: speak;Shinobu;The Wyrmfang Pirates are|the toughest crew of the northern seas!|Just try to take us down!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Parker;Outside of your usual pillaging grounds, aren't you?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Shinobu;What's it to you? Just shut up and surrender already!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightIrving
_source: speak;Irving;Who are you? Stay out of Foliaga's affairs!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightMichael
_source: speak;Michael;W-Wait, I'm not here to hurt anyone!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightLorelei
_source: speak;Lorelei;Surrender now, or feel the wrath of Her Excellency!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightZeke
_source: speak;Zeke;You're gonna fight me?{br}Ain't too smart, are ya?;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightTalbot
_source: speak;Talbot;You may have bested the Captain,|but you ain't gonna get past me!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightMasashi
_source: speak;Masashi;You lot have no chance of defeating me!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightMasashiFemale
_source: speak;Masashi;What a shame it is to have to sully the beauty|of a lovely flower such as yourself.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightHikaru
_source: speak;Hikaru;Stand down. I have no interest in resorting to violence.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightTalbotRembrandt
_source: speak;Rembrandt;I hear you lot are attacking innocent people|for petty revenge.{br}Is that true?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Talbot;Mind your own damn business! This is between us and them!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightDaphne
_source: speak;Daphne;Just who do you think you are?!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightRyuuji
_source: speak;Ryuuji;I see you have chosen death.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightRyuujiKrista
_source: speak;Ryuuji;I see you have chosen death.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightRyuujiKai
_source: speak;Kai;For five years I thought you were dead.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Kai;This is where you've been the whole time?!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightTaiga
_source: speak;Taiga;Itchin' for a fight, huh?{br}Sure, I'll take you on!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightDaigo
_source: speak;Daigo;Oh, you're actually tryin' to stop me?|Can't tell if you're brave or just plain stupid.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightDaigoHaruki
_source: speak;Daigo;Tryin' to be the big damn hero, are ya?|Ha! Let's see you even try to get a scratch on me.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightDaigoTaichi
_source: speak;Taichi;I won't let you bring any more harm to Aotani!|Surrender now, and I might consider sparing you.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Daigo;You talk a big game there, kid.|Let's see if you're not just all bark.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightVernon
_source: speak;Vernon;Medean forces, you shall go no further!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightDaphneAnna
_source: speak;Anna;You remember me, huh?|Then you must know what I'm here for.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Daphne;You lowly Oregotians have no right|to be on the Great Folia's soil!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightDaphneJake
_source: speak;Jake;Me and Anna are gonna take back Hache Valley!|You can't stop us!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Daphne;You uncultured swine!|Go back to bandit country where you belong!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightGordonForrest
_source: speak;Gordon;You want her?{br}Come and get her!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightIrvingMichael
_source: speak;Irving;Michael?!{br}What are you doing?|You dare point your lance at your commander?;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Michael;I'm{tgm}... {tgm}I'm sorry, sir.|I-I refuse to be a Holy Knight if this is what it leads to!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightBeliKrista
_source: speak;Beli;Just come quietly, brat.{br}I ain't gonna hurt ya.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Krista;Bold of you to assume you're not the one getting get hurt.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: FightBeliSam
_source: speak;Beli;I ain't going down 'til I get the girl!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: Intro
_source: speak;Krista;So, I got my leg in the burrow and I'm STILL clinging onto that pie for dear life--
speak;Forrest;Kai, how much longer until we're on our side of the border?
speak;Kai;I'd say less than a week. And once we're in Medean territory,|it will only take a day to reach the castle.
speak;Kai;Hold on. What's that up there?
speak;Forrest;Ah, it's Chell.|I told her to come along as backup, just in case.
speak;Chell;Your Highness, thank goodness you're safe.
speak;Krista;Of course I'm safe.|Forrest was in charge of the rescue mission, after all.
speak;Forrest;A rescue mission that was completely unnecessary.
speak;Forrest;Can't you stay home and behave for once?
speak;Chell;At any rate, on my way here,|I spotted bandits just along this path.|It seems they heard of Princess Krista's escape.
speak;Kai;Damn it! I heard news travelled fast amongst Oregot's bandits,|but I didn't think it would be that fast.
speak;Krista;No worries.|With Chell and her thunder thighs at our side, we've got this battle down pat!
speak;Chell;I could say the same to you, Your Highness.
speak;Forrest;Let us not waste anymore time.|Everyone, move out!
speak;Sam;More bandits this way, huh?|Doesn't matter! All of them are gonna taste axe!
speak;Trevor;Pardon me, but did anyone else hear|a heated, passionate bellow further down the path?
speak;Forrest;The better question is if anyone DIDN'T hear.
speak;Krista;Let's go check it out, then!|We were headed down there anyway!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;Sam, by Medea, is it really you?!|I could hardly recognize you back there.
speak;Sam;Yup, it's me alright.|Never thought I'd see you again, Krista.|Especially not here.
speak;Sam;Huh? Yeah, I guess I did get some muscle here and there over the years.
speak;Sam;Haha! It's fine. Chell's gotten bigger too.|In all the right places, I might add.
speak;Trevor;Congratulations, my good sir.|You succeeded in making Miss Chell faint on the spot.
speak;Kai;Huh. Being complimented by a large, muscular man has that effect on her. Noted.
speak;Sam;What? All I said was she got some muscle on her.
speak;Trevor;That aside,|I ascertain that a select few of us are in the dark about certain prescenses before us.|I believe introductions are in order!
speak;Sam;You could've saved your breath and started with that last thing.
speak;Kai;Anyway, Forrest, mind doing introductions? Seems like we need them.

speak;Forrest;Sam, these two are Kai and Trevor, Her Highness' newest retainers.|Kai is our de facto tactician with his knowledge of Yondo.|Trevor is our best mage and he has an{tgm}...{tgm} interesting way with words.
speak;Forrest;Kai, Trevor, this is Sam.|He's been a friend of mine, Princess Krista, and Chell since we were young.|He disappeared one day years ago.
speak;Forrest;Sam, this Kai, Her Highness' newest retainer.|He's our de facto tactician with his knowledge of Yondo.
speak;Forrest;Kai, this is Sam.|He's been a friend of mine, Princess Krista, and Chell since we were young.|He disappeared one day years ago.
speak;Forrest;Speaking of which, could Sam and I please speak alone?
speak;Kai;Sure. Sounds like you've got some catching up to do.
speak;Forrest;To think this is where you have been all these years{tgm}...
speak;Forrest;Sam, what have you been doing this whole time?
speak;Sam;Living off the land, killing bandits, that sort of thing.|In fact, I was just heading off to a bandit fortress around here.
speak;Sam;Yup. Heard that a trade ship was raided and that|the bandits' hideout is south of here.
speak;Sam;Wanna help? I get the feeling you wanna help.
speak;Forrest;Sam, no offense, but Princess Krista needs to return home immediately.
speak;Krista;Come on, Forrest. It'll be just like old times!|You, me, Sam, and Chell out adventuring and causing mischief!
speak;Forrest;More like you and Sam saying "WE'RE DOING A THING",|Chell and I yelling "DO NOT DO THE THING",|and you two doing the thing anyway.
speak;Krista;See? You get it!|Lead the way, Sam!
speak;Forrest;Trevor, wake Chell up.|Looks like it's going to be like old times.
speak;Forrest;Kai, wake Chell up.|Looks like it's going to be like old times.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Anna;Back in business! Thanks for all your help.
speak;Krista;No problem. Glad that you two can set up shop here again.
speak;Jake;You know, we used to have more venues all over Yondo.|Ones that were more out in the open, that is.|It would be great if we could get those up and running again.
speak;Anna;I agree. Say, do you mind if we join you guys?
speak;Krista;I don't see why not!|Honestly, not having to worry about finding a shop while on the road is a huge help.
speak;Anna;Great! And you know what, I don't think we properly introduced ourselves.|I'm Anna, and this is my boyfriend Jake.|We're just a couple of merchants trying to get by.
speak;Krista;I'm Krista, Princess of Medeas. Nice to meet you guys.
speak;Jake;Well, ain't this our lucky day?
speak;Anna;Don't worry about it.|It's just that we might need more help from you later down the line.
speak;Anna;We've got{tgm}...{tgm} important stuff to attend to.
speak;Krista;I mean, as long as it doesn't get in the way of what we're doing,|you guys can do whatever.
update_achievement;AnnaJake;It's a Staple!;Recruit Anna and Jake

name: Intro
_source: speak;Bandit2;Well, well, well.|We got ourselves a pretty good haul today.
speak;Aqua;You all can do anything you want with me. Just don't hurt my friend! Let him go!
speak;Bandit2;"Anything", huh? Well, I'm sure the boss won't mind if|I played with his new toy for a while--
speak;Bandit2;Don't try anything funny, you hear me?|I'll be back for you.
speak;Semi;Aqua! Are you alright?|If that guy laid even a finger on you, I'm gonna--
speak;Aqua;Don't worry, Semi.|He didn't do anything to me.
speak;Semi;Good. But still, I'm gonna kill that guy when I get the chance.
speak;Semi;I should've known bandits would've been waiting at the port.|It was stupid of me to let my guard down just because|we were gonna land in merchant territory.
speak;Aqua;Thank you, Semi. If it weren't for you, we wouldn't have been|able to escape Foliaga in the first place.
speak;Semi;Save your thanks. We still need to get out of here.|Once the coast is clear, I'm gonna pick the lock to my cell and|make an escape route for us.|Stay put until then, alright?
speak;Sam;There it is. The Detri Bandit fortress.
speak;Sam;Hold on, we can't just rush in.|A good amount of bandits are probably already in there.|We might get overwhelmed by their numbers.
speak;Forrest;Huh, Sam being strategic. Never thought I'd see the day.
speak;Sam;I've been doing this for years.|You could say I'm an expert.
speak;Kai;This building looks quite old.|Do you think there are cracks in the walls we could tear down?
speak;Sam;Not bad, Kai.|An alternate entrance would take them by surprise.|One more thing, too.|After "persuading" some bandits, I learned that a couple of|that ship's passengers are being kept here.
speak;Kai;Let's split into two groups, then.|We'll be able to cover more ground that way.|One group will take the west side and the other will take the east.
speak;Krista;Got it!|Operation: Save the Prisoners and Kill the Bandits is on!

name: TalkKristaAqua
_source: speak;Krista;Don't worry about a thing.|Me and my buddies are here to rescue you!
speak;Krista;I'm Krista, princess of Medeas.|Who are you?
speak;Aqua;I'm Aqua, a cleric from Foliaga.
speak;Aqua;And, wait, Medeas?|What are you doing all the way out here?
speak;Krista;Long story short, got captured by bandits because reasons.
speak;Krista;Anyway, once my big, burly friend gets bandit blood on his hands,|we'll get you back home safe and sound.
speak;Krista;Either way, Semi's gonna be real happy now that you're safe too.|We'll be out of here in no time!
speak;Aqua;But, please, Your Highness, my friend is here too!|He's probably trying to find a safe path for us to escape.
speak;Krista;Got it! We'll go ahead and touch base with him.
speak;Aqua;Thank you! You have my eternal gratitude.

name: TalkSemiAqua
_source: speak;Semi;Come on, let's get out of here.|Stay close to me.

name: TalkSamAqua
_source: speak;Sam;Hey, I'm busting you outta here!
speak;Sam;The name's Sam. How about you?
speak;Aqua;I-I'm Aqua. Thank you very much, Sam!
speak;Aqua;My friend should be somewhere in the fort too.|You have to help him!

name: TalkKristaSemi
_source: speak;Krista;Alright, buddy. If you surrender, I'll make this quick and easy.
speak;Semi;Put your damn sword down! I'm not with these guys.
speak;Semi;My friend and I were taken prisoner. I'm trying to break us both out of here.
speak;Krista;Huh. Well, in that case, you'd better stick with us.
speak;Krista;I'm Krista, princess of Medeas. My friends and I are clearing out this bandit hideout.
speak;Krista;Oh, don't worry about Aqua. We broke her out!
speak;Semi;Like I said, my friend's here too.|If you're planning on saving me, you'd better do the same for her.
speak;Krista;Oh, what's your name? Completely forgot to ask.

name: TalkKristaSam
_source: speak;Sam;Who in their right mind says something like that--|Wait a minute. You're{tgm}...{tgm}{br}What are you doing here?!
speak;Sam;Argh, forget it! We've got bandits to worry about!

name: TalkKristaFelicity
_source: speak;Felicity;Viola and I are here to help!
speak;Krista;You and Viola, huh? So that's how you got here so fast.
speak;Krista;*sigh* Guess it can't be helped.
speak;Krista;Don't be reckless out there, alright? I don't wanna lose my favorite maid.

name: TalkChellViola
_source: speak;Chell;Viola? What are you doing here?
speak;Viola;Felicity said that everyone was out on an adventure!|We wanted to help.
speak;Chell;Viola, it's not just an "adventure". We're investigating something really important.
speak;Viola;Does that mean we can't help?
speak;Chell;That's not what I mean.|You can help. Just understand that you have to take this seriously.|This will be a lot more intense than the training you do back at the castle.

name: TalkForrestSam
_source: speak;Forrest;Surrender now, and you may yet live, bandit!
speak;Sam;Hey, watch where you're pointing that thing!|I'm on your side here!
speak;Forrest;Wait, that voice{tgm}...{tgm} It can't be{tgm}...{tgm} Sam?!
speak;Sam;Hold on. Forrest? What are you doing here?
speak;Forrest;I should be asking you that.
speak;Sam;Look, we'll talk later. We've got bigger problems on our hands.

name: TalkForrestTrevor
_source: speak;Trevor;Forrest, I must ask. Why these monthly{tgm}...{tgm} "excursions"?|This cannot be purely for Her Highness' own amusement.
speak;Trevor;{tgm}...{tgm} Forrest. PLEASE do not tell me that is the actual reason--
speak;Forrest;No time for idle chatter, Trevor. We have to save her!

name: TalkKaiTrevor
_source: speak;Kai;So, Trevor, how's it feel to venture outside the castle for once?|Beats a stuffy ol' library, huh?
speak;Trevor;Now, I would not go THAT far.
speak;Trevor;Although, I can admit it is nice to have a break from routine.|And I am rather surprised you and Forrest invited me to come along this time.
speak;Trevor;Considering my lack of experience on the battlefield, I thought I would slow you down.
speak;Kai;We all start somewhere. Forrest figured this would be a way for you to ease into things.
speak;Kai;Though, this did not go how it usually does.
speak;Kai;No need to worry about it.|Just know we usually have a smoother process with this sort of thing.

name: TalkForrestKai
_source: speak;Kai;Too bad things turned out this way, huh?|I know you were hoping for a quick rescue mission for Trevor's sake.
speak;Forrest;He needs battle experience, so this still works out.|But yes, I would have preferred if things went as expected.
speak;Forrest;And just what happened to Torgen?|To think these bandits bested him{tgm}...
speak;Kai;No use dwelling on it now.
speak;Kai;First priority is getting Her Highness back.

name: TalkChellSam
_source: speak;Chell;Huh? How do you know who I am?
speak;Chell;Sam? By Medea, it IS you!{br}But, why are you here?
speak;Sam;Never mind that for now. We'll catch up later!

name: TalkKaiSam
_source: speak;Kai;That bandit leader mentioned someone called the "Prowling Tiger."|Know anything about that?
speak;Sam;Don't know, don't care.|We've got bigger problems here!
speak;Kai;We'll just put a pin in that.

name: TalkKaiSumire
_source: speak;Kai;Looks like Sumire's on guard duty.
speak;Kai;Sumire! Still on guard duty, I see.
speak;Sumire;Kai! It's you! It's been so long since I last saw you.
speak;Kai;Less than a year, if we're being more specific.
speak;Sumire;Lady Tsubaki has been real worried about you, y'know.
speak;Sumire;But you're a smart guy. With how the emperor's been, you had to leave.
speak;Sumire;You're planning something, right? That's why I can't blame you for what you did.
speak;Kai;Huh. You completely understand, Sumire.{br}That's a relief.
speak;Sumire;The others may see you as a conniving, no-good, womanizing traitor, but not me!|I've always had faith in you.
speak;Kai;Anyway, I've got a huge favor to ask.
speak;Kai;Join us in taking down Samegoro. We need all the help we can get.
speak;Sumire;Sure! I'll do whatever I can to help!

name: TalkTsubakiRyuuji
_source: speak;Ryuuji;Ha! So, little Tsubaki's taking up the front lines now?
speak;Tsubaki;What? Wait{tgm}...{tgm} Kenji?! Is it truly you?
speak;Ryuuji;Aw, c'mon. Don't start cryin' on me now.
speak;Tsubaki;I-I'm sorry. I just can't believe it's really you.
speak;Ryuuji;Yeah, I've been gettin' that a lot lately.
speak;Ryuuji;So, what's with you taking up arms with the rest of the soldiers?
speak;Tsubaki;I can't let the Medeans hurt Father.
speak;Tsubaki;I will protect him! I swear it!
speak;Ryuuji;Real brave of ya, Tsubaki. Truly.
speak;Ryuuji;But you gotta understand that's what the Medeans are tryin' to do too.
speak;Ryuuji;Looks like they've got theories on what's going on with your old man.|If we work together, we can knock him back to his senses.
speak;Tsubaki;R-Really? Then, we won't have to keep fighting!|Let's do this together, Kenji!

name: TalkNagisaRyuuji
_source: speak;Ryuuji;Heh, never imagined I'd be seeing you again,|but here we are.
speak;Nagisa;What are you{tgm}...{tgm} Hold on. Kenji{tgm}...?
speak;Ryuuji;That I died? Yeah, I've been getting that a lot lately.
speak;Ryuuji;But hey, that's not the point here. I've joined forces with the Medeans.|Looks like they know how to bring Samegoro back to normal.
speak;Ryuuji;Yup, they just need to confront him in the throne room to do it.|If you come with us, you might be able to help.
speak;Nagisa;Got it! I'll let Lady Tsubaki know too!

name: TalkNagisaSumire
_source: speak;Sumire;Actually, forget it. There's something I gotta report!
speak;Nagisa;Sumire? With the Medeans inside the castle, I thought{tgm}...
speak;Sumire;Still alive and well here, Commander!|And that's what I gotta talk to you about.
speak;Sumire;The Medeans know what's going with the emperor.|Looks like they can bring him back to his senses.
speak;Nagisa;Seeing that they kept you alive, perhaps they actually do want a peaceful solution.|Thank you for the report, Sumire. I'll inform Lady Tsubaki of this too.

name: TalkNagisaAsuka
_source: speak;Asuka;Nagisa? I thought you would be with Lady Tsubaki.
speak;Asuka;Although, that is not important right now.
speak;Asuka;The Medeans are here, but they do not mean to harm the emperor.
speak;Asuka;They seek to bring him back to his senses.|If we join forces with them, we may be able to do just that.
speak;Nagisa;Since they kept you alive, perhaps they want a peaceful solution after all.
speak;Nagisa;I will report this development to Lady Tsubaki.

name: TalkTsubakiKai
_source: speak;Tsubaki;That doesn't matter right now.|You're back! You must have come back to help Father.
speak;Kai;Well, I mean, you're not wrong{tgm}...
speak;Kai;I'm here fighting with the Medeans, Tsubaki.|I'm not here for you.
speak;Kai;I'm not your retainer anymore. That's been established months ago.|I'm with the Medeans now.
speak;Kai;With that in mind, we know how to bring Samegoro back to normal.|I know it's a lot to ask for, especially with what I just said.|But can you let us through?
speak;Kai;I promise you that your father's gonna be just fine after all this.|You just have to trust me.
speak;Kai;If we join forces, then things will be okay.|Stick with us and it'll be just like old times.
speak;Kai;You, me, Nagisa, and Kenji. Together.
speak;Tsubaki;A-And Kenji too? You mean he's{tgm}...{tgm} He's{tgm}...!
speak;Tsubaki;Oh, Merin, I knew he was still alive{tgm}...
speak;Kai;So, what do you say, Lady Tsubaki? You in?

name: TalkTsubakiSumire
_source: speak;Sumire;Lady Tsubaki?! What are you doing down here?
speak;Sumire;Oh, it doesn't matter right now.
speak;Sumire;My lady, the Medeans are here to help Emperor Samegoro.|We have to let them through!
speak;Sumire;It seems like they know what's happened to him, my lady.|If we work together, maybe we can bring him back to normal!
speak;Tsubaki;That is a relief to hear.
speak;Tsubaki;Sumire, take me to the Medean forces' commander.|I{tgm}...{tgm} I wish to speak to them personally!

name: TalkTsubakiAsuka
_source: speak;Asuka;Lady Tsubaki, I bring urgent news.
speak;Asuka;The Medeans have come through the front gate.|However, this poses no issue to you or to your father.
speak;Asuka;The Medeans seek to free your father from Lady Agrona's grasp.|If we let them through, perhaps they will be able to do just that.
speak;Tsubaki;Then, we will have no need to prolong this conflict!
speak;Tsubaki;Miss Asuka, please take me to the Medean forces' commander.|I{tgm}...{tgm} I wish to speak with them personally!

name: TalkTsubakiNagisa
_source: speak;Nagisa;Lady Tsubaki, I have something urgent to report!
speak;Nagisa;The Medeans don't mean to cause any harm.|They want to bring your father back to normal!
speak;Tsubaki;Th-They do? That's great news!|Tsubaki, please take me to their commander.|I wish to speak to them personally.

name: TalkTsubakiKrista
_source: speak;Tsubaki;I won't let you take another step!|If you want to face my father, you'll have to go through me first!
speak;Krista;Wait, your father? Then that means you're Merinas' princess!
speak;Tsubaki;Th-That's right! So{tgm}...{tgm} don't underestimate me!
speak;Krista;Whoa, whoa, whoa. let's calm down here.|I know what this looks like, but we wanna help.
speak;Krista;Y'see, Samegoro's probably under control of some sort of magic.|That one shogun, Agrona, she's probably the one pulling the strings here!
speak;Tsubaki;So, you know of Agrona and what she may have done{tgm}...
speak;Tsubaki;If what you say is true, then what should we do?
speak;Krista;We gotta go up to the throne room and confront Samegoro.|And I'm sorry to say this, but we can't avoid a battle.
speak;Tsubaki;Is that truly the only way?
speak;Tsubaki;If you speak truthfully, then I see we have no choice.|You may go on, but I'll come with you too.|I wish to see my father back to his old self with my own eyes!
speak;Krista;Okay! I'm Krista, princess of Medeas, by the way. And you are?
speak;Tsubaki;Tsubaki. Let us bring peace back to Merinas, Krista!

name: TalkKristaSumire
_source: speak;Krista;Huh. Is that guard asleep right now? If I can just sneak past--
speak;Sumire;You won't get past me! I won't allow it!
speak;Krista;Whoa, hold on there! We're trying to help the emperor here!|Believe me!
speak;Krista;The emperor is not himself. Something's controlling him!
speak;Sumire;You know what's wrong with the emperor?|Then go on ahead! You gotta save him!
speak;Krista;Wow, I thought there'd be a bit more resistance there.
speak;Sumire;There's only so much we as his subordinates can do.|If we have you guys by our side, maybe we can help him!|Please let me join you. I wanna get the emperor back to normal!
speak;Krista;Hey, I'm all for it! Welcome to the team. What's your name?
speak;Sumire;I'm Sumire! Glad to meet you.
speak;Krista;I'm Krista, princess of Medeas. Let's move out, Sumire!

name: TalkRyuujiSumire
_source: speak;Ryuuji;Well, well, if it ain't little Sumire?
speak;Sumire;Wait a minute, that face{tgm}...{tgm}|Kenji, is that you?! I hardly recognized you.
speak;Ryuuji;Good to see you too, Sumire.
speak;Ryuuji;But hey, what's with taking a nap in the middle of the battlefield?|That ain't like ya at all.
speak;Sumire;In all honesty, I haven't been getting much sleep lately{tgm}...{tgm}|But that's not important right now!
speak;Sumire;Everyone thought you were dead, Kenji!|Seeing you like this{tgm}...{tgm} I might cry!
speak;Sumire;First it was you, then Kai{tgm}...{tgm}|Not to mention the emperor acting all weird on top of it.
speak;Sumire;You're here to bring the emperor back to his senses, aren't you?|That's why you're here!
speak;Ryuuji;Now there's the Sumire I remember.
speak;Ryuuji;Still got a good head on your shoulders, I see.
speak;Ryuuji;That's exactly it. You wanna help? Sounds like you wanna help.
speak;Sumire;You bet I do! I'm right behind you, Kenji!

name: TalkSumireAsuka
_source: speak;Sumire;Miss Asuka! I got good news!
speak;Asuka;Sumire? What are you doing away from your post?
speak;Sumire;Kai's back! And he's got the Medeans with him!
speak;Asuka;Hold on, what are you talking about?|Kai with the Medeans?
speak;Sumire;Yup, turns out he's been on their side all along.|And now I'm on their side too!
speak;Sumire;Kenji's alive! And he's here at the capital!
speak;Sumire;Yup, turns out he's alive and working with the Medeans.|And now I'm on their side too!
speak;Sumire;The Medeans are here to help us. They're not the enemy!
speak;Sumire;I'm with them now, Asuka. They're gonna help bring peace to Merinas!
speak;Asuka;You cannot just switch sides as you please, Sumire.|There are consequences to frivolously betraying your country like this--
speak;Sumire;But Miss Asuka, even you can admit|something's wrong with Emperor Samegoro, right?|You know him better than anyone!
speak;Sumire;See? Come on, Miss Asuka!|We gotta fight alongside the Medeans and get the emperor back to normal!

name: TalkChellLin
_source: speak;Chell;Lin! It's you! So this is where you went off to.
speak;Lin;Oh, I just HAD to run into you.
speak;Chell;I'm so glad you're safe. Let's--
speak;Lin;You're gonna try to bring me back to Medeas, right?|That's not happening.{br}I'm a mercenary now.
speak;Lin;15,000 gold. Take it or leave it.
speak;Chell;I don't have enough at the moment.
speak;Lin;What? Too much for you? Whatever.
speak;Lin;Alright. Time to get to work.

name: TalkLinTsurugi
_source: speak;Tsurugi;Is there something wrong, Miss Lin?
speak;Lin;The Medean royal army's in the area, and{tgm}...{tgm} well{tgm}...
speak;Tsurugi;I see. It's not going to get in the way of my request, is it?
speak;Lin;No, we should be passing through your village either way.
speak;Tsurugi;Then, there's no issue! It'll be nice to be back with your sisters, I'm sure.
speak;Tsurugi;Well, at the very least, I'm glad I hired you, Miss Lin.|You've been a great help thus far.

name: TalkViolaLin
_source: speak;Viola;Lin!! Oh, Medea, I thought I'd never see you again!
speak;Viola;Where have you been all this time?
speak;Lin;Travelling the world, doing mercenary work.
speak;Viola;Wow, that's amazing!|You've been working really hard, huh?
speak;Lin;Yeah, I guess you could say that.
speak;Viola;Oh, I've got an idea! How about you come with us?|Her Highness is on a mission to save the world!
speak;Lin;Tell you what, I'll join you guys if you can pay me 8,000 gold.|Like I said, I'm a mercenary now.|You may be family, but I gotta make a living, y'know?
speak;Lin;Thank you very much.|Pleasure doing business with you, oh wonderful sister of mine.
speak;Viola;Ah, sorry. I don't have enough on me right now.
speak;Lin;It's fine. See if you can get the money somehow, okay?

name: TalkKristaLin
_source: speak;Lin;Your Highness? What are you doing in Merinas?
speak;Krista;I should be asking you that.
speak;Lin;If you must know, I've been doing mercenary work.
speak;Krista;Wow, little Linny's making her way up in the world, huh?
speak;Lin;D-Don't call me that! I'm not a child anymore!
speak;Krista;Well, since you're a professional and all now,|I wanna hire you. If you're not busy with another client, of course.
speak;Lin;This isn't some ploy to get me to go back to the Pegasus Knight unit, is it?
speak;Krista;Nope! Like you said, you're not a kid anymore.|So, I'm gonna treat you like the grown-up, hard-working mercenary you are.
speak;Lin;In that case, the rate's 10,000 gold.|I'm with another client right now, but I don't think he'll mind the extra protection.
speak;Lin;Pleasure doing business with you, Your Highness.
speak;Krista;I'm expecting good things from you, Linny.
speak;Lin;I told you to not call me that!
speak;Krista;I would pay you, but we don't exactly have the funds right now.
speak;Lin;That's disappointing.|If you scrounge up the money somehow, let me know, okay?

name: TalkKristaYukino
_source: speak;Krista;"Hair dark as night, skin white as snow"{tgm}...{tgm}|You're the ghost the mayor was talking about, aren't you?
speak;Krista;Look, I don't know what you're planning on doing with those girls,|but if you let them go, we won't have any trouble.
speak;Yukino;"Let them go"?|What makes you think these women were OUR prisoners to begin with?
speak;Krista;Wait, you're not the boss of these bandits?
speak;Yukino;Not the ones you're thinking of, no.
speak;Yukino;The mayor has taken a liking to spinning tall tales now, I see. My, my{tgm}...

speak;Yukino;You've been tricked, little one.|The true culprits are Hayato and his men.|He is the one who captured you and the rest of the girls.|The mayor has been handing the village women off to them|in exchange for them not raiding their homes.
speak;Krista;No wonder he was so enthusiastic about me getting captured.
speak;Krista;But wait, where do you fit into all of this?|Why'd the mayor paint YOU as the bad guy?
speak;Yukino;Most likely because I've been saving those girls and keeping them safe.
speak;Yukino;Keeping them away from Hayato and away from Shizukawa Village was|all I could do for these girls.
speak;Yukino;As of right now, we aren't strong enough to take down Hayato once and for all.|I've taken the time to train them in the art of combat, and yet{tgm}...
speak;Krista;Well, no need to worry about him anymore!|My friends and I took care of him.
speak;Krista;Yup! We can go ahead and get everyone home.
speak;Yukino;Now that you know the truth, I have a proposition for you.
speak;Yukino;Let's join forces.|We can take down Hayato and bring Shizukawa's women back where they belong.
speak;Krista;I'm Krista, princess of Medeas, by the way.|What's your name, Miss Ghost?
speak;Yukino;Yukino. Let's do good work together, Your Highness.
speak;Yukino;Yukino. Thank you again, Your Highness.
change_unit_desc;Yukino;A skilled swordswoman from the Shirotori mountains. Distrustful of men.

name: TalkForrestKrista
_source: speak;Krista;My hero has come to save me once again~
speak;Forrest;In all seriousness, I am glad that this plan of yours actually worked, Krista.
speak;Krista;It pays to get captured by bandits on purpose.
speak;Forrest;That should NOT be the takeaway from this.
speak;Krista;By the way, turns out our "ghost" isn't a ghost after all!
speak;Forrest;We had figured as much, but then, who is she exactly?
speak;Krista;Her name's Yukino and she's with us now.|Turns out we got a whole other bandit group kidnapping girls.
speak;Forrest;Is that so? Well, there's only one thing to do in this situation.
speak;Krista;You know it! Time to kick some bandit butt!
speak;Krista;Anyway, time to save the girls and kick some bandit butt!

name: TalkKristaMichael
_source: speak;Krista;Stay away from those innocent villagers!
speak;Michael;W-Wait, please!|I'm guarding this house so the others don't get to it.|Please don't hurt me!

speak;Michael;It's the truth! I just joined the Knights, a-and this is NOT what I signed up for.|Splitting families, imprisoning innocent people{tgm}...{tgm} This{tgm}...{tgm} This isn't a knight's duty!
speak;Michael;I{tgm}...{tgm} I{tgm}...{tgm} Wahh!!{br}I want to go home!!
speak;Krista;Oh man, uh. S-Sorry, I didn't mean to make you cry.|Look, if you don't wanna stick with the Knights, you can come with us.
speak;Krista;I'm Krista, princess of Medeas.|My friends and I are investigating the disappearances going on in Foliaga.
speak;Michael;*sniffle* R-Really? I'll join you guys, then!|I want to help bring Foliaga's citizens back home where they belong.
speak;Krista;That's the spirit! Now, brave knight, what's your name?
speak;Michael;Um! Pardon me!|My name is Michael. I'll do my best to serve you, Your Highness.

name: TalkAquaMichael
_source: speak;Michael;I-I'm doing my job! Nothing to see here!
speak;Aqua;Please calm down.|I'm not on the Knights' side.
speak;Aqua;I am a Folian cleric, yes. But that's not important right now.|Why are Foliaga's knights raiding their own people?
speak;Michael;I joined the Knights recently, and this is my first mission.|This goes against everything I wanted to do. I{tgm}...{tgm} I wanted to help people!
speak;Aqua;If you're against the Knights, then please join us!|Princess Krista of Medeas is investigating matters now. We need all the help we can get.
speak;Michael;If it means bringing innocent lives back home safe, I'll gladly join your cause!|My name is Michael. What's yours, miss?
speak;Aqua;Aqua, cleric of Vergrande Monastery. Thank you for your aid, Michael.

name: TalkAquaSemi
_source: speak;Aqua;Yes!|These kind strangers unlocked my cell.
speak;Semi;Stay close, Aqua.|The danger's far from over.

name: TalkSamSemi
_source: speak;Sam;Come on and face me like a man, bandit scum!
speak;Semi;Don't point that thing at me! I'm not with these guys.|I'm trying to break me and my friend out of here.
speak;Semi;It's true! My friend, Aqua, was in the cell next to mine.|I've been trying to clear a way for us to escape.
speak;Sam;Oh! No need to worry about her! We already got her out.
speak;Sam;Alright, alright. I believe ya.|You said Aqua was in another cell? We'll get her out!

name: Chest
_source: speak;;A new Guide entry has been added.{br}<red>(Promotions)</>;center;;hint;;;;;3;no_sound

name: Chest
_source: speak;;A new Guide entry has been added.{br}<red>(Promotions)</>;center;;hint;;;;;3;no_sound

name: Chest
_source: speak;;A new Guide entry has been added.{br}<red>(Promotions)</>;center;;hint;;;;;3;no_sound

name: Door
_source: speak;Man4;I-I'm free? I knew this day would come!
speak;Man4;It's not much, but please have this.
speak;Woman1;Oh, thank you ever so much! May Merin bless you!|Please take this as a token of my gratitude.
speak;Boy1;Yay! Thanks a lot! I'm outta here!|Here, you can have this. I don't really need it.

name: FightJorge
_source: speak;Jorge;You gotta pay the toll 'round here.|If you don't got the cash, I'll gladly take your life instead!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;Prisoners: saved.{br}Bandits: killed.|Mission accomplished, boys and girls. Let's go home.
speak;Aqua;Wait, we can't leave yet.|My friend needs to get out of his cell!
speak;Aqua;Yes, thank you! Semi, I'm so glad you're safe!
speak;Semi;Aqua{tgm}...{tgm} Yeah. Glad you're okay, too.
speak;Semi;Hold on! We can't leave Aqua behind.
speak;Semi;Yeah. You're not hurt, are you, Aqua?
speak;Krista;Good. With that out of the way{tgm}...
speak;Krista;I'm gonna get the prisoners out of their cells.
speak;Krista;First, we'll get you guys home, then we'll go back to ours.
speak;Aqua;It's fine. We can trust them.|They saved us, after all.
speak;Aqua;You see, our home country of Foliaga{tgm}...{tgm}|It's too dangerous to stay there.
speak;Forrest;Let's discuss this elsewhere.|I'd rather not stay in a bandit fortress for much longer.
speak;Sam;We can head to my place.|It's not far from here, and it's going to get dark soon.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Chell;It seems the bandits are falling back.
speak;Krista;Taylor? Alex? Lucy?|How'd you guys know we'd be here?
speak;Chell;I informed them of your approximate location before leaving the castle.|They were to come to our aid had we not returned to the castle sooner.
speak;Alex;Well, you all seem to be alright despite the circumstances.
speak;Forrest;Those bandits really want to get Princess Krista back.|Let's get up early tomorrow as to not run into the|possibility of more bandit encounters.
speak;Lucy;See ya in the morning!|Don't let the bed bugs bite!

name: Intro
_source: #if;game.get_unit('Aqua').klass == 'Cleric' and game.get_unit('Aqua').wexp['Staff'] < 131 and has_item('Assault',team='player') is not True
if;game.get_unit('Aqua').klass == 'Cleric' and game.get_unit('Aqua').wexp['Staff'] < 131 and has_item('Assault',team='player') is not True

name: Intro
_source: speak;Trevor;Ah, yes!{br}Salvation!|Oh, sweet Medeas, how I've missed you so!
speak;Forrest;I wouldn't start celebrating yet. Look!
speak;Forrest;We have to keep moving southward!
speak;Forrest;The Medean border is just ahead!
speak;Jorge;Show 'em no mercy, boys!|Nab their gold and bleed 'em dry!

speak;Sam;Oh no, we just HAD to run into Jorge and his flunkies.|Jorge is out for blood. He'll try to go after us if we're in his sights.|And his underlings are no cake walk either.|His weaker men are here now, but I wouldn't be surprised if his big guys are lying in wait.|Let's get outta here before they come along.
speak;Krista;In that case, I'll stay behind and make sure everyone's accounted for.|So make sure you all get outta here before I do, okay?

name: Intro
_source: speak;Krista;Alright, we're in.|We gotta get everyone out of their cells then get out.
speak;Krista;I wish I was a bit more attentive{tgm}...
speak;Krista;But no use in moping! We gotta get everyone free.
speak;;Units will <red>not gain EXP, Weapon EXP, or Support Points</> for the chapter.;center;;hint;no_sound
speak;;You must deploy at least <red>five</> units for this chapter.;center;;hint;no_sound

name: Intro
_source: speak;Krista;Please tell me we're not too late{tgm}...
speak;Forrest;Our allies are being held in those carriages.
speak;Krista;Only one thing to do, then. We gotta get them out of there!|Then we'll head back the way we came.
speak;Lorelei;So, they came back for their friends, did they?
speak;Lorelei;But we won't let them have them!|Everyone, head north!
speak;Lorelei;Don't let them free the prisoners!
speak;GuildGirl;Are those the Medeans out there?
speak;GuildGirl;Everyone, head north! Quickly! Don't let them free the prisoners!
speak;GuildGirl;Captain Lorelei, I won't let your efforts be in vain.
speak;;Units will <red>not gain EXP, Weapon EXP, or Support Points</> for the chapter.;center;;hint;no_sound
speak;;You must deploy at least <red>six</> units for this chapter.;center;;hint;;;;;3;no_sound

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;Okay, I think we're in the clear--
speak;Krista;Wait, shoot! I think there's still a few of us back there.|We gotta go back for them!
speak;Trevor;Ah, yes!{br}Salvation!|Oh, sweet Medeas, how I've missed you so!
speak;Semi;Is there an echo in here?
speak;Aqua;I'm glad we made it unscathed.
speak;Forrest;Says the one who got us in this mess in the first place.
speak;Forrest;At any rate, we should be able to make it to castle in a few days' time.|Let's move.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;Argh, but we can't stick around forever.|Those bandits are gonna be tailing us if we don't leave now.
speak;Krista;Alright, everyone here and accounted for? Good!
speak;Krista;Let's move! Those bandits are gonna be catching up to us.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Man2;Thank you, kind strangers. You've saved us from the Knights.|Windbrook is forever in your debt.
speak;Krista;Think nothing of it.|We just happened to get into town at the right time!
speak;Man2;As thanks for saving us, please take this.
speak;Krista;Whoa, whoa, whoa! This is very generous of you,|but we couldn't possibly accept this.
speak;Man2;Please, I insist. You have done a great service for our fair village.|It is also getting dark, so please take this along with you.
speak;Krista;We'll be off, then. Stay safe!
speak;Man2;May Folia grant you a safe journey!
speak;Ferrach;So, Medea's ilk is involving herself in this, is she?
speak;Ferrach;No matter.|I'll just send some of the Knights their way, then inform the Archbishop of our guests.
speak;Ferrach;Not that they'll actually make it to her, of course. Hahaha{tgm}...

name: Intro
_source: if;game.get_unit('Anil').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Anil') == True and game.check_alive('Ecco') == True
speak;;Thousands of years ago, the continent of Yondo was birthed by the five Great Beasts.|Each Great Beast created one of Yondo's five nations.;;;narration
speak;;To the north lies Merinas, an archipelago nation formed by the Black Turtle Merin.;;;narration
speak;;It is currently ruled by Emperor Samegoro.;;;narration
speak;;To the east lies Foliaga, a heavily forested country formed by the Teal Wyrm Folia.;;;narration
speak;;Archbishop Azalea is its current ruler.;;;narration
speak;;To the west lies Oregot, a mountainous region formed by the White Tiger Oreg.;;;narration
speak;;It has no single ruler. Rather, a council of rich merchants governs the land.;;;narration
speak;;To the south lies Fuegsol, a desert nation formed by the Red Phoenix Fueg.;;;narration_top
speak;;It is currently ruled by King Gerolt and Queen Leeann.;;;narration_top
speak;;And finally in the center of the continent lies Medeas, a nation of grassy plains|formed by the Yellow Serpent Medea.;;;narration
speak;;It is ruled by King Bryant and Queen Thalia who are, of course...;;;narration
speak;Krista;But the elephant can't fit in the ice box--
speak;Forrest;Do you even need to ask?
speak;Forrest;I thought it would be appropriate to review the basics of Yondo's countries|considering what we had agreed to deal with recently.
speak;Krista;That reminds me, I'm gonna go to the guest quarters and|see how Aqua and Semi are doing.|Mind putting this on hold?
speak;Forrest;No, we cannot just "put this on ho--
speak;Krista;Hey guys! How're you liking the castle?
speak;Aqua;It has been a wonderful experience so far.|Thank you very much for your hospitality, Your Highness.
speak;Semi;Yeah, it's been okay, I guess.
speak;Krista;Anyway, about investigating Archbishop Azalea and all that,|you guys got any ideas?
speak;Semi;From what I've heard, Foliaga's smaller villages have been primary targets of|the disappearances.|The village of Windbrook near the border would be a good place to start.
speak;Krista;We'll head out to Windbrook tomorrow, then!|I'll get a strategy meeting going to decide what to do from there.
speak;Krista;You guys rest easy 'til then.|I can only imagine how rough the past few days have been.
speak;Krista;Felicity! How's my favorite maid doing?
speak;Felicity;You were gone for longer than expected.|I thought I would never see you again!
speak;Krista;Forrest managed to get me back like he always does.
speak;Krista;No need to worry as long as he's around!
speak;Felicity;Still, you shouldn't put yourself in so much danger.|Everyone was worried about you!
speak;Krista;But uh. How do I put this{tgm}...
speak;Krista;I'm gonna be putting myself in danger again? Possibly?
speak;Felicity;No!! If that's the case, let me come with you!
speak;Krista;No can do. Sounds like some serious stuff is going down in Foliaga.|If something happens to you, I dunno what I'd do.
speak;Krista;Speaking of which, I'm gonna round everyone up for a strategy meeting.|Mind making sure the war room is prepped for that?
speak;Krista;And no eavesdropping during the meeting.
speak;Felicity;Hm~? Now, why would I do that?
speak;Krista;Because it's what you always do.
speak;Krista;I'll believe it when I see it.
speak;Krista;Anyway, I gotta gather people up.|See ya!
speak;Felicity;I'll just "happen" to be sweeping up just outside the war room, then. Heehee~
speak;Krista;Alright, as per Semi's suggestion, we'll be starting our investigation in Windbrook.|But what do we do from there?
speak;Kai;If the investigation warrants us to actually confront the Archbishop herself--

speak;Kai;We will take the fastest route to the capital city of Oakenfaire.|We'll head directly eastward towards Lake Lunaris.|There is a village there that we can stop at to restock on supplies.|The rest of the path to Oakenfaire is filled with forests,|so it may be a bit until we see civilization.
speak;Forrest;This is what you consider the fastest?

speak;Aqua;Outsiders aren't supposed to know about this,|but Foliaga's major monasteries have secret underground passages that lead directly to|Oakenfaire.|It makes it easier for members of the church to travel throughout the country.
speak;Kai;Ha! Am I glad we managed to rescue you, Aqua. This changes everything!

speak;Kai;So, we'll still head to Lake Lunaris for supplies, as I've stated before.|Then we'll head to the closest major city: Mossgrove.|Once we're there, we'll make our way into its monastery's secret passageway.|Aqua, think you can get us in somehow?
speak;Aqua;As a member of the church, I'm sure I can manage something.
speak;Kai;Perfect. Sound like a plan, everyone?
speak;Krista;I'm down!|Steel yourselves, guys. We've got a big day tomorrow!
speak;Felicity;Hmm, so that's what's going on{tgm}...
speak;Viola;Felicity? What are you up to?
speak;Felicity;What the--?!|Oh, Viola, it's just you.
speak;Felicity;Done training with the other pegasus knights today?
speak;Viola;Yup! I was going to the dining hall to grab a bite to eat.|Wanna join me?
speak;Viola;What is it?|Looks like you're thinking real hard about something.
speak;Felicity;Hey, want to do something fun?
speak;Viola;You bet I do! What is it?
speak;Felicity;You see, Her Highness is going off an adventure tomorrow, and I was wondering{tgm}...
speak;Forrest;It's quite a small village.|Who knows if we'll actually find any information here.
speak;Man2;Greetings, travellers!{br}Welcome to Windbrook.|I'm the mayor of this village. Is there something I can assist you with?
speak;Forrest;Actually, yes.|We've heard that many of Foliaga's citizens have been going missing.|Has anything of the sort happened here?
speak;Man2;Fortunately, everyone in Windbrook is accounted for.|We all pray for our fellow Folians' safety in these trying times.|But why do you ask?
speak;Krista;We're looking into this situation ourselves.|If you know anything at all, we'd love to hear it.
speak;Man2;Now that you mention it, there have been rather concerning claims about{tgm}...
speak;Forrest;Please, sir. Go on.{br}This may be important.
speak;Man2;I'm sorry, but I can't risk word somehow getting to the Archbishop.|Forget I said anything. Goodbye.
speak;Semi;This is exactly what I was afraid of.|Everyone's quaking in their boots trying to not get on the Archbishop's bad side.
speak;Kai;Someone's gotta be willing to say something.|Let's keep asking around town and see what we can find.
speak;SoldierGreen;Hey, you're that new guy.{br}Michael, right?
speak;SoldierGreen;Try not to look so nervous. It's a big mission, I know.
speak;SoldierGreen;Look, you just gotta remember that you're fighting for the good of Foliaga.|That's why you joined the Knights in the first place, right?
speak;SoldierGreen;That's the spirit! Now, get ready to move.

speak;Michael;Maybe this is just the nerves talking, but is this really right?|We're in Windbrook. Nothing happens in a small village like this.|Did we even need this many of the Knights for this mission?;;;thought_bubble
speak;Irving;Attention, Windbrook!|By order of Archbishop Azalea, you are all under arrest.|Come quietly, and no harm will come to you.
speak;Man2;The Holy Knights? Here? Could it be{tgm}...?
speak;Man2;Everyone, get inside! Lock your doors!
speak;Aqua;They're Foliaga's Holy Knights. They work directly under the Archbishop.
speak;Semi;There were rumors that the Knights were responsible for the disappearances.
speak;Krista;No wonder the mayor was too scared to say anything.
speak;Krista;Either way, we can't let the Knights harm the villagers.
speak;Krista;Everyone, check up on each house and make sure they're secured!
speak;Krista;We have to protect as many of the villagers as we can!
speak;Michael;This isn't right. They can't all be criminals or heretics.|Something's wrong here.|Windbrook{tgm}...{tgm} I need to protect it!
speak;Michael;If I stay right here, then at least everyone in this house will be safe.|But what about everyone else?
speak;Michael;Oh no, oh no{tgm}...{tgm} I should have never joined the Knights.

name: BaseConvo_Sneaking In
_source: speak;Aqua;Let's see{tgm}...{tgm} Mossgrove's monestary should be in this direction.
speak;SoldierGreenFemale;Hey, isn't she that cleric from Vergrande Monestary?|The one travelling with the Medean princess?
speak;SoldierGreen;Yeah, you're right! You're coming with us.
speak;Aqua;Please just let me go. I{tgm}...!
speak;SoldierGreen;Relax, we're not gonna do anything to you or your friends.|We just needed to take this somewhere private.

speak;SoldierGreenFemale;You're trying to do something about Archbishop Azalea, right?|We can't do much to help you directly,|but we know a safer way to get to her than what you guys might have planned.
speak;SoldierGreen;We would've taken you to the dungeons right away and left you to the higher-ups|if we weren't on your side.
speak;Aqua;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Okay. You have a point.|Semi? Are you nearby? You may want to be here to hear them out too.
speak;Semi;You better not backstab us, you hear me?
speak;SoldierGreen;I swear by the Great Folia that we'll be aiding you to the best of our ability.
speak;Semi;What do you guys have in mind, then?
speak;SoldierGreenFemale;I'm assuming your plan was to use the tunnel hidden at the temple?
speak;SoldierGreenFemale;Scrap that plan. There's a full squadron waiting down there.|Hundreds of men are squatting in the main tunnels waiting for you all to show up.

speak;SoldierGreen;We recommend using this tunnel here.|There are still some Knights on watch there, but not as many as in the main tunnels.|This one bypasses Mossgrove Temple's main tunnel and connects to the main network.|From there, it should be a relatively easier path to Oakenfaire Monestary.
speak;SoldierGreenFemale;You would have to pass through the monestary's courtyard,|then you'll be at the Grand Temple of Folia.|That's where the Archbishop resides.
speak;Aqua;That seems to be our best option. What do you think, Semi?
speak;Semi;Assuming these guys are telling the truth, we should follow through on this.|I'm gonna report back to the princess about the change of plans.
speak;SoldierGreen;Before you go, do you mind if we assist you in navigating the tunnels?|I believe it would help build your trust in us in this endevour.
alert;The two Holy Knights will help for the chapter!

name: BaseConvo_Team Dad
_source: speak;Forrest;Now would be a good time to check on our supplies.|Is there anything we have that is in need of immediate attention?
speak;Kai;Other than some weapon repairs, I think we're good.
speak;Krista;We should probably stock up on more rations, though.|Our army's just getting bigger, so we'll need to compensate for that.
speak;Trevor;If that is the case, more tents and spare changes of clothing|may be necessary as well.
speak;Forrest;Good point. Speaking of which, all of you are in good health, I assume?|Not skipping meals? No illnesses to speak of?
speak;Kai;Heh, what are you, our dad?
speak;Trevor;Now that you mention it, Forrest does seem very fatherly.

name: Defeat Boss
condition: game.check_dead('Hayato') == True and (game.check_dead('Yukino') == True or game.get_unit('Yukino').team == 'player')

name: Defeat Boss_Poison
condition: ((unit.nid == 'Hayato' and unit2.nid is None) and (game.check_dead('Yukino') == True or game.get_unit('Yukino').team == 'player') or (unit.nid == 'Yukino' and unit2.nid is None and game.check_dead('Hayato') == True)

name: Defeat Boss
condition: game.check_dead('Asuka') == True and (game.check_dead('Sumire') == True or game.get_unit('Sumire').team == 'player')

name: Defeat Boss_Poison
condition: ((unit.nid == 'Asuka' and unit2.nid is None) and (game.check_dead('Sumire') == True or game.get_unit('Sumire').team == 'player') or (unit.nid == 'Sumire' and unit2.nid is None and game.check_dead('Asuka') == True)

name: Defeat Boss_Poison
condition: (unit.nid == 'Keisha' and unit2.nid is None and game.check_dead('Locke') == True) or (unit.nid == 'Locke' and unit2.nid is None and game.check_dead('Keisha') == True)

name: MagicWalls
_source: speak;SoldierGreen;Ah{tgm}...{tgm} Everything is so clear now!
speak;SoldierGreen;Finally, I can think clearly now!|Come on, guys! Let's help out the Medeans!
if;game.check_alive('107') == True or game.check_alive('108') == True or game.check_alive('109') == True
speak;Priest1;Thank you for your assistance! We shall return the favor.

name: Escape

name: Escape
_source: speak;Krista;See ya, Lake Lunaris!|Hope to visit you properly soon!
speak;Trevor;Foliaga's Holy Knights are no match for my stealth and cunning!
speak;Aqua;Oh Great Folia, please watch over Lunaris and its people{tgm}...
speak;Semi;Folia, grant us and Lunaris peace.
speak;Michael;Oh Folia please keep the people of Lunaris safe from harm and uh--
speak;Michael;I'm sorry Great Folia! I'll pray properly later!!
speak;Marina;Great Folia, keep Lunaris safe as I leave on this journey{tgm}...

name: SupportTrevorAnil
_source: speak;Trevor;Anil, my friend!|Could you spare me a moment of your time?
speak;Trevor;I shall take that as a "yes"!
speak;Trevor;You see, Her Highness assigned me to inform everyone of their|duties in the upcoming days, and I would like to inform you--
speak;Anil;*takes out a sheet of parchment and writes on it*;no_talk
speak;Trevor;Hm? What did you write?|Let me take a look{tgm}...
speak;Trevor;You were assigned to do kitchen duty this week!|Come back!!
speak;Trevor;Anil, my friend, I have something I wish to ask of you.
speak;Trevor;I promise I will be quick about it.
speak;Trevor;Please hear me out, I beg of you!|If you do not wish to fulfill my request,|I promise you will not have to speak to me ever again.
speak;Anil;*points to mouth and shakes head*;no_talk
speak;Trevor;Yes, yes, I know you cannot speak! Please take this seriously!|As I alluded to before, this is my request:|Could you please teach me sign language?
speak;Trevor;I assume you are wondering why I would ask this of you?

speak;Trevor;Well, the other day, you informed me that I spoke too much.|So, I thought that if I learned how to sign,|you would not have to hear me speak as often as before.|Does this sound satisfactory to you?
speak;Trevor;Excellent! Thank you so much, Anil.|I promise I will listen to your teachings to the best of my ability!
speak;Anil;["My friend, Anil. How are you today?"]
speak;Trevor;I see! Hold on, let me try again.
speak;Trevor;[My friend... Anil. How... are you... today??];no_talk
speak;Anil;*nods*|[Good job. You're a quick learner, Trevor.]
speak;Anil;[Haha, almost got it. But I still understood what you meant.]|[Oh, I've got a fun one to teach you. Look.]
speak;Anil;[It's another way you can say "fu--]
speak;Trevor;I will choose to not use that, thank you very much!!
speak;Anil;[Why not? It can be useful sometimes.]
speak;Trevor;I fail to see how that can be useful in any situation.
speak;Anil;[Okay, okay. Here, I'll teach you an actual useful one. Watch.]
speak;Trevor;Anil, I swear if you're tricking me--
speak;Trevor;Hmmm. I assume that meant "I love you"?
speak;Anil;[Good job. Go ahead and try again.]
speak;Anil;[Sorry, Trevor. You're just easy to tease.]
speak;Trevor;*sigh* Still, I appreciate you doing this for me, Anil.|These lessons have been of the utmost help.
speak;Anil;[Good. I'm glad I could help.]
speak;Trevor;I have an urgent matter I wish to discuss with you.
speak;Anil;[Am I on kitchen duty again?]
speak;Trevor;I--Well, yes, you are, actually.|But that is not the point!|There are more urgent matters at hand.
speak;Trevor;Anil, please take this seriously.|I am trying to tell you something important.
speak;Anil;[Sorry, just poking fun at you.]
speak;Trevor;You see, I have perused the castle library some time ago|and taught myself more sign language on my own.
speak;Anil;[Oh, really? Let me see how much you've learned, then.]
speak;Trevor;I apologize if I get something wrong, but here we go.
speak;Trevor;[Anil, I... believe you are...]|[smart... and patient... and a good... friend.]|[I admire you... a lot. And that... is why I... will give you this.];no_talk
speak;Trevor;*nods*|[I want to... spend the rest... of my life... with you.]|[Will you... take my hand... in marriage?];no_talk
speak;Anil;[I love you. I love you. I love you!]
speak;Trevor;[I love you too, Anil. I love you too so so much.];no_talk

name: BaseConvo_Customer Service
_source: speak;Jake;Let's see here{tgm}...{tgm} Swords will go in this compartment, and the lances will go there{tgm}...
speak;Jake;Oh, you startled me! You're Anil, right? Needed something?
speak;Anil;*gestures to his bow and takes out a sack of coins*
speak;Jake;A new bow for ya? Sure! No need to pay me, though.|We're on the same team, so it's on the house.
speak;Jake;I understand sign language, just so you know.|I taught it to myself so I could better communicate with people on the job.
speak;Anil;[Really? Did you have to speak with people like me often?]
speak;Jake;Often enough. Being a traveling merchant means you gotta deal with all kinds of people.
speak;Anil;[There aren't many people out there like you with that kind of consideration.]
speak;Anil;[Most of the time, Ecco has to do the talking for the both of us.]
speak;Anil;[Most of the time, my friend Ecco had to do the talking for the both of us.]
speak;Jake;Well, that's a darn shame.|The way I see it, a customer's satisfaction is a merchant's number one priority!
speak;Jake;And that all starts with proper communication.
speak;Anil;[You're a good man, Jake.]|[Just make sure no one takes advantage of your kind attitude.]
speak;Jake;Aw, shucks. You're making me blush.|No need to worry about me, though.|When the time's right, me and Anna will go back to Oregot and make things better--
speak;Jake;I mean! Uh! Forget I said anything!|A-Anyway, here's that bow. Bye, Anil!!

name: SupportAlexLucy
_source: speak;Lucy;Wow, it smells really good here.
speak;Lucy;Oh, Miss Alex! What are you up to?
speak;Alex;Hello, Lucy. Just brewing some tea.|Would you like some?
speak;Alex;Here you go.|Be careful. It's hot.
speak;Lucy;This is really good! What kind of tea is it?
speak;Alex;It's a blend of chamomile and lavender.|I've read that both are good for sleep and relaxation.
speak;Lucy;That's amazing! Tea can do that?
speak;Alex;Yes, to some extent.|It can't replace eating well and taking care of your body, but it can help.|If you'd like, I could lend you my book on different teas.|You seem quite interested.
speak;Lucy;That would be great! Thank you very much, Miss Alex!
speak;Alex;Of course.|If you happen to come across a tea that you might like, let me know.|I'll see if I can brew it for you.

name: SupportAlexMarina
_source: speak;Marina;Oh, hello, Alex. A reader yourself, I see.|Mind if I join you?
speak;Alex;Not at all. Actually, I do need someone to converse with.|Please take a seat and let me pour you a cup of tea.
speak;Marina;Now, what is on your mind?
speak;Alex;Someday I would like to find my own white knight who could protect my honor.
speak;Marina;There is something appealing about a dashing champion, isn't there?|However, I'm afraid that while there are good men in the world,|there isn't a Mr. Perfect.
speak;Alex;Oh, I know that.{br}Everyone's human.|That's not quite the dilemma.
speak;Marina;What is it then, dear? You look like something is troubling you.
speak;Alex;I worry that an eligible and reputable man would find me lacking.|You, though, probably have many suitors.
speak;Marina;While it is true that there are many who like the idea of being with me,|it isn't Marina they want to be with.
speak;Marina;They don't want me, Alex.|They want the woman they see on the posters.|They want the woman they see on the stage.
speak;Marina;And, of course, there are those who just want their base desires met.
speak;Marina;I know, dear. I wasn't suggesting you were.|I only meant that you don't have to worry about people|falling over each other for an IDEA of you.|They will want you for you.
speak;Marina;You may not have what some call "the perfect body", but you have your own appeal.|There's something to be said about a moderate woman.
speak;Marina;You also don't need to worry about people liking you for your title, unlike Her Highness.
speak;Marina;I feel bad for her sometimes.|I'm sure she has suitors crawling at her feet for her just because she's Medeas' princess.
speak;Marina;Reminds me of when I was younger when some only liked me for the fame I could bring them.
speak;Alex;But still{tgm}...{tgm} How to phrase this{tgm}...

speak;Alex;While I'm not looking for a Prince Charming,|I'm looking for someone I can fall in love with.|Someone to marry and look after. And he would look after me in return.|However, I wonder if I would even catch someone's eye.

speak;Marina;Alex. You have more going for you than you realize.|While you are mature enough to understand there is no Prince Charming,|you shouldn't worry about being the perfect girl either.|There are still men who don't care about perfect. They just want a loving wife.
speak;Marina;Sadly, being a dancer makes finding such a man difficult for me.
speak;Marina;No, thank YOU, Alex. It was a lovely talk.|And thank you for the tea.
speak;Marina;Oh, if you have any book recommendations, I would love to hear them.|I just finished this.|Next time we talk, you can share your recommendations.
speak;Alex;I wonder what book this is?
speak;Alex;Hmm, "Heavenly Desires"? I haven't heard of this one before.
speak;Alex;Maybe it can give me an idea of what kinds of books she likes.
speak;Alex;I haven't even finished the first chapter yet.

speak;Marina;Hello again, Alex.|Not to put you in a rush, but have you finished "Heavenly Desires" yet?|I've recently had this urge to give it another read.|I'm also curious about any book recommendations you may have based on this.
speak;Marina;So, what did you think of it?
speak;Alex;It WAS interesting, but does it really need all{tgm}...{tgm} THAT in it?
speak;Marina;Though, I still do enjoy it.
speak;Alex;It was certainly more intense than anything I've read myself.
speak;Alex;Why call those parts of a woman "nether lips" and "nip nops"?|Who talks like that?
speak;Marina;No one to my knowledge, though I get a giggle out of it.
speak;Alex;I don't mean to criticize it so much.|It wasn't bad per se, but like I said, it progressed faster than what I'm used to.|I haven't read anything of this intensity before.
speak;Marina;I'll admit that book is intense and not something I would have recommended if|you have not read something like this before.
speak;Alex;Some of the intimate moments between the main couple were nice,|but I do prefer a slower progression.
speak;Alex;Really let it brew and steep in first.
speak;Marina;Ahhh, more into the slow burns, I see.|I can let you read another one of my favorites, if you'd like.|There are a few I have that I think would be better for you.
speak;Alex;I would not mind that at all.
speak;Marina;Here we are, my personal book collection.|One I would recommend to you is "Roses and Strawberry Wine".|It's a more intense romance novel, but you're not diving into the deep end.
speak;Alex;I'll give it a try. Thank you, Marina
speak;Alex;Oh, and since I'm borrowing a book of yours, why don't you take this?
speak;Alex;Yes, it's a sweet romance about a noble who falls in love with a lowly farm girl.|I like it a lot.
speak;Marina;I'll give it a try. Thank you, Alex.
speak;Alex;Of course. Until next time, Marina.

name: SupportEccoAnil
_source: speak;Ecco;Alright, I've gone through the numbers.|With Her Highness oh so kindly providing rations, weapons, and all other essentials,|we've got an average of 5000 gold to set aside for whatever.
speak;Anil;[Not bad at all.]|[It's been a long time since we've had this big of a budget to work with.]
speak;Ecco;Yup! You know what that means?
speak;Anil;[Saving up for a rainy day for once?]
speak;Ecco;Nope! We're gonna treat ourselves today, Anil!|We absolutely deserve it after all our hard work.
speak;Ecco;You've been so focused on getting jobs done.
speak;Ecco;You're gonna die from stress before you're forty.
speak;Anil;[I don't think that's how that works.]
speak;Ecco;Trust me.|If you don't let yourself indulge in the good things in life,|you're gonna end up regretting it later.
speak;Ecco;Speaking of indulging,|there's this bakery in town that looked like it had the most delicious pies and tarts.|And you're gonna try them with me whether you want to or not!
speak;Ecco;Anil! We got paid today, and you know what that means!
speak;Anil;[Another day to splurge, I'm guessing?]
speak;Ecco;You know it! Lemme just get my coin pouch then we can--
speak;Ecco;No, no, no, no. You can't be serious{tgm}...!{tgm}|My pack's got a hole in it, and my coin pouch isn't in it. And--
speak;Anil;[Calm down. We'll just retrace our steps.]|[I'm sure we can find it.]
speak;Ecco;Found it! Man, that's a relief.
speak;Anil;[Good. Ready to go on your shopping spree, then?]
speak;Ecco;Um, n-no, I{tgm}...{tgm}|I just remembered I got other stuff to do today! Gotta go!
speak;Ecco;Come on, come on{tgm}...{tgm} My Tiger Amulet has to be here somewhere{tgm}...
speak;Ecco;It can't be lost. It just can't{tgm}...!
speak;Ecco;Maybe I should just{tgm}...{tgm} leave it be?
speak;Anil;[Hey, Ecco. This is yours, right?]
speak;Ecco;My Tiger Amulet! Anil, thank you, thank you, thank you!|Where did you find this?
speak;Anil;[Turns out it fell out of your pack while we were at the bakery the other day.]
speak;Ecco;The bakery? Man, I knew I should have checked there first.|But what were you doing there in the first place?
