speak;Krista;I wasn't completely honest with you the other day, Aqua.|When you walked in on me praying,|I wasn't reciting a traditional daily prayer.
speak;Krista;I was asking Medea for forgiveness.
speak;Krista;I've been asking for forgiveness every day for the past year for{tgm}...{tgm} Ervan.
speak;Krista;I've been asking for forgiveness every day for the past year for something{tgm}...{tgm}|I'm not really proud of.
speak;Aqua;Oh my{tgm}...{tgm} I'm so sorry.|If I knew, I--
speak;Krista;Like I said, don't worry about it.
speak;Krista;Praying together like this, and when we talked about our gods{tgm}...{tgm}|It all really put me at ease, you know.
speak;Krista;Yeah. For the past year, I always wondered if Medea would ever forgive me.|If I was deserving of his forgiveness.
speak;Krista;But then I thought about what you said. How Folia always puts his children first|and wants the best for them.
speak;Krista;All the Great Beasts are siblings,|so I'm sure Folia's and Medea's kindness must have come from somewhere, right?
speak;Aqua;Absolutely.|And even if Medea doesn't find it in his heart to forgive you, I will.
speak;Aqua;You've done enough to prove you deserve forgiveness.
speak;Aqua;And even then, I'd still forgive you.
speak;Krista;Thanks, Aqua. I really appreciate that.

name: SupportKristaMasashi
_source: speak;Masashi;Your Highness! May I have a word with you?
speak;Masashi;I would like to humbly apologize for my behavior when we first met.|It was, quite frankly, a terrible first impression.
speak;Masashi;I see now the error of my ways.
speak;Masashi;Why, your beauty is unparalleled!|You swing your blade with such grace.|The way you lead your army has such refinement.|I was completely wrong about you!
speak;Krista;Look, you don't gotta say stuff you don't mean.
speak;Masashi;What? But I do mean what I said.
speak;Krista;Anyway, I've got more important things to do than listen to shallow compliments.|See ya.
speak;Masashi;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Perhaps words alone are not enough.
speak;Masashi;I shall prove to her my honesty by any means necessary!
speak;Krista;It's about all the gifts from you that were outside my chambers.
speak;Masashi;Oh, is that all? Did you not like them?
speak;Krista;Look, I will admit this is very flattering.
speak;Krista;But, dear Medea,|I can just feel Forrest staring daggers at you from across the room.
speak;Krista;I'm saying this because I'm honestly fearing for your life--
speak;Krista;I just don't want Forrest to commit murder.|So, just cool it with the gifts, alright?|I don't want to lose a valuable member of the army because he's being stupid.
speak;Masashi;Ah, Your Highness! I did not expect to see you at the archery range.
speak;Masashi;A master of the bow yourself, I see.|You're just full of surprises, aren't you?
speak;Masashi;A bullseye!|You have great aim, Your Highness, even while I'm conversing with you like this.|You have great focus--
speak;Masashi;P-Pardon?|I apologize. Am I distracting you?
speak;Krista;Technically, no. Just{tgm}...{tgm} Just don't talk to me while I shoot, okay?
speak;Masashi;Your Highness? What's wrong? Why are you crying?
speak;Krista;Masashi, I'm sorry. It's just{tgm}...{tgm}|When you started talking like that, it reminded me of Ervan{tgm}...
speak;Krista;{tgm}...{tgm} Ex-fiancee. And former prince of Fuegsol.
speak;Krista;He taught me everything about the bow, and we would talk just like this during training.
speak;Masashi;{tgm}...{tgm} I deeply apologize, Your Highness. I did not mean to bring up such memories.
speak;Krista;It's okay. You didn't know.|If anything, I should be sorry for snapping at you earlier.
speak;Masashi;Alright, let's get those tears dried, Your Highness.|And if you'd like, we can train together.|Perhaps you could give me some tips?|I'd love to hear about Fuegan archery techniques.

name: SupportKristaSam
_source: speak;Sam;Hey, Krista. We haven't had the chance to actually catch up on things.
speak;Krista;Yeah! What happened with you all this time?|You know, besides the whole bandit-killing thing.
speak;Sam;Not much beyond that.|But more importantly, what were you doing in Oregot?
speak;Krista;Yup. Things.|Things that do not need any elaboration or detail whatsoever.

speak;Sam;Come on, Krista. Be honest with me.|No one goes to Oregot without rhyme or reason.|Especially not in its more bandit-infested regions.|You have a lot more important stuff to deal with than that, right?
speak;Sam;It can't be that hard to explain.
speak;Krista;I can't believe I gotta actually say this to you.
speak;Krista;You remember how I got kidnapped by bandits years ago, right?
speak;Krista;Y'see, the thing is that I{tgm}...
speak;Krista;Dear Medea, how do I even begin to phrase this?
speak;Krista;After all that, I kinda{tgm}...{tgm} liked it?
speak;Sam;You know what? Let's put this conversation on hold.|I need time to think.
speak;Krista;And this is why I didn't wanna elaborate.
speak;Sam;Alright, Krista. It's about time we discuss the elephant in the room.
speak;Krista;Oh, dear Medea, do we have to?
speak;Krista;I REALLY don't want to go any more in depth than I already have.
speak;Sam;Your explanation hardly makes any sense, though.|How can you LIKE getting kidnapped? You are deliberately putting yourself in danger!
speak;Krista;*sigh* Here we go with the word choice again.
speak;Krista;No, no, no, more like{tgm}...{tgm} it excites the senses?
speak;Sam;Just read a good book. I can give you recommendations.
speak;Krista;For the love of Medea, Sam! It riles me up like an animal in heat!|Happy now?!
speak;Sam;Still doesn't make a lick of sense!
speak;Krista;Nope! Not having any more "talks" with you.
speak;Sam;We are having this talk even if I have to tie you to a chair.
speak;Krista;A-Anyway, what's so important that you would tie me up to talk about it?
speak;Sam;Do you even know why I left Medeas in the first place?
speak;Krista;You wanted to see what Oregot was like?
speak;Sam;Krista, you're not that dumb or oblivious. Give me a real guess.
speak;Krista;Well, it was after I got captured, and Chell's parents died in the rescue.|You were out for revenge?
speak;Sam;Not wrong, and not entirely right either.
speak;Sam;I went there to kill every last bandit to ensure you wouldn't get captured again.
speak;Sam;No one's gonna get hurt by those scum again.
speak;Krista;Vengeance seemed like an obvious answer.
speak;Krista;And, honestly, I thought you were mad at me too.
speak;Krista;It was my fault, Sam! It was because of me that they died!
speak;Krista;If I hadn't wandered off that day, they would still be alive{tgm}...
speak;Sam;Krista, there are millions of "what if's".|You're not doing yourself any favors by listing all the many different ones.
speak;Sam;They may be true, they may not. Something else may have happened.
speak;Sam;I went to try and make Oregot safer by|eliminating what makes it dangerous for everyone.|That much is guaranteed.
speak;Krista;I understand now. Thanks for telling me, Sam.
speak;Krista;That's one less weight off my mind.
speak;Sam;That aside, why do you keep feigning ignorance all the time?|I know you're not like that at all.
speak;Sam;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} I think I know why.
speak;Sam;That event back then scarred you in more ways than one,|resulting in how you portray yourself  now.
speak;Sam;You're smart and caring, Krista. You notice the details. Details that elude me at times.|And you always have everyone's best interests at heart.
speak;Sam;And because of that, I know you will make a good queen of Medeas someday.
speak;Krista;I understand where he's coming from, but it's not that simple.
speak;Krista;Still, it's nice to know he hasn't changed, even after all these years.
speak;Krista;Hold on, didn't he say he was gonna have me tied up through that whole interrogation?
speak;Krista;Sam, wait up! You need to hold up your end of the bargain!!

name: SupportKristaTorgen
_source: speak;Krista;Hey, Torgen. Mind tying me up? For old-time's sake?
speak;Torgen;Don't you have more important things to do?
speak;Krista;I mean, yeah, but we've got a bit of downtime.
speak;Krista;C'mon, it'll be fun! I look real cute wrapped up in ropes, dontcha think?
speak;Krista;If you aren't, why did you keep agreeing to "kidnapping" me, hm?
speak;Torgen;Because you wouldn't stop pestering me if I didn't.
speak;Krista;But! You still enjoyed it at least a little bit, didn't you?
speak;Torgen;Well, when it's just me and ol' Asra, it can get boring.
speak;Torgen;Still not gonna tie you up.
speak;Krista;Oh come on! Please? For me?
speak;Torgen;And there you go, pestering me again.
speak;Torgen;*sigh* Let me get the rope.
speak;Krista;Torgen! Wanna tie me up agai--
speak;Krista;Yeesh, you're sounding more grumpy than usual. What's up?
speak;Torgen;Things shouldn't have gone that way.|Gordon wouldn't've gotten his grubby mitts on you if I-
speak;Krista;Hey. I already told you it was okay. I'm alive, aren't I?
speak;Krista;Besides, if I didn't forgive you, we wouldn't be talking right now.
speak;Torgen;You have a point. Still, I can't get over how scared you were when Gordon got you.
speak;Torgen;It was like when we met five years ago{tgm}...
speak;Torgen;I don't want you fearing for your life like that, Krista.|I'm not fumbling like that ever again.
speak;Krista;If I died that day, I{tgm}...
speak;Krista;N-Nothing. It's nothing.|Anyway, sorry for bothering you. I'm just gonna go.
speak;Torgen;Huh? Krista? What're you doing laying on the ground like that?
speak;Torgen;... Doesn't cloud watching usually go where someone says, oh I don't know,|"Hey, that cloud looks like a bear," or something like that?
speak;Krista;It could. To be honest, I just watch them float by.
speak;Krista;I like your idea, though. Beats what I usually think about.
speak;Krista;Sometimes I wonder if you fell from a great height,|would the clouds be the last thing you saw?
speak;Torgen;If you fell on your back, maybe.|Kind of a morbid thing to think about, though.
speak;Torgen;... Krista, if you fell, I'd catch you.
speak;Torgen;Let me finish.|Whatever the reason, if it was my fault, someone else's, on accident, on purpose,|it doesn't matter.|I'll be there before you hit the ground. You can count on me.
speak;Krista;Torgen, I{tgm}...{tgm} S-Sorry. I've been saying weird stuff this whole time.
speak;Torgen;All sorts of weird stuff's been on your mind lately.
speak;Torgen;A while back, you were sayin' something about dying when we first met.
speak;Torgen;I don't know what exactly's going on in that head of yours.|All I know is that something's stressing you out, right?|Something weighing down on you so much, you just wanna stop?
speak;Torgen;Being royalty's a lot of responsibility.|I can't even imagine how much is on your shoulders just from that.

speak;Torgen;Still, I get it. Before this, I was just a bandit tryin' to scrape by.|All those years ago when you were captured, and I saw you crying in that cell,|I knew I couldn't keep living that life.|That's why I helped. Or tried to, at least.
speak;Torgen;But I couldn't escape it.|I was still a bandit, and that's the only life I thought could know.
speak;Torgen;I kept holding on, hoping that things would change.|That maybe there was a chance I wouldn't have to keep living like this.
speak;Krista;You were just lucky. What if you're not there to save me like I did for you?|I can't just depend on you.
speak;Torgen;Then you grit your teeth and save your own damn self.|I knew I couldn't bank on us meeting again.
speak;Torgen;Hell, the possibility didn't even cross my mind!
speak;Torgen;So I just kept going despite everything.
speak;Krista;I{tgm}...{tgm} I'm not strong enough for that!
speak;Torgen;You made it this far, right? What's one more day?|If you make it that day, then you can make it to the next, right?
speak;Krista;I guess you have a point{tgm}...
speak;Torgen;Life's tough. It'll keep beating your ass if you let it.
speak;Torgen;So, the best thing to do is beat its ass back!|Show it that no matter what it throws at you, you can dish out ten times worse!
speak;Torgen;Just keep living on, Krista. Promise me that.
speak;Krista;Hey, Torgen. After this is all over, wanna stay in Medeas with me?
speak;Torgen;What are you going on about now?
speak;Krista;I'm giving you a job offer! You can be one of my retainers.
speak;Torgen;You can't be serious. I'm a bandit, Krista. There's no way this can work.
speak;Krista;I've turned a thief and a couple of vagrants into reliable retainers.|A bandit won't be too out there for me.
speak;Krista;But that's why you like me.
speak;Krista;Besides, weren't you the one who said you wanted to leave the bandit life behind?
speak;Torgen;Yeah, but having an out handed to me on a silver platter? Feels like cheating.
speak;Krista;So what? You wanna work for the position?
speak;Torgen;That would make it feel more legitimate.
speak;Krista;Oh, I know!|If you're still alive once this is all over, I'm making you my retainer. Deal?
speak;Torgen;Wait, doesn't that mean I'll be under your service no matter what I do?
speak;Torgen;As long as "the end" isn't too soon.
speak;Torgen;Don't even think about changing your mind about this, by the way.|Remember that you're the one who asked in the first place.
speak;Krista;I won't regret it. I promise.
speak;Krista;If you want, you can keep me on a short leash so I don't run away.

name: SupportFelicityDamien
_source: speak;Damien;Ah, there you are. Felicity, was it?
speak;Felicity;Hm? Oh, you're that weird guy! Damien, right?
speak;Damien;Correct. Now, how about you drop the cutesy act?
speak;Felicity;Hm~? I have no idea what you're talking about.
speak;Damien;Don't play coy with me.|I can sense a certain power within you.|You've been around for a long time, haven't you?
speak;Felicity;Depends on what you mean by long, silly!
speak;Felicity;Oops! Her Highness is calling for me. Catch you later, Broody!
speak;Damien;She's... Yes. Her power.|Now I'm sure that she's...
speak;Damien;We haven't finished our last conversation.
speak;Felicity;What was that again~? Sorry, I don't remember.|Oh, well. See ya!
speak;Damien;I demand to speak with you this instant!
speak;Felicity;You're so pushy~!|But, I'm feeling nice, so I'll stay put.
speak;Damien;This is a serious matter.|I know what you are. And I know that you know what I am.|Admit it. You're avoiding me because you know what I wish to speak with you about.
speak;Felicity;... You're really not going to leave me alone until we talk about it, are you?
speak;Damien;If you cooperate, I'll make it quick.
speak;Felicity;Fine, fine.|What do you wanna know?
speak;Damien;You're a Feline, are you not?|Yet, you associate yourself with Medea's kin. Why is that?
speak;Felicity;She was nice to me, and I needed shelter. That's all.
speak;Damien;You know what Medea did to your people.
speak;Felicity;You think I don't know that?! I was there! Everyone... They...
speak;Felicity;So what? That's it? Just came here to remind me of my trauma?
speak;Damien;That was not my intent.|However, this was an enlightening conversation.|I'll take my leave then.
speak;Felicity;That guy... What's his deal?|His power... it feels like all the Great Beasts combined.
speak;Damien;How cold.|Can't you at least pretend to be happy to see me?
speak;Felicity;I don't want to talk to you.
speak;Damien;Look, I would like to apologize for our last conversation.|I truly meant no harm.
speak;Damien;... Medea destroyed my family too.
speak;Felicity;Wait. Is that why I couldn't get a good read on you?|No wonder your power felt like all the Great Beasts' at once.|You're one of Circ's children, aren't you?
speak;Damien;Precisely.|I wished to speak with you before because I don't have anyone left.|No one I can see eye to eye with, at least.
speak;Felicity;Hey, I'm sorry for being rude to you all this time.|I was scared, and I didn't know what to do.|If you were a child of one of the Great Beasts...
speak;Damien;Please, I should be the one apologizing.|I was not as tactful as I should have been.|And you're right. I should have realized my presence would make you wary.
speak;Felicity;Heehee, you're not good at reading the room, are you?
speak;Damien;A small consequence of being in hiding for a millenia.|You seem to have adapted quite well to social cues, though.
speak;Felicity;Working for Princess Krista helped with that a lot.|It was kinda awkward at first, but everyone's really nice!|Plus, they're fun to play pranks on.

speak;Felicity;Y'know, Her Highness may be Medea's kid, but she's not like him. Not at all.|She's taken in so many people from different backgrounds and let them work for her.|She sees us all as just people. Not as a child of Medea, or Fueg, or Folia...|I think that's why she grew onto me.
speak;Damien;Yes, I can see what you mean.
speak;Felicity;Despite that, I can't talk about my past with anyone.|I don't know how people would react if they knew what I really was.
speak;Damien;Well, now that we know where we stand, perhaps we can speak freely?
speak;Felicity;Yeah! On that note, you remind me of my uncle Goto.|He wasn't a good talker either.
speak;Felicity;Yeah, apparently when he met my aunt Leilu...

name: SupportKaiTrevor
_source: speak;Kai;Trevor, there you are.|Mind if I ask you about something?
speak;Trevor;Kai, my brother in arms, you may ask me anything your heart desires.
speak;Kai;Great. Just to confirm, Princess Krista hired you around six months ago?
speak;Trevor;Why, yes! Only two months after your employment, if memory serves.
speak;Kai;I see. With that in mind, your prowess with magic piqued my interest.
speak;Trevor;You flatter me so, Kai!|But, I have a feeling that this is where the praise ends.
speak;Kai;And you'd be right.|You see, I've heard rumors that House Valoria's only child has gone missing.
speak;Kai;And has been missing for around six months.
speak;Kai;Being a magic prodigy yourself, I'm sure you'd know about the most powerful|mage family in Medeas, wouldn't you?

speak;Trevor;Well{tgm}...{tgm} of course! Now, Kai, excuse me for being presumptuous,|but I am not the missing Valoria heir of which you speak.|For the Valoria family only had a daughter, not a son.|It would be impossible for it to be me.
speak;Kai;Huh. Well, that's news to me.|Sorry about the assumptions, Trevor.|I guess I'll have to go back to the drawing board for this one.
speak;Trevor;It is quite alright, my friend.|I would love to chat more, but I must get to my studies.|Do not get too caught up in the rumor mill, now.
speak;Kai;Well, that trail has gone cold. Hm{tgm}...
speak;Kai;Why do I have this nagging feeling that there's more to this story?
speak;Man3;Here's that sketch you wanted, sir.|Is that all you needed?
speak;Kai;Yes, thank you. And here's your payment.|Thank you again for your assistance.
speak;Kai;Now, let's see here{tgm}...{tgm} That's what the young Valoria scion looks like, hm?|Her face{tgm}...
speak;Kai;Heh, if I didn't know any better, I'd say she looks just like--
speak;Trevor;Ah, Kai, my brother in arms! Fancy seeing you here.
speak;Trevor;Is something the matter, Kai? You look like you've seen a ghost.
speak;Kai;As I was saying, what are you doing in town?
speak;Trevor;Why, I am out doing errands for Princess Krista.|Would you care to join me?
speak;Kai;Actually, I'm busy with my own stuff. Maybe some other time?
speak;Trevor;So it shall be. I will not keep you any longer.|So long!
speak;Kai;No, I must be going crazy. There's no way{tgm}...
speak;Trevor;Kai was acting really weird just now.
speak;Trevor;No, of course not. Just keep doing what you're doing, Trevor.|You've kept suspicions off yourself for this long, after all.
speak;Kai;With all this evidence, I am now almost one hundred percent sure about my theory.|All I need to do now is confront Trevor about it.
speak;Kai;G'morning, Trevor. It's Kai.|Can we talk?
speak;Kai;Sorry, did I catch you at a bad time?
speak;Trevor;Nah, everything's a-okay!|I-I mean, just{tgm}...{tgm} uh{tgm}...{tgm} Gimme a sec, alright??
speak;Kai;... Did he just say "a-okay"?|Yeah, something's not right here.;;;thought_bubble
speak;Trevor;Nah, nah, it's cool! I'll be out in a jiff!
speak;Kai;Did you just say "in a ji--
speak;Trevor;Hi. Hello. Yes. Ahem.|Kai, my brother in arms, how are you on this fine morning?|Quite breezy today, isn't it?
speak;Kai;{tgm}...{tgm} You're not wearing any pants.
speak;Kai;*sigh*|By Merin, this was NOT how I wanted to confirm my suspicions.
speak;Kai;Trevor, after you get some pants on, can we talk?|We can do it in your quarters if you prefer.
speak;Kai;Relax, I won't.|The thought didn't even cross my mind.
speak;Trevor;Then, why bother looking into this in the first place?
speak;Kai;Just wanted to satisfy my own curiosity. You know how it is.
speak;Trevor;For once, I wish that wasn't the case.|There was a reason why I didn't want this coming out, you know.
speak;Kai;Trevor, I'm really sorry. I didn't mean to invade on something so private.|I didn't realize it WAS a private matter for you.
speak;Kai;Do you mind if I ask you one last thing?
speak;Trevor;I refuse to feed your curiosity any longer.

speak;Kai;Trevor, please. I really am sorry that I hurt you.|I had no idea this was a sensitive topic for you. Please understand that.|You're my friend, and I would never intentionally cause you grief.
speak;Trevor;What did you wish to ask me?
speak;Kai;Why all of this hiding?|Were things in House Valoria not to your liking?

speak;Trevor;Ha! "Hiding"? Kai, my friend, this is the most unconcealed I have been in my entire life.|"Heir to House Valoria" was the disguise. Not "Trevor".|"Trevor, loyal retainer to Princess Krista" has been my true self all along,|even if it took me a long time to realize it.
speak;Kai;If that's how it is, then that's how it is.|You're Trevor. Always have been, always will.

speak;Kai;I never actually knew you in your previous life, so I got nothing to compare to anyway.|I can imagine that it was tough for you back then, though.|Having to pretend to be someone else and all.

speak;Trevor;Yes, it was a miserable existence.|But when Her Highness found me half a year ago{tgm}...{tgm} When she accepted me for who I was{tgm}...{tgm}|That was the happiest moment in my life. I'll never forget that.
speak;Kai;You're definitely doing well now. I can tell.|And I prefer a happy Trevor over a sad one any day.
speak;Trevor;Haha{tgm}...{tgm} Thank you.|That means a lot.
speak;Trevor;As are you, Kai. As are you.
speak;Trevor;I can't stop thinking about what happens after all{tgm}...{tgm} this.
speak;Trevor;Will we still be employed by the royal family? Her Highness might not{tgm}...
speak;Kai;I dunno about you, but I'm outta here no matter what happens afterward.
speak;Kai;I'm a mercenary, remember? And I'd say my job here's almost done.
speak;Trevor;That is one way to put it, I suppose.
speak;Kai;And even if I wasn't a mercenary,|Merinas would be hunting me down and arresting me for treason.
speak;Kai;I wouldn't wanna make myself an easy target, y'know?
speak;Kai;Come on, don't make such a long face.|This was gonna happen eventually, Trev. You know that.
speak;Trevor;Yes, but that does not make it hurt any less.|Did our time together mean nothing to you?
speak;Kai;Trev, in case you haven't noticed, I don't stay attached to people.
speak;Trevor;But what about what you said before? We are friends, are we not?
speak;Trevor;Says the man who has given me a nickname on a whim.
speak;Trevor;And here I thought you were more tight-lipped.
speak;Kai;I don't loosen my lips or my tongue for just anyone, you know.|And you shouldn't either, Valoria.
speak;Trevor;{tgm}...{tgm} Just what are you trying to say?
speak;Kai;You trusted me this entire time to keep your secret.|Do you believe that to be a wise decision?
speak;Trevor;You would have done something with this information by now.|Force me back to my family, inform Her Highness of my true identity{tgm}...{tgm}|And yet here we are with nothing changed.
speak;Kai;{tgm}...{tgm} Heh. All very true, Trev.
speak;Trevor;Huh? What was the point of all that?
speak;Kai;Just a little test to see if you've got a good read on me after all this time.|You passed, by the way.
speak;Trevor;Could you please be straightforward for once?
speak;Kai;Sure I can, on one condition.
speak;Kai;Just relax when it's just us.|No need to use that extensive vocabulary around me.|It's gotta be exhausting for you.
speak;Kai;Good. In fact, I can make the transition easier on you, if you want.
speak;Kai;I can be your first in other ways too, if you'll let me, Trev.
speak;Trevor;Wait wait wait stop stop stop that's going way too fast!!
speak;Kai;Oh? You knew what I meant by that? I guess you're not as innocent as I thought--

name: TalkKristaAnil
_source: speak;Krista;Hey! You're not with these guys, right?
speak;Krista;Mind helping us out, then?|Things are getting pretty dicey.

name: TalkKristaHaruki
_source: speak;Krista;Hey, kid, get outta here! It's dangerous!
speak;Haruki;No way, this is my home and I gotta protect it!
speak;Krista;Great enthusiasm, but you really should leave it to the adults.
speak;Haruki;Hey, I'm pretty good with a lance!|Don't underestimate me just 'cause I'm a kid.
speak;Krista;Heh, a real go-getter, ain't ya?
speak;Krista;Alright, you can help. Just don't get in over your head, you hear?
speak;Haruki;Okay! Oh, we should let my big bro know you guys are helping too.|Our house is the one with the red roof. He should be there.

name: TalkKristaAzure
_source: speak;Krista;Krista, princess of Medeas, at your service.
speak;Krista;Y'know, when these pirates attacked us, I wasn't expecting us to rescue prisoners too.
speak;Azure;When their ship stopped, I didn't expect this at all either.|How about we join forces, Your Highness?
speak;Krista;Sure! We need all the help we can get.

name: TalkKristaKhalid
_source: speak;Khalid;Krista! It's you! I was starting to think I'd never find you.
speak;Krista;What the--Khalid?! What are you doing out here?

speak;Khalid;Looking for you!|When I heard you were doing stuff in Foliaga, I had to meet up with you again.|I'd hoped to catch up with you back in Medeas,|but your parents said you were already making your way to Merinas.
speak;Khalid;Man, it's so good to see you again, Krista. You have no idea.
speak;Khalid;I missed you, y'know? Things haven't been the same since Ervan{tgm}...{tgm} Well{tgm}...
speak;Khalid;Hey, there's no need to apologize. All that matters is that we're together again.
speak;Khalid;We can catch up on things when you're ready.

name: TalkForrestReem
_source: speak;Forrest;Reem?|Wait, if you're here, then that must mean His Highness is here as well.
speak;Reem;Yes, Prince Khalid is with me, of course.|He had heard of Her Highness' exploits in Foliaga,|so he and I rushed to Medeas to meet up with her.
speak;Forrest;And from there, you learned of our journey to Merinas' capital.
speak;Forrest;You and Prince Khalid will be allowed to join us, Reem.|That should go without question.|Now, let us take care of these bandits.
speak;Reem;Can't that man not think about his duties just this once?

name: TalkAquaAzure
_source: speak;Aqua;Azure?! What are you doing here?
speak;Azure;This rowdy band of pirates raided the town my troupe and I were performing at.
speak;Azure;Well, you can see how my luck turned out.
speak;Aqua;Are you alright? You're not hurt, are you?
speak;Azure;Far from it, surprisingly. Apparently they want their prisoners alive and well.|For what exactly, I'm not sure.
speak;Aqua;You must absolutely come with us, then!|I've been travelling alongside the princess of Medeas.
speak;Azure;Oh? Sounds like there's a story behind that.
speak;Aqua;We can talk more about it once we're out of danger.

name: TalkKristaMarina
_source: speak;Krista;You don't look like with these pirates. What are you doing here?
speak;Marina;I was held prisoner until just a few moments ago. I managed to escape before they noticed.
speak;Krista;Are you okay? If you want, you can come along with us!
speak;Krista;I'm Krista, princess of Medeas, by the way.
speak;Marina;The princess of Medeas herself, hm? Isn't this a pleasant surprise!|My name is Marina. A pleasure to meet you, Your Highness.|Now, let us take care of these ruffians, shall we?

name: TalkForrestMarina
_source: speak;Marina;My, my, what's a handsome thing like you doing all the way out here?
speak;Marina;It seems my luck is finally turning around.|Perhaps being captured by these brutes was a good thing if I ran into someone like you.
speak;Forrest;With all due respect, madam, aren't there more pressing matters at hand?
speak;Marina;You think I don't know that?
speak;Marina;I'll be staying by your side, if you don't mind, sir knight.|I believe I can trust you to ensure my safety?
speak;Forrest;Again, with all due respect, this is not something you can authorize.
speak;Marina;And here I thought I found a noble knight who could protect me from these pirates.|I guess I was wrong.
speak;Marina;So you WILL let me come along with you, then. Marvelous!|Please, lead the way.
speak;Forrest;My name is Forrest, by the way. And yours, miss?
speak;Marina;Marina. Thank you for your aid, Sir Forrest.

name: TalkRembrandtMarina
_source: speak;Marina;Well, isn't this a pleasant surprise? Rembrandt, wasn't it?
speak;Rembrandt;Yes. And you're{tgm}...{tgm} Miss Marina, correct?
speak;Marina;How sweet of you to remember.
speak;Marina;If anything, I'm more surprised you remember little ol' me.
speak;Rembrandt;We can discuss more of that later. More importantly, are you alright?|I doubt you're on this pirate ship out of your own free will.
speak;Marina;And you'd be right.|The brutes raided town and ran off with whoever they could get their hands on.
speak;Rembrandt;How horrible. But worry not, Miss Marina. You're in safe hands now.|Just come along with us and you'll be fine.
speak;Rembrandt;I've been recruited into the Medean princess's army. It's{tgm}...{tgm} a long story.
speak;Marina;And you'll tell it to me once this is all over, won't you?|Perhaps over a drink or two?

name: TalkSemiAzure
_source: speak;Semi;Hey, you're not one of those pirates, right? Let me help--
speak;Azure;Oh, Folia, you cannot be serious right now.
speak;Semi;Shut it! I'm not happy knowing it's YOU on this ship either.
speak;Azure;Whether I should be thankful or worried is debatable.
speak;Semi;She was for a while, but we had to send her back to Medeas Castle.
speak;Semi;She was for a while, but we had to send her back to the monastery.
speak;Azure;What?! Is she hurt? Is it serious?
speak;Semi;Calm down, will ya? It was just her leg that broke.|Give her enough time and she'll be fine.
speak;Azure;To think I had even the slightest amount of trust in you to keep her safe{tgm}...
speak;Semi;Oh, like you could've done any better?
speak;Semi;Look, we can sit here and argue all day or|we can actually do something about these pirates.

name: TalkKristaRyuuji
_source: speak;Krista;Hold on, there's something I gotta ask you first.
speak;Ryuuji;Ha! That's a first.|Fine, go ahead. I'm listening.
speak;Krista;Do you know a guy named Kai?|Mercenary? White hair? Really good with a sword?
speak;Krista;He's with us! And sounds like he knows who you are too.
speak;Krista;That's what he says.|I dunno what's going on between you two, but could you talk to him?|Sounds like he was desperate to know if you are who he thinks you are.
speak;Ryuuji;Don't look so happy.|If I don't like what Kai has to say, we'll get back to raiding your ship.

name: TalkKaiRyuuji
_source: speak;Ryuuji;What?! How do you know my--
speak;Ryuuji;Kai? What are you doing here?
speak;Kai;I should be asking you that.
speak;Kai;For five years, I thought you were dead.
speak;Kai;What the hell are you doing with pirates of all people?!
speak;Ryuuji;Look, I'll call off the raid, then we can talk.
speak;Ryuuji;I have a lot of explaining to do, I know.

name: TalkFelicityMasashi
_source: speak;Felicity;{tgm}...{tgm} Not to be rude,|but I believe this is the part where you attempt to pelt me with arrows?
speak;Masashi;What? Why would I even consider doing that?|It would be a waste to tarnish the beauty of a lovely woman such as yourself.
speak;Felicity;I hope you like dark magic to the face.
speak;Felicity;Give me one good reason why I shouldn't.
speak;Masashi;There, see? My bow and arrows on the ground.
speak;Felicity;At any rate, since you so kindly surrendered,|I'll have Her Highness decide what to do with you.
speak;Masashi;The Medean princess herself? This is my lucky day!

name: TalkKristaMasashi
_source: speak;Krista;Alright, I really hate to do this, but you gotta go down!
speak;Masashi;Oh, how I would hate to see the look on your princess' face|when she sees her loyal soldiers fall by my hand.
speak;Masashi;What's the matter? Nerves getting to you?
speak;Masashi;To think that the Medean princess has such cowardly forces amongst her ranks{tgm}...{tgm}|How laughable!
speak;Krista;Yeah, sorry to burst your bubble there, but it's true.
speak;Masashi;There's no way that can be true!|How can a noblewoman such as yourself be so{tgm}...{tgm} So{tgm}...!
speak;Krista;You'd better be careful with your next words there.|I have a sword and I'm not afraid to use it.
speak;Masashi;So uncouth! So unrefined! How dare you call yourself royalty?!|Why, no man with any self-respect would ever consider marrying--
speak;Krista;Get up.|We're taking you prisoner, then we'll decide what to do with you from there.
speak;Krista;I could easily change my mind.

name: TalkKristaEcco
_source: speak;Ecco;Yes, you. Looks like you and your friends need a hand.
speak;Krista;If you're willing to help, be my guest.
speak;Ecco;Perfect! My friend Anil and I will assist in any way we can.
speak;Ecco;Just promise you'll give us proper compensation later.

name: SpawnEccoAnil
_source: speak;Ecco;Pretty good job today, wouldn't you say, Anil?
speak;Ecco;Wouldn't it be great if we got hired again?
speak;Ecco;Maybe by someone rich? Maybe even royalty?
speak;Anil;*points eastward*|[Stay focused, Ecco.]|[There's something going on over there.]
speak;Ecco;Oh, looks like those guys need help!|Come on, Anil. Let's go!

name: SpawnFelicityViola
_source: speak;Viola;We'd better stop here for the night.|It's getting way too dark for me to see.

speak;Felicity;No worries. Now, let's see{tgm}...{tgm}|If Her Highness and the others weren't at Windbrook when we got there,|then that means they're probably around here still on their way to Lake Lunaris.
speak;Felicity;Yeah, sounds like trouble.|And where trouble is, Princess Krista's gonna be there.|Let's go, Viola!

name: SpawnTaylorAlexLucy
_source: speak;Taylor;According to Chell's message, Her Highness and the rest should be around here.|But all I see are a bunch of bandits!|What do you think, Alex?
speak;Alex;Yes, it is strange. However, we should still investigate.|There is a chance that they're here.
speak;Lucy;Come on, let's go!!{br}They might be in danger.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Krista;I get it now.|Foliaga's leader, Archbishop Azalea, is acting shady.|And you guys fled because things were getting dangerous.
speak;Semi;Foliaga's citizens are disappearing. It started with just prisoners.
speak;Semi;Next thing everyone knew, the common folk started to go.
speak;Semi;Then it was members of the church.|There's no way Azalea would ignore something like that. Something's up.
speak;Forrest;If you were actually staying awake during your history lessons,|you would have had some idea who these two were talking about, Your Highness.
speak;Krista;I blame that on lessons being too early in the morning.
speak;Sam;I see you guys are settling in nicely.
speak;Aqua;Why, yes.|Thank you for your hospitality.
speak;Sam;No problem.|Oh, you guys probably need more weapons, right?|I got a lot of stuff from the bandit hideouts I've raided.|So, here!
speak;Forrest;Just how many bandit hideouts have you raided?
speak;Sam;I dunno.|Lost count after the first twenty.
speak;Sam;Now, where is that old thing{tgm}...?
speak;Krista;Well, I'm ready to turn in for the night.
speak;Krista;Wake me up if something happens.
speak;Alfonso;We've got 'em surrounded, boys! Get 'em!|And keep the Prowling Tiger alive. I want to deal with him myself!
speak;Krista;I didn't even close my eyes yet.
speak;Kai;Bandits are surrounding the premises.|We need to act now!

speak;Sam;Without torches, there's no way they'll be able to keep up their attack during the night.|We'll have to keep 'em at bay for a bit until then.|Even taking down their boss will get them to panic and retreat.|And don't let too many of them get inside.|I need a house to come back to once this is all over!

name: FightIwo
_source: speak;Iwo;What?!{br}How did you get in here?!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightAlfonso
_source: speak;Alfonso;How did you get through my men?|Dammit, I'll take care of you myself!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightAlfonsoSam
_source: speak;Alfonso;The Prowling Tiger{tgm}...{tgm}{br}So we finally meet.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Sam;What are you going on about?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Sam;Not like I even care right now.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Sam;You wrecked my cabin!{br}I'm taking you down!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: Credits
_source: credits;Custom Spell Animations;7743,Aegius,Alusq,Beansy,Final Fantasy V,Mikey_Seregon,Orihara Saki,Scraiza,SHYUTERz,St jack,Struedelmuffin,Thunder_Mage
credits;Tilesets;FEAW,Flasuban,N426,Venno,ZoramineFae,Final Fantasy I GBA,Final Fantasy V GBA,Harvest Moon More Friends of Mineral Town

credits;Music;FE Genealogy of the Holy War,FE Thracia 776,FE Blazing Sword,FE Sacred Stones,FE Fates,Magical Starsign,Paper Mario,Phoenix Wright Ace Attorney,Phoenix Wright Ace Attorney Dual Destinies,Pokemon Conquest,Pokemon Mystery Dungeon Explorers of the Sky,Pokemon Ruby Sapphire Emerald,Super Smash Bros Melee,Viewtiful Joe Red Hot Rumble,Koichi Morita,Noru,Pedro Silva,PeriTune,presence of music,shimtone,TAKAO Masaki

credits;;Fire Emblem Cycle of Remorse is a non-profit fangame, released for free, and developed using Python, Pygame, and the Lex Talionis engine. Many assets are copyrighted or trademarked by their respective owners.;wait;center;no_split

name: Visit
_source: speak;Man1;Hey, I don't know what you're all doing out there,|but you don't wanna stick around for too long.|Not with the Knights around.|It's gonna get dark soon, so take this and get out of here!
speak;Woman1;The Holy Knights are known to don heavy armor.|Weapons like this Hammer should get through it easily. Please take it.
speak;Woman2;You were outside standing guard? I thank you for your kindness.
speak;Woman2;What happened to that Knight outside the door?|Did you take care of him?|Thank you very much.
speak;Woman2;What is happening outside? It doesn't sound good.
speak;Woman2;Please take this. It may help you.
speak;Man2;The Holy Knights{tgm}...{tgm} They weren't always like this.|They protected everyone and only arrested criminals.|What could have changed?
speak;Woman1;Excuse me, sorry to bother you.|I found this on the ground the other day.|Could you please return it to its owner?
speak;Man3;Are you here to drive the Knights off?|I see! Please take this with you, then.{br}It may help.|It may not be a weapon, but it can make you stronger.
speak;;A new Guide entry has been added.{br}<red>(Secret Shops)</>;center;;hint;;;;;3;no_sound

name: Visit
_source: speak;Haruki;Taichi, guess what?|There's a bunch of people out there who're fighting the bandits!
speak;Haruki;Yeah! They're here to help us.|Come on, Taichi! You wanna help too, don't you?
speak;Haruki;And what about everyone else?|If you get out there, you can save everyone and Ma!
speak;Taichi;But you better promise me you won't die out there.
speak;Taichi;Huh? Haruki's with you guys? If that's the case, I want in too!
speak;Taichi;Ohh{tgm}...{tgm} Haruki, you idiot!|That does it. I'm going out there too!
speak;Taichi;I'm not letting him off easy, running off like that.
speak;OldMan1;Pirates were always a problem here,|but it seems their raids have gotten worse for the past few months.|Oh, Emperor Samegoro, why do you refuse to act{tgm}...?

speak;Woman2;Y'know, I've been hearing things through the grapevine about the emperor.|Now, I'm not saying that new shogun he appointed has been causing trouble, but{tgm}...{tgm}|Her showin' up outta the blue and the emperor keepin' his mouth shut|happenin' all at the same time?|It can't be a coincidence!

speak;Man3;I don't know what has gotten into Daigo and his men. They seem more{tgm}...{tgm} organized?|They actually plan out their raids now and get us when we least expect it.|I sure hope the other villages in Aotani will be alright.

name: Visit
_source: speak;OldWoman1;What are pirates like them doing all the way out here?|Please, young one, help us! Take this too. It may help.
speak;Tsurugi;Oh, you're back! I was wondering when you'd--
speak;Tsurugi;A-Ah, sorry, I thought you were someone else.
speak;Man2;Go away, you scoundrel!|You lot are unwelcome here! Leave!!

name: Visit
_source: speak;Man5;What's that? You're on the run from the Holy Knights?|No one can catch a break these days, huh?|Hey, you didn't hear this from me, but there's a chance the Knights are gonna try to close|the inner town gates on you.|Take this Door Key with you to open them.
speak;Woman3;Have you seen the fights at the local arena?|There's this one swordsman there who's very strong.|He came here from some far-off land and has been undefeated ever since.
speak;Woman3;Ah{tgm}...{tgm} he's so muscular and handsome and{tgm}...
speak;Woman3;Wait, it's you! Oh my{tgm}...{tgm}|P-Please forget I said anything!!|Just take this, please! I'm a big fan!!
speak;Woman3;S-Sorry, I've said too much.|I apologize for rambling like that{tgm}...{tgm}|Please just take this and forget I said anything.
speak;Man1;You seem strong. Have you tried fighting at the arena?|It's a great way to make money! As long as you don't die, that is.|If you've got money to spare, you should give it a try. Good luck!
speak;OldWoman1;I may not look it, but I was one of the best Knights Foliaga had, you know.|My age has gotten to me, so you can have this.|I have no need for it anymore.
speak;Marina;Hi, Jake. Hope you didn't worry about me too much.
speak;Jake;Well, I sure did!|You could've gotten real hurt. Or worse!
speak;Marina;I'm here now in once piece, aren't I? And guess what?|I met some kind people who will take care of the Knights.
speak;Marina;Mm-hmm. I'm going to help them out too.
speak;Jake;You don't say?|If that's the case, don't push yourself too hard, alright?
speak;Marina;Of course. You take care now, Jake.|I'll see you around?
speak;Jake;Man, I sure hope Miss Marina's alright{tgm}...{tgm}|I'd hate for something bad to happen.
speak;Jake;She's the best barmaid I know! Quite the performer too.
speak;Jake;The way she dances is so{tgm}...
speak;Jake;Wh-What's that look for? I'm not interested in her like that!|I'm in a loving, committed relationship already, thank you very much!!

name: Visit
_source: speak;OldMan1;You there, young one!|Are you here to do away with Shigeo and his men?|Then take this! It may be small,|but some protection is better than none at all.
speak;Altena;These other wyvern riders{tgm}...{tgm} It would be best if I waited to depart.|I would not want to be mistaken as a member of their group.
speak;Sam;Whoa! You're that wyvern rider I saw!
speak;Sam;You're not with these bandits, right?
speak;Sam;Great! Hey, wanna join forces?|I get the feeling you don't wanna be lumped together with these chumps.
speak;Altena;I{tgm}...{tgm} That is exactly why I'm staying put.
speak;Sam;Well, you don't have to be a sitting duck anymore.|Fight with us, and there'll be no question you're with the good guys!|Let's go!
speak;Sam;Oh! What was your name again?
speak;Sam;Altena! Name's Sam. Okay, NOW let's go!
speak;Altena;I will wait here until things have calmed down.
speak;{unit};Hm? Wasn't someone here just now?
speak;Woman1;This is terrible! Please, won't you help us?|Take this with you. It was my father's, but he's no longer with us.|I'm sure you could get more use out of it than I would.

speak;OldWoman1;Oh, these old bones aren't what they used to be{tgm}...{tgm}|Why, if I were twenty years younger,|I'd be out there shooting down those darn wyvern riders myself!|Here, kiddo, you can take this old bow of mine for yourself.|Goodness knows I won't be able to draw back its string like I used to.
speak;Man3;Wyverns aren't all that common around these parts.|You usually see them more in southern Merinas.
speak;Man3;I've read that most wyverns are descendants of Folia,|so you see more of them as you get closer to there.
speak;Man3;With them being cold-blooded,|a good chunk of them migrated to Fuegsol and stayed there ever since!
speak;Man3;And because of their change in environment,|Folian wyverns and Fuegan wyverns differ biologically. For example{tgm}...

name: Visit
_source: speak;Man2;I don't understand. Why must we be kept indoors like this?|Just what is going on out there?
speak;Girl1;Oh, can we go outside again?|Not yet? Aw{tgm}...{tgm} Okay.|Hey, since you're here, do you want this pretty rock I found?|Here you go!
speak;Man1;Psst. Hey, you. I know what you guys are trying to do.|I've been hearing things. Take this with ya.|Don't ask where I got it from.
speak;Woman3;I was just out shopping when the imperial army came and|told us to stay indoors.|They said the Medeans were coming, but beyond that, nothing else.|I hope this ends soon{tgm}...

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Steel Sword,Iron Blade,Steel Lance,Javelin,Steel Axe,Hand Axe,Steel Bow;armory

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Killing Edge,Steel Blade,Killer Lance,Killer Axe,Killer Bow;armory

name: Intro
_source: if;game.check_alive('Trevor') == True and game.check_alive('Chell') == True and game.check_alive('Sam') == True and game.check_alive('Taylor') == True and game.check_alive('Alex') == True and game.check_alive('Lucy') == True and game.get_unit('Ecco').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Ecco') == True and  game.get_unit('Anil').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Anil') == True and game.get_unit('Michael').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Michael') == True
if;game.get_unit('Michael').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Michael') == True and game.get_unit('Ecco').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Ecco') == True
speak;Krista;So, the Archbishop's using the Holy Knights to kidnap people, huh?|Just how many of them are there?
speak;Aqua;Foliaga has many Knights overseeing different regions of the nation.|It would be difficult to find a settlement that doesn't have|at least a Knight or two stationed there.
speak;Forrest;Perhaps we should re-think our approach, then.|It would be unwise to keep fighting off the Holy Knights left and right.

speak;Kai;Still, we can't be trekking through woods forever. That'll take up too much time.|Not to mention we need to stock up on supplies whenever we can.|Let's stick with the original plan for now.|The Knights will more than likely not know about what happened in Windbrook yet.|As long as we keep our heads low, we shouldn't arouse suspiscion.
speak;Krista;Sounds good to me. Let's turn in for the night.|We've gotta keep our energy up.
speak;SoldierGreen;General Adler, sir! We have located the Medean force's camp.
speak;Adler;Good work, men. Surround their camp and prepare to ambush them.|Report back here once they have been terminated.
speak;Krista;Forrest, I swear by Medea, if you're gonna say we're under attack, I will scream.
speak;Krista;Wake everyone up. I dunno who's out there, but let's make this quick.

name: Intro
_source: if;game.get_unit('Ecco').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Ecco') == True and game.check_alive('Viola') == True
speak;Krista;Wow, it's really pretty here! And look at that lake!|I would love to sightsee for a bit.
speak;Forrest;We can't stay here for too long.|We need to gather supplies and leave as soon as possible.|Who knows if the Knights stationed here already know about us.
speak;Krista;But, yeah. You're right. I'd hate to run into the Knights again.
speak;Krista;Everyone, let's split up and grab everything we need!|And once we're done, we'll meet back here and get moving.
speak;Forrest;Everyone is accounted for, Your Highness.
speak;Krista;You've got to be kidding me.
speak;Lorelei;Princess of Medeas!|By order of Archbishop Azalea, you are to surrender at once!
speak;Krista;The town's northern gate is just up ahead.|Let's get outta here, guys!
speak;Jake;Thanks for the drink, Miss Marina.
speak;Marina;Of course, Jake! Stay safe when you leave town again, you hear?
speak;Marina;Say, do you hear all that commotion outside?
speak;Jake;Oh man, do you think it's the Holy Knights again?
speak;Marina;Ugh, I'm sick and tired of this!
speak;Marina;I'm going out there and giving those Knights a piece of my mind!
speak;Jake;What!? Miss Marina, wait!|It's too dangerous!
speak;Marina;Oh my{tgm}...{tgm} There's a lot more of them than I thought there would be.
speak;Marina;Hm? Who are those people over there? Are they fighting off the Knights?|Maybe they can help!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Krista;Here? In the middle of nowhere?
speak;Jake;It didn't used to be like this.|It was a humble village before the Holy Knights raided it.|Now it's nothing more than a military base.
speak;Krista;Woah{tgm}...{tgm} That all happened a year ago?
speak;Jake;I just hope the villagers are okay.|We don't really know where they ran off to.
speak;Jake;If the Knights didn't capture them, that is.
speak;Anna;That's why we're doing this.|Not only will we have a place to sell our wares again,|but Hache Valley's citizens will have a home to return to as well.
speak;Krista;Me and my friends will do our best to help!
speak;Anna;So, here's the plan: we'll seize each of the forts in the valley.
speak;Anna;Once we claim the forts, there's no doubt in my mind the Knights will turn tail.|Let's do this!
speak;SoldierGreen;Captain Daphne! We have an emergency!|Intruders are approaching from the south!
speak;Daphne;What?! Who dares to set foot here?
speak;SoldierGreen;The Medean princess and two merchants, Captain.
speak;Daphne;Two merchants, you say? So, they came back{tgm}...
speak;Daphne;Defend the forts! We cannot let them take this base!
speak;Krista;Looks like they've got some big guys defending the forts.|Be careful, everyone!

name: Intro
_source: if;game.check_alive('Anil') == True and game.get_unit('Anil').team == 'player' and game.get_unit('Jake').team == 'player'
speak;Kai;Alright, Mossgrove is just ahead.|With the Holy Knights hunting us down, we should figure out how to get in without|getting caught.
speak;Krista;I say we make sure Aqua gets in town safely first.|She's key to getting us to Oakenfaire, after all.|Of course, if that's okay with you, Aqua.
speak;Aqua;I can do that, Your Highness.|I'll do my best!
speak;Semi;Let me go in with her.|If one of the Knights recognizes her, I'll be there to get her out just in case.|Otherwise, I'll report back when Aqua finds a way in.
speak;Krista;Good idea. Be careful, you two!
speak;Kai;Let's hope they make it back alright.
speak;Krista;Think a few of us can sneak into the city and try to do one last shopping trip?|I got a feeling we won't be able to get more stuff once we reach the capital.
speak;Kai;It's risky, but you have a point.|Let's try not to draw attention to ourselves while we're there.
speak;Semi;A couple of Knights were also willing to help us find a better route to the capital.
speak;Krista;Nice! Time to move out, everyone!|Semi, lead the way.
speak;Aqua;Thank you, Your Highness. Now that we're here{tgm}...
speak;Aqua;There are many exits to Foliaga's other major cities.|The one to Oakenfaire specifically is{tgm}...
speak;Krista;That's quite a way's away.{br}Let's be careful, guys.
speak;Vernon;How did the Medeans know about this tunnel?|Oh, it doesn't matter now.
speak;Vernon;Just as we suspected, the Medeans are using the tunnels to reach Her Excellency.
speak;Vernon;I shall not let them get past me!|For Her Excellency! For Foliaga!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Krista;Now that we're here, let's figure out where the Grand Temple of Folia is.
speak;Semi;It couldn't possibly be that big important building over there.
speak;Krista;Good eye! As long as one off us secures the entrance, we can get inside.|Let's move out!
speak;Celeste;Finally made it. Those Knights won't know what's coming to them!
speak;Celeste;Don't worry, Michael. Celeste's here to save you from those nasty Knights!
speak;Celeste;Oh, no! There's Knights under mind-control magic here too?|Let's see{tgm}...{tgm} there's gotta be something here that's acting as the magic's source{tgm}...{tgm}|There!
speak;Celeste;Just gotta destroy those gems on those walls!
speak;Celeste;Oh, Michael{tgm}...{tgm} I hope I'm not too late.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Krista;Y'know, I expected a lot of things in terms of the temple's architecture,|but I definitely wasn't expecting this.
speak;Aqua;Folia presides over the forests,|so it's only natural his main temple integrates itself with them.
speak;Kai;It may be difficult to navigate through here because of that.|Keep your sense of direction, everyone.
speak;SoldierGreen;Your Excellency! Lord Ferrach!|The Medean forces have breached the temple!
speak;Ferrach;Protect the inner chamber. No harm must come to Her Excellency.
speak;Ferrach;Medea and his allies, Lord Folia.
speak;Ferrach;Yes, yes. You remember him, don't you?
speak;Ferrach;That ungrateful little whelp who did nothing but betray you?
speak;Ferrach;Show him no mercy, milord. Do it for Father.
speak;Krista;Figures they wouldn't make this easy for us.|Come on, everyone! To the Archbishop!

name: Intro
_source: if;game.check_alive('Chell') == True and game.check_alive('Sam') == True and {v:ChellSamBase} == 1
speak;Soromir;Ferrach has been out longer than anticipated.
speak;Soromir;Could Medea's accursed spawn really have bested him?
speak;Agrona;We must have faith in him, Lady Soromir.|He is no weak man.
speak;Milo;Like you would ever speak ill of him in the first place.
speak;Ferrach;Sorry, love. Didn't mean to cause any worry.
speak;Ferrach;And I apologize for my tardiness, Lady Soromir.|There were{tgm}...{tgm} complications.
speak;Ferrach;We may have underestimated Medea's ilk.|She's freed Folia's child from his influence.
speak;Soromir;A disappointing outcome, but not a completely unexpected one either.
speak;Soromir;If things did not happen the way they did one year ago,|perhaps our plans could have actually aligned.
speak;Agrona;If SOMEONE put more thought into his targets,|we wouldn't be in this situation in the first place.
speak;Milo;Hey, hey, hey!|How was I supposed to know Fueg's kid was gonna get offed like that?!
speak;Soromir;You three return to your posts and await further instructions.
speak;Soromir;What is Medea's child's next course of action?
speak;Ferrach;She and her allies are returning to Medeas to plan their next move.|Shall I keep an eye on them for you, my lady?
speak;Soromir;Yes. Report back with your findings.
speak;Soromir;Medea{tgm}...{tgm} Do you not see what you've wraught?|Countless milennia of suffering by your hand just to come to this?
speak;Soromir;Your reign shall end soon. Just you wait.
speak;Krista;Mother! Father! You won't believe this. There was--
speak;Thalia;Political turmoil in Foliaga in which you let yourself get involved.|Yes, we were aware of that.
speak;Bryant;Your mother and I were to take care of the situation ourselves,|but you had already run off before we could.

speak;Bryant;Krista, we know that it is the Medean royal family's duty|to uphold peace amongst Yondo's nations.|And I am glad you take that to heart.|However, you cannot just insert yourself into another nation's internal conflicts.|Especially not without consulting us first.
speak;Thalia;You are still young and learning how to be a proper ruler, Krista.|Although Archbishop Azalea has been subdued,|there are things beyond that that we'll need to assist Foliaga with.
speak;Krista;But it's not just Foliaga. The other nations need help too!
speak;Bryant;And we are aware of that as well.|These are trying times, Krista.|We must plan ahead for each nation's future.
speak;Forrest;May I speak on Her Highness' behalf, Your Majesty?
speak;Forrest;I would like to make a proposition.
speak;Forrest;You and Queen Thalia will have your hands full assisting Foliaga, correct?

speak;Forrest;Then, I implore you to let Her Highness take care of the other conflicts in Yondo.|By the time you are done lending aid to Foliaga, then there is a chance|Princess Krista will be through stabalizing another nation's condition.|Stablize it enough for you to step in and lend aid to them, even.
speak;Thalia;This would allow us to send more resources to Foliaga.|And it would give us more time to thouroughly plan how to aid the rest of the continent.
speak;Bryant;Those are good points.|I shall allow this then, Sir Forrest.
speak;Bryant;Krista, before you decide on what to do next,|I advise you to invite your cousin Parker to your strategy meeting.|He is currently visiting the castle.
speak;Bryant;Yes. He is currently in the guest chambers--
speak;Thalia;It's a good thing that was the last thing you had to tell her, dear.
speak;Forrest;I shall go after her, Your Majesty.
speak;Bryant;Before you do, there is one more thing.
speak;Bryant;Thank you for protecting Krista all this time. Keep up the good work.
speak;Forrest;There is no need for thanks. I am only upholding my duties.
speak;Parker;Back from your{tgm}...{tgm} "bandit outing," I see.
speak;Parker;My apprentice. I have taken him on recently.
speak;Krista;Nice to meet you, Cole. So, what's Parker been teaching you?
speak;Krista;Oh, nice!|With Parker as your teacher, you're gonna be the best mage in the world!
speak;Parker;With introductions out of the way, you had other business with me, right?|Something pertaining to what just happened in Foliaga?
speak;Krista;Heh, nothing gets past you, huh?
speak;Krista;But yeah, I'm gonna get a strategy meeting going to decide what to do from here.|Mind sitting in and give your input?
speak;Parker;I do not mind at all.

speak;Krista;Alright, everyone. With Archbishop Azalea down, we've learned a few things.|First off, she didn't act of her own accord. She was being influenced by someone.|Secondly, that someone can use some pretty powerful magic.
speak;Krista;I'm gonna let Kai take over here.|He's got more insight on this next part than I do.
speak;Kai;For context on this next point,|Princess Krista found a strange marking on the Archbishop's neck.|While I do not know what this mark symbolizes, I have seen it before.
speak;Kai;Yes. The same mark was on Emperor Samegoro's body.
speak;Parker;The emperor of Merinas{tgm}...{tgm} That's concerning.
speak;Parker;If what you're saying is true,|then Samegoro is most likely under the same thrall as Azalea was.
speak;Forrest;How would you know about this mark on the emperor's body, Kai?
speak;Kai;I served the emperor for a time.
speak;Kai;With me being a mercenary from Merinas,|is it any surprise that the emperor would choose to hire me sometimes?
speak;Forrest;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} I suppose that makes sense.
speak;Kai;So, yes, I have seen the mark on the emperor's body while under his service.|I{tgm}...{tgm} can't say for sure if his behavior changed recently.|However, I would not be surprised if it has.
speak;Forrest;Was there anyone else under his service marked as well?
speak;Kai;From what I've observed, no. It was just him.
speak;Krista;Well, that settles it! We've got a lead, so I say we head to Merinas first.
speak;Kai;H-Hold on. We should consider our other options first.
speak;Parker;Kai is right.|We must consider how much at risk Fuegsol and Oregot are as well.
speak;Krista;Yeah, I guess you guys have a point.
speak;Forrest;I believe Merinas would still be our best option right now.
speak;Forrest;If we think about this logically,|then it should be obvious why Merinas should be our next destination.
speak;;<red>Tactics Logic</red> is a segment where Krista will need to come to logical conclusions on how to continue the story.;center;200;hint;;;;;3;no_sound
speak;;You will be presented with three choices. Choose the most logical answer of the three!;center;;hint;no_sound
speak;;Answering all questions correctly will give a boost in all stats for the chapter!;center;;hint;fit;no_sound
speak;;That's it for the tutorial. Let's get started!;center;;hint;;;;;3;no_sound
speak;Forrest;We know that both Emperor Samegoro and Archbishop Azalea|were both marked by that strange symbol.|Now, what do both the Emperor and the Archbishop have in common?;bottom
choice;ch11_1;What did they have in common?;They are the same gender.,They are the sole rulers of their nations.,They are the same age.
if;game.game_vars['ch11_1'] == 'They are the sole rulers of their nations.'
speak;Krista;They rule over their respective countries on their own.;bottom
speak;Forrest;We do not know that for sure.;bottom
if;game.game_vars['ch11_1'] != 'They are the sole rulers of their nations.'
speak;Forrest;What I was getting at was that|they are the sole rulers of Merinas and Foliaga, respectively.;bottom

speak;Forrest;With that being said, Oregot has an entire council,|and both King Gerolt and Queen Leeann are ruling Fuegsol together.|And we know that no one other than the emperor and the archbishop were marked.|What can we conclude from this?;bottom
choice;ch11_2;If they were the only ones marked...?;Marks only affect the person they are on.,The marks can spread to other people.,The other rulers will not be affected.
if;game.game_vars['ch11_2'] == 'Marks only affect the person they are on.'
speak;Krista;That the marks can only influence the person they were put on.;bottom
elif;game.game_vars['ch11_2'] == 'The marks can spread to other people.'
speak;Forrest;We have already established that they can't.;bottom
speak;Forrest;While that could be true, we do not know that for sure.;bottom
if;game.game_vars['ch11_2'] != 'Marks only affect the person they are on.'
speak;Forrest;The conclusion I came to was that only one person can be marked at a time.;bottom

speak;Forrest;And if that's the case, then having a marked person be among people who aren't|will pose no advantages to our adversaries.|The mark's influence will not be effective if there is someone there to keep|the marked person in check.;bottom
speak;Krista;That means both Oregot and Fuegsol are probably safe for now.|If one of the rulers there get marked,|the other rulers will make sure they don't try to hurt anyone.;bottom
speak;Forrest;I see that you understand now. Nicely done, Your Highness.;bottom
alert;All deployed units will gain Raised Morale!;;RaisedMorale
speak;Kai;So, Merinas is the best choice for now, is it?
speak;Kai;Just like with our journey to Foliaga,|we'll be heading to Merinas' capital, Edoyama.
speak;Parker;We should start making preparations, then.
speak;Parker;Are you saying you DON'T want my help?
speak;Krista;No, not at all! I just thought you'd be busy with your own things.
speak;Parker;I have my advisors to take care of things while I'm gone.|On top of that, Cole needs some practical experience with using magic.|This would be a good opportunity for him too.
speak;Krista;Well, if you're cool with it, I'm cool with it.
speak;Krista;Glad to have you guys with us, Parker!
speak;Ferrach;Well, well. Looks like they're heading your way, love.|We won't allow ourselves to be at a disadvantage. Not this time.
speak;Krista;Here we are at Port Gildress, everyone!|Mother and Father are letting us use one of their ships to get to Merinas.
speak;BanditFemale1;Just come quietly and no one gets hurt.
speak;Shinobu;Grab every villager you can! Don't leave a single one behind!
speak;Shinobu;Heh, Ryuuji's gonna regret not having me an' these guys on the crew anymore.|If he ain't gonna rake in easy money like this, it's his loss.
speak;Parker;Those flags{tgm}...{tgm} Why are the Wyrmfang Pirates here?
speak;Parker;They're the most infamous pirate crew of Merinas.|But they only keep their raids to Merinas' islands.|To see them here is unusual.
speak;Krista;It doesn't matter if it's weird or not.|We've gotta help the townsfolk!
speak;;In this chapter, the green units will escape to the yellow-roofed houses.;center;;hint
speak;;Player units will be unable to visit them.;center;;hint;;;;;2;no_sound

name: Intro
_source: speak;Krista;As long as we don't have any delays, we should be in Edoyama in no time!
speak;Forrest;There are ships approaching us.|A concerning amount of them.
speak;Parker;It's the Wyrmfang Pirates again.|It seems we haven't dealt with the last of their crew.
speak;Ryuuji;Your ship shall go no further.|Hand over all your valuables, and we will spare your lives.
speak;Taiga;Yeah, you heard the captain. Hand over the gold!|'Cause if ya don't, we ain't gonna let you go that easy!
speak;Krista;Can things go right for us just for once?
speak;Kai;Could that be{tgm}...?{tgm} No, it's impossible. But{tgm}...
speak;Kai;The captain{tgm}...{tgm} I think I know him.
speak;Kai;I can't say for sure, but he looks like someone I know.
speak;Kai;Your Highness, let me talk to him. Please.|Hell, you can even tell him that you know me. I don't care.
speak;Kai;Your Highness, please talk to the captain on my behalf.
speak;Kai;I need to know if it's actually him.
speak;Krista;Sure thing, Kai.|If it's him, do you think you can talk him out of raiding our ship?
speak;Kai;I hope to Merin I can.

name: Intro
_source: if;game.check_alive('Lucy') == True and game.get_unit('Rembrandt').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Rembrandt') == True
speak;Krista;Oh, there's an island over there!
speak;Kai;That should be Isle Aotani.|Home to a few villages nestled in its central mountains.
speak;Forrest;We should stop here to rest and restock on supplies.
speak;OldMan1;Welcome to Aotani Village, dear travelers.|What brings you here?
speak;Krista;Long story short, we've got business at the capital, and we needed a place to stop.
speak;OldMan1;I humbly thank you for choosing to stay in our fair village.|Please make yourselves at home.
speak;Forrest;Before we do, sir, I do have one question.
speak;Forrest;Have you heard anything strange going on with the emperor lately?
speak;OldMan1;Absolutely nothing.|The fact nothing has been said about the emperor|for one whole year is a cause for concern.
speak;Forrest;Could you please elaborate on that?

speak;OldMan1;Emperor Samegoro has always had good relations with the public.|He would send out messangers to every part of Merinas to inform his people on|anything and everything.|To have him so silent is troubling.
speak;Krista;And you said this started a year ago?
speak;Krista;Well, thanks for the info, sir. This was very helpful.
speak;OldMan1;I am happy to be of service.|There is an inn down the road that should be able to accommodate you all.
speak;Forrest;Archbishop Azalea and Emperor Samegoro exhibiting strange behavior|for one whole year{tgm}...
speak;Kai;And Prince Ervan's death was a year ago too, was it not?
speak;Krista;Kai has a point. It could be connected.
speak;Krista;Either way, it's been a long day.|Let's check into the inn and discuss this once we get settled.
speak;Daigo;Just a quiet little village and not a soldier in sight.|Heh, this village is easy pickings. Let's go, boys!|The emperor's gonna pay a pretty penny for every villager, so keep 'em alive!
speak;Krista;We just HAD to run into pirates here too, huh?
speak;Krista;Alright guys, you know the drill.|Protect the villagers and their homes!
speak;Taichi;Ma! What's going on out there?
speak;Woman1;Pirates are attacking the village!|Taichi, Haruki, we have to stay inside no matter what.
speak;Haruki;No way, I'm not gonna sit around and do nothing.|I'm going out there!
speak;Haruki;We can't just let those pirates do whatever they want.|I'm going and you can't stop me!
speak;Taichi;Ma, no! Don't go out there too!
speak;Taichi;I'll stay here and protect you. I promise.
speak;Taichi;Dang it, Haruki{tgm}...{tgm} Don't be stupid out there.;;;thought_bubble
speak;Haruki;If Taichi's not gonna do anything, I will.
speak;Haruki;Just try to get past me, you dumb pirates! I can take you all on!
speak;;In this chapter, visiting houses will not keep enemy units from interacting with them.;center;;hint;fit;no_sound

name: Intro
_source: speak;Krista;Despite all the pirates and bandits, I'd say this trip's been pretty easygoing.
speak;Forrest;I would rather not have to deal with those ruffians, but you do have a point.
speak;Kai;It's been TOO easy, in my opinion.|Knowing Samegoro, he would've sent his forces after us by now.
speak;Forrest;Do you think it has something to do with the the spell the emperor is under?
speak;Kai;I have my theories, but nothing concrete yet.|All I can say is to proceed with caution.
speak;Krista;Man, look at all that fog{tgm}...
speak;Forrest;I suggest we stay put until it clears.
speak;Felicity;Multiple ships are approaching us. Stay alert, Your Highness.
speak;Keisha;Well, would you look at that. It's a royal Medean ship!|This must be the one the emperor's shogun was talking about, huh, Locke?
speak;Locke;It most likely is, Keisha. However, we must proceed with caution.|Don't forget this may be the Medean princess's army.|They were able to subdue Foliaga's archbishop.

speak;Keisha;Yeah, but if we take 'em down, we'll be rich and famous!|Think about it, Locke. The emperor has the biggest bounty on their heads.|Once we capture them and bring them to the capital,|we'll be known as the biggest, baddest crew of the northern seas!
speak;Locke;Just don't get in over your head, Keisha.
speak;BanditFemale2;Hey, you! I'm gonna see what's going on.|Now, be a good prisoner and don't try anything funny, you hear me?
speak;Azure;Oh, I wouldn't dream of it.
speak;Marina;It's not as if I can do anything in the first place.
speak;Azure;She's finally gone. Perhaps I can find a way to escape in peace.
speak;Azure;She left her key behind. How convenient. Now, then{tgm}...
speak;Azure;There we go! Time to make my leave.
speak;Marina;Good. She's gone. Maybe now I can find a way out of here.
speak;Marina;Oh, my. Now isn't that unfortunate for her. She left her key behind.
speak;Marina;I'm sure she won't mind if I borrow it for a little while.
speak;Marina;Good. Time to get out of here.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Forrest;Ugh{tgm}...{tgm} Your Highness, can we please not do this bit right now?
speak;Krista;Haha! I knew you'd respond to my lame joke! Are you alright?
speak;Forrest;Medea, I'm ready to go. Take me to the other side.
speak;Krista;Come on, up and at 'em! We need to find the others!
speak;Forrest;It may be news to you, but we just got shipwrecked not too long ago.
speak;Krista;And that's why we need to act fast! Let's go!
speak;Kai;A bit scuffed here and there, but we all survived.
speak;Felicity;This was nothing. I've dealt with worse.
speak;Parker;Unfortunately, our ship wasn't so lucky.
speak;Krista;So you're saying all that driftwood ISN'T a natural occurence?
speak;Parker;Thankfully, the ship is salvagable.|It would just need some work to get it afloat again.
speak;Felicity;Thankfully, there seems to be enough supplies that|drifted ashore to do the repairs.
speak;Krista;Oh, nice! Let's gather everything up and get to work!
speak;Yuma;These must be the Medeans the emperor has been talking about.
speak;Yuma;And would you look at that. They're completely shipwrecked!|This'll be an easy job.
speak;Yuma;Everyone, come out! We've got a bounty to collect!
speak;Krista;Oh, Medea, you've gotta be kidding me.
speak;Parker;We have to salvage as much of our supplies as we can.|If those ruffians destroy everything we have, we may be stranded here.
speak;Krista;Got it. Let's gather up everything and get them all to one area.
speak;Rembrandt;Finally made it. Now, are there any survivors from the wreck{tgm}...?
speak;Rembrandt;Good. It seems like there are.
speak;Rembrandt;But those bandits will give them trouble if I don't do something.|I must get to them quickly!
speak;;For this chapter, you will get rewards based on how many crates end up on the drop-off point.;;;hint;no_sound

name: Intro
_source: if;game.check_alive('Sam') == True and game.check_alive('Taylor') and True and game.get_unit('Joshua').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Joshua') == True

if;game.check_alive('Lucy') == True and game.check_alive('Cole') == True and game.get_unit('Michael').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Michael') == True and game.get_unit('Celeste').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Celeste') == True and game.get_unit('Haruki').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Haruki') == True
loop_units;[u for u in game.level.units];15 GiveTileTag
speak;Krista;This has gotta be the liveliest town we've been in so far.
speak;Kai;Well, Gintoki City is the most populated settlement in Merinas.|Other than Edoyama, of course.
speak;Kai;However, it is more lively than usual.
speak;Kai;Considering the time of year, then it must mean--
speak;Yumi;My, my, aren't you a burly bunch!
speak;Yumi;Welcome to Gintoki City! Y'all here for the Fortitude Festival, I assume?

speak;Yumi;Yes, the Fortitude Festival!|Every year, the biggest, toughest fighters across the world gather in Gintoki|to show off their strength.|The biggest event is the Rooms of Valor tournament held at the local arena.|Twenty-six of the strongest fighters go head-to-head in one-and-one battles.|Cash prizes go out to the winners too!
speak;Krista;Oh, sounds fun! We're totally in, right guys?
speak;Forrest;Your Highness, we shouldn't waste our time on such diversions.
speak;Yumi;Aw, don't be such a party pooper!|The tournament would really be a spectacle if a handsome knight like you participated.
speak;Krista;She has a point. You are pretty handsome.
speak;Kai;You are easy on the eyes, can't deny that.
speak;Forrest;Considering we are spending the night here,|I suppose participating in this festival won't be a bad idea.|More money would mean a bigger budget to work with for the rest of our journey.
speak;Krista;In other words, we're definitely in!
speak;Yumi;Great! See y'all at the arena!
speak;Forrest;Dear Medea, what have we gotten ourselves into?
speak;Krista;After all we've gone through lately, I think we deserve a breather.|Let's give Gintoki City a good show!
speak;Kai;Don't forget to strut your stuff, Forrest.
speak;;Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the 53rd annual Fortitude Festival!;bottom;;;;;;;;;None
speak;;Twenty-six fighters from all over the continent have come to|show their might in this year's Rooms of Valor tournament!|Let's give them all a hand!;bottom;;;;;;;;;None
speak;;All fighters are now in position. Let's begin!;bottom;;;;;;;;;None
speak;Yumi;Alright, everyone! Let's have a nice clean fight.|And don't forget to have fun with it, okay~?
speak;;For this chapter, the following conditions will be in place:;;;hint;;;;;3;no_sound
speak;;Units unable to fight <red>cannot</red> be deployed.;;;hint;;;;;2;no_sound
speak;;You will <red>earn money</red> based on the level difference between your unit and their opponent.;;;hint;no_sound
speak;;Units will <red>not be able to access the convoy</red> during the battle.;;;hint;;;;;3;no_sound
speak;;Any units that fall <red>will revive</red> at the end of the chapter.;;;hint;;;;;3;no_sound
speak;;If you have <red>less than 13 units</red> to deploy, <red>generic green units</red> will spawn on any empty deployment spaces.;;200;hint;;;;;3;no_sound

name: Intro
_source: speak;Krista;So, Kai, that one village is just down the road from here, right?
speak;Kai;Yup, Ikezora Village. It's the only place for miles.|And not many people pass through there since it's|smack dab in the middle of this mountain range.
speak;Krista;So that means less of a chance to deal with bandits and pirates!|Let's keep going.
speak;Forrest;I wouldn't have your hopes up, Your Highness.|Look!
speak;Krista;I really don't wanna fight our way through just to get to the village,|but looks like we're gonna have to.
speak;Kai;That just might be easier than you think, Princess.|Looks like the thugs got their attention on something else.
speak;Lin;N-No{tgm}...{tgm} We're completely surrounded. Damn it!
speak;Bandit3;Just give up the goods, and we'll let ya go.
speak;Bandit3;Hell, it's better than the alternative. LOADS better.
speak;Tsurugi;But, Miss Lin, what about you?
speak;Lin;Ikezora Village is just ahead. Just go! I'll fend them off!
speak;Lin;You stupid bandits wanna hurt my client?|You gotta go through me first!
speak;Tsurugi;There's too many of them out here. She can't take them all on at once!
speak;Krista;Huh? Wait, up in the sky! Isn't that{tgm}...?
speak;Forrest;Lin was one of the royal army's Pegasus Knights.|She vanished without a trace years ago.
speak;Krista;Is this where she's been all this time?
speak;Krista;Oh, never mind! We gotta help her!

name: Intro
_source: if;game.get_unit('Lin').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Lin') == True and game.check_alive('Chell') == True and game.check_alive('Viola') == True
speak;Krista;Things are more dicey than we thought.
speak;Krista;Emperor Samegoro's in too deep with the enemy.
speak;Felicity;Indeed. He enlisted the aid of brigands and pirates, after all.|With the number of ruffians we've faced,|we may as well be facing off against the Merinese army itself.
speak;Forrest;If we could get one step ahead of them,|we wouldn't keep getting slowed down by enemy forces.
speak;Kai;While not an ideal way of going about things, I do have an idea.

speak;Kai;We'll head for Fort Daijima.|It's a military outpost on a large island east of Edoyama.|We can get info on the Emperor's forces, weak points in his castle's defenses,|and maybe even get some clues about who's pulling his strings.
speak;Kai;With it being the closest outpost to the castle, it's also gonna be the most fortified.|While it's gonna be the best source of info, we gotta be careful about our approach.
speak;Kai;We approach it from an unexpected angle, of course.
speak;Kai;Instead of dropping anchor onto the island directly from its east side,|we'll approach it from the northern shore.
speak;Felicity;I see. There's no other settlements towards the north,|so why would they expect any ships coming from that direction?
speak;Kai;This would mean we'd add another day or so to our estimated time of arrival to Edoyama.
speak;Forrest;A sacrifice we must be willing to make in order to get the upperhand.
speak;Krista;Yeah, agreed. We'll set sail tomorrow!
speak;Krista;So, everyone have a good rest?
speak;Forrest;It seems so, Your Highness.|We will set sail once we've done any last minute preparations.
speak;Shigeo;Yes, just as reported, the Medean forces are right in Ikezora Village.|Wailing Zephyrs! Move out and capture them!
speak;Krista;It's a bunch of wyvern riders like Felicity said.|And a bunch of other bandits too!|Come on, everyone, let's take 'em down and get outta here!
speak;Krista;Aw, shoot! We gotta fend them off. Let's go, everyone!

speak;Khalid;Yeesh, what's with all these bandits here?|I know that Merinas has been having an issue with them,|but this is way more than I expected.|They're just gonna make looking for Krista harder than it should.
speak;Reem;Your Highness, look! There's a Medean royal ship docked at that port.
speak;Khalid;Good eye, Reem! That means we finally caught up to her.|How's about we get these bandits outta her hair?

name: Intro
_source: speak;Anna;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} It's been too quiet out here.
speak;Jake;Yeah, real suspicious.|We'd have the Riptide Pirates all over our ships by now.
speak;Krista;Maybe they got scared when they saw a royal Medean vessel coming this way.
