speak;Anna;That's a nice thought, but that doesn't exactly solve the problem.
speak;Anna;We need to get rid of those guys so everyone can use this sea route safely.
speak;Krista;Why don't we just drop anchor here, then?|We can just let them come to us!
speak;Anna;Whoa there! Are you sure that's a good idea?
speak;Krista;Anna, you've got a more than capable crew at your disposal here.|We can take on whatever comes at us no problem!
speak;Saburo;I thought that ship looked familiar.
speak;Saburo;You merchants ain't too smart comin' here again.
speak;Saburo;If you ain't gonna hand over your goods, me an' the boys got no choice.
speak;Jake;That does it. Those guys are gonna pay!
speak;Anna;Your Highness, we have to make sure those pirates don't destroy|any of our crates of merchandise during all this.|If they all get busted, there's no point in continuing here.
speak;Jake;I took the time to get some ballistae mounted on our ships too!
speak;Jake;I made them super easy to operate, so anyone can use them!|And we've got enchanted ammo for any magic casters on board.|You just gotta walk up to them and <red>Use</> them. Easy!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Krista;Well, the inn's just ahead! Let's get checked in and rest up.

speak;OldMan2;Greetings travelers. I am the mayor of Shizukawa Village.|Under normal circumstances, I would give a warmer welcome.|I apologize for what I'm about to say,|but I would advise taking respite elsewhere.
speak;OldMan2;You see, the women of our village are being stolen away in the night.|Witnesses say that a ghost is responsible.
speak;OldMan2;That is what the men in town have claimed.
speak;Krista;No offense, sir, but ghosts don't exist.
speak;Krista;But, that doesn't mean the problem doesn't either.|What did this "ghost" look like?
speak;OldMan2;She had hair as dark as night and skin as white as snow.|It's also said that she has underlings that come with her to assist in the abductions.
speak;Krista;And to be honest, it just sounds like a local bandit group causing trouble.
speak;Krista;And that gives me a great idea!
speak;Forrest;Your Highness, don't you dare say--
speak;Krista;Tonight, I'm gonna let myself get kidnapped by this so-called ghost!

speak;Krista;Forrest, think about it!|If that ghost and her flunkies are going after women,|that makes me an easy target, right?|I can infiltrate and take them down from the inside.|Then you and the rest of the group can come in for back up!
speak;Forrest;I realize that. However, does the bait have to be you specifically?
speak;Krista;Obviously! I have a talent for purposefully getting kidnapped, after all.
speak;Forrest;That isn't something to be proud of.
speak;OldMan2;That is very brave of you, young lady.|Why, I applaud your courage! Please proceed with your plan.|Anything to return our citizens home.
speak;OldMan2;I thank you again for your assistance.|May I please ask your name, young lady?
speak;Krista;I'm Krista, princess of Medeas. Nice to meet you!
speak;OldMan2;The{tgm}...{tgm} princess of Medeas, you say?|Ahem, yes, thank you again, Your Highness.
speak;Krista;It's pretty dark out now.|Wonder when that ghost is gonna show up?
speak;Bandit2;Alright, you. Come quietly and I won't have to hurt you.
speak;Krista;I expected a woman, but I can improvise.
speak;Krista;Oh no, whatever shall I do~?
speak;Bandit2;You are WAY too happy about this.
speak;Forrest;Her Highness is in the enemies' clutches. Time to move!
speak;Forrest;Krista{tgm}...{tgm} Don't get in over your head.
speak;Bandit2;Now, all of you just sit quietly and don't cause a ruckus.|I'm gonna let the boss know about our haul.
speak;Woman3;This is terrible! What are they going to do with us?
speak;Krista;Hey, don't sweat it.|I can get us outta here before they have a chance to do anything.
speak;Woman3;What? How? Those thugs tied us up so tightly.
speak;Krista;Meh, I've had tighter. Give me a sec.
speak;Woman3;That was amazing! How did you do that?
speak;Krista;Just had to tense my muscles up and position my wrists in a certain way|while they were tying my hands together.|Makes it easier to slip out later on.

speak;Krista;Anyway, I'll get you untied too in a sec.|I need to steal that guy's key so we can get everyone out.|He'll be coming back to check on us, I'm sure.|Just act natural when he does, alright?
speak;Bandit2;Looks like the boss is gonna ship you all off to Edoyama first thing in the morning.|Enjoy whatever time you've got left, girls. Ha ha ha!
speak;Krista;Aw, that's too bad.|I was hoping to have a fun night with ya, you handsome stud.
speak;Bandit2;What are you going on about?
speak;Krista;You tied me up real nice and tight, y'know.|What else can those hands do, hm?
speak;Bandit2;Oh, wouldn't you like to know?
speak;Krista;Besides, it'll be the last night I get to see you, right?|Grant a girl her last wish, won't ya?
speak;Bandit2;Well, when you put it that way{tgm}...
speak;Bandit2;Lemme unlock your cell, then we can--
speak;Krista;Told you I could.|Anyway, I'll get you untied, then we can all get outta here.
speak;Hayato;And who's fault is that, huh? After them, you idiot!
speak;BanditFemale3;Alright, Hayato and his men are probably heading back from their raid by now.|Just gotta--
speak;BanditFemale3;Wait, Hanako? What are you doing here?!
speak;Woman3;Kotomi?! I thought you were gone forever!|Where have you been this whole time?
speak;BanditFemale3;You remember Yukino, right?|Follow me! She'll keep you safe!
speak;Yukino;Girls, over here! To the base!
speak;BanditFemale3;Go on, Hanako! I'm gonna help the others.
speak;Forrest;Damn it, where did they go?!
speak;Felicity;Calm yourself, Forrest.|From what I can tell, there are forts across these rivers here.|The enemy must be close by.
speak;Kai;We gotta keep our eyes peeled for Her Highness and the rest of the women, then.|We'll find her, Forrest. Don't worry.
speak;Kai;Like Her Highness said, she's got a knack for this.|I bet she got herself and the rest of the girls free by now.
speak;Felicity;Speaking of the girls, we should help them come back to the village as well.
change_unit_desc;Yukino;Leader of the Ebony Wildflowers.{br}Emotionless and focused.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Felicity;The shore is mostly empty, Your Highness.|There's only a handful of soldiers stationed there.
speak;Krista;In other words, time to strike!|Let's go, everyone!
speak;Masashi;At this point, why should I even ask?
speak;Masashi;Emperor Samegoro said to be on the look out for Medean forces,|but they have not shown their faces even once!|They could be heading straight for the capital for all we know.
speak;Masashi;If Lady Agrona were not here, perhaps the emperor would appoint me to|a more substantial assignment.
speak;Hikaru;You must stay vigilant, milord. You never know when your luck may turn around.
speak;Masashi;What a{tgm}...{tgm} pleasure it is for you to grace us with your prescence.
speak;Agrona;If you would refrain from speaking for one moment, I bear urgent news.
speak;Agrona;As I was trying to say, be cautious.|They may infiltrate the fort from any angle.|And do not forget they are to be captured and taken to Emperor Samegoro alive.|Understood?
speak;Agrona;What is it now, Lord Masashi?
speak;Masashi;Just for clarification, the one leading their forces is|the Medean princess herself, correct?
speak;Masashi;No, no! I only posed the question as confirmation. Nothing more.
speak;Masashi;You can trust me, Lady Agrona.|The Medean forces shall be subdued post-haste!
speak;Agrona;Let us hope you do just that.
speak;Hikaru;{tgm}...{tgm} Milord, I know that look.
speak;Masashi;Hikaru, my most trusted retainer, I have no idea what you're talking about.
speak;Hikaru;First off, I'm your ONLY retainer.

speak;Hikaru;Secondly, I don't think the gravity of the situation is getting through to you.|Don't you understand, milord?|This could be your chance of proving yourself worthy of|becoming the emperor's most trusted shogun again.
speak;Hikaru;And you would throw that away just for some woman!
speak;Masashi;She's not just "some woman", Hikaru. She's Medeas' princess!
speak;Masashi;A woman of her status must be as beautiful as the cherry blossoms that|bloom at the dawn of every spring.
speak;Masashi;Ah, to catch even a glimpse of her lovely visage--
speak;Hikaru;You haven't even seen her face and you're already daydreaming of your wedding day{tgm}...
speak;Hikaru;We have a mission, milord. We must not fail.
speak;Masashi;*sigh* War can be so cruel sometimes{tgm}...
speak;Hikaru;At any rate, milord, I suggest we send our forces out to each side of the island.|Seeing as the enemy is coming, we should prepare for that.
speak;Masashi;An excellent idea, Hikaru. Let us prepare for battle!
speak;Krista;Hey, what gives?!|How did they assemble their forces that quickly?
speak;Forrest;They must have seen us approach.
speak;Felicity;Did we miscalculate from where to perform our reconnaisance?
speak;Krista;Nah, that can't be it. Our ship was too far away from shore.|They'd have to have the best spyglasses to even know we were here.
speak;Kai;Either way, we'd better have our own forces get a move on.|The sooner we get our hands on the leader, the sooner we can get info out of him.

name: Intro
_source: speak;KristaFlashback;Oh? What is it? What is it?
speak;Ervan;Yeah. But the text is so faded... I can barely make out anything else.
speak;Krista;What about this? I think it says... "Circ"?
speak;Ervan;Hm... Yeah, I think so too.
speak;ErvanFlashback;It's getting late, and I have to return to Fuegsol tomorrow.
speak;ErvanFlashback;Do you mind if I take this with me?
speak;KristaFlashback;Go ahead. Let me know if you find anything interesting, okay?
speak;ErvanFlashback;Let's head off to bed, then.
speak;KristaFlashback;Yup! Good night, Ervan. Sleep well.
speak;Krista;Was it true all along, then?
speak;Felicity;Are you alright? You seem troubled.
speak;Felicity;Is it about what Masashi said? Is that bothering you?
speak;Krista;It's just a lot to take in. That's all.
speak;Felicity;About Circ{tgm}...{tgm} Just please be careful.
speak;Felicity;At any rate, we should be arriving in Edoyama soon.|We'd best prepare ourselves for the battle ahead.
speak;Krista;So, we can pretty much assume Samegoro's expecting us, right?
speak;Forrest;With that in mind, we need a safe way to scout out the area near the castle.|That way, we know how heavily guarded it is.
speak;Krista;The obvious answer is to send Kai there, right? He's from Merinas, after all.|No one would be suspicious if someone like him was wandering the capital's streets.
speak;Krista;Honestly, I'm surprised you didn't propose that, Kai.|Seems like something you'd bring up right away.

speak;Masashi;Well, if Kai here isn't willing take the lead, I will!|For all the emperor and Agrona know, I bested you all back in Fort Daijima.|I can stroll into the capital, pretend I won, and no one would be the wiser.
speak;Khalid;I can do some recon from the skies too.|That way, we can get a full picture of the battlefield.
speak;Khalid;I can do some recon from the skies.|That way, we can get a full picture of the battlefield.
speak;Krista;Sounds good to me! Just be careful out there.
speak;Masashi;There are many soldiers stationed all around the castle.|Thankfully, it seems the civilians are in their homes.
speak;Krista;Khalid! So, how's it looking out there?
speak;Khalid;There's a bunch of soldiers parked on all sides of the castle.|No civilians in sight too, so no need to worry there.
speak;Khalid;And looks like there's a moat surrounding the front gate too.
speak;Kai;There's a way to lower its bridges. I'll point it out once we get there.
speak;Krista;And at least neither Samegoro or Agrona are interested in unecessary bloodshed.|What with no civilians on the streets.
speak;Krista;They're expecting us, so we might as well just force our way through the front!|No need to do anything sneaky.
speak;Khalid;Exactly what I was thinking.|Lead the way, Krista! I'm right behind you!
speak;Krista;There's a lot of them out here{tgm}...{tgm} But it's nothing we've never faced before!|Come on, everyone! To Merinas Castle!
speak;Kai;Before we move out, Your Highness, look at those pillars up ahead.
speak;Kai;They each have a hidden mechanism that lowers the bridges I was talking about.|A thief should be able to activate them no problem.
speak;Asuka;The Medeans are approaching! Everyone, stand your guard.|Do not let them through the front gate!
speak;Sumire;Huh, the fight's starting? But{tgm}...{tgm} *yawn*|All that standing around waiting tuckered me out{tgm}...{tgm}|Maybe one little nap wouldn't hurt{tgm}...

name: Intro
_source: speak;Kai;Looks like this floor's filled to the brim with soldiers already.|The floors above it probably aren't any different.
speak;Forrest;We must move swiftly but also remain cautious moving ahead, Your Highness.
speak;Tsubaki;Mm-hm. I{tgm}...{tgm} I can do this.

speak;SoldierPurple;Commander Nagisa?! What are you and Lady Tsubaki doing here?|I'm in no position to issue orders, Commander,|but you must take the princess back to her room at once.|The Medeans somehow managed to infiltrate the castle!
speak;Nagisa;We know. We're here to fight.
speak;SoldierPurple;"We"? C-Commander, you can't possibly be suggesting--
speak;Nagisa;I am. Lady Tsubaki is more than capable of fending for herself.|She's not a little girl anymore.
speak;SoldierPurple;This is absurd!|We're just going to let the princess put herself in peril?
speak;Tsubaki;I will help from the rear as to not put myself at risk.|I promise you I will go nowhere near the front lines.
speak;SoldierPurple;I{tgm}...{tgm} Understood.|We shall not let harm come your way, my lady!
speak;Woman1;Oh dear{tgm}...{tgm} There seems to be a ruckus up above.
speak;Girl1;This is scary. I wanna go home!!
speak;Man4;Maybe this'll be a chance for us to escape? Possibly?|With the soldiers gettin' distracted n' all{tgm}...
speak;Boy1;You said that the other day, mister.
speak;Man4;W-Well, if I keep sayin' it, it'll come true!

name: Intro
_source: speak;SoldierPurple;Lady Agrona! Emperor Samegoro! The Medeans have reached the throne room!
speak;Agrona;So, they made through our defenses{tgm}...
speak;Agrona;Get into position and raise the bridges! Do not let them near the emperor!
speak;Agrona;Lady Merin, Medea and his forces are closing in.
speak;Samegoro;My dear brother{tgm}...{tgm} Why did it have to come to this?
speak;Agrona;It is regrettable, but this is for the good of Yondo, my lady.|Medea has ruled for too long.
speak;Samegoro;Father{tgm}...{tgm} Forgive me for what I'm about to do.
speak;Krista;Yeesh, there's so much water here. How are we gonna get to Samegoro?
speak;Tsubaki;There are bridges connect each part of the throne room which|are activated by stepping on those pressure plates on the floor.|It was installed by our court mages for security purposes.
speak;Tsubaki;Each pressure plate activates a bridge.|The one near the throne itself activates all the bridges.
speak;Krista;Got it! Anyone who can fly or swim can get across the water pretty easy too.|Let's go, guys!
speak;Ryuuji;Hey, Your Highness! The crew's here for back up.
speak;Pirate1;Get in there, crew! For Captain Ryuuji!!
speak;Pirate1;We're here on Captain Ryuuji's orders! Let's bust some heads!!

name: Intro
_source: if;game.get_unit('Tsubaki').team == 'player' and game.get_unit('Ryuuji').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Ryuuji') == True and game.get_unit('Nagisa').team == 'player'
speak;Forrest;Krista, it's alright. That was just a dream.
speak;Forrest;Please take your time. I will--
speak;Krista;Any more info on Circ yet?
speak;Krista;I said, "Any more info on Circ yet?"
speak;Krista;*sigh* There has to be something{tgm}...
speak;Forrest;Krista, please, you have been overworking yourself.
speak;Forrest;I know we can find out more about Ervan's circumstances this way, but you must rest.
speak;Krista;And keep having those nightmares?{br}Not a chance.
speak;Forrest;... They have been getting worse, haven't they?
speak;Krista;Y-Yeah, but...|Forrest, just let me do this. Please.
speak;Forrest;I believe he's at the training yard. Why?
speak;Krista;I gotta ask him some things.
speak;Krista;Yeah. You got a minute? I need to ask you something.
speak;Krista;Has anything been done with his stuff?
speak;Krista;I'm just thinking that maybe he knew something.|I lent him a book before he passed, so maybe...
speak;Khalid;But nah, his room's been left untouched.
speak;Khalid;Mother and Father couldn't bear to do anything with it yet, y'know?
speak;Krista;In that case, we should plan for a visit to Fuegsol Castle.|We might be able to make headway with getting a lead about Circ.
speak;Khalid;Sounds good to me! Want me to spread the word?
speak;Krista;That would be great, Khalid. Thanks.
speak;Khalid;Welcome to Fuegsol Castle, everyone!|Wipe your shoes at the door, and keep a single file line at all times!
speak;Krista;Okay, you dork, just lead the way.
speak;SoldierRed1;Welcome back, Your Highness.|I thought you would be with the Medeans for longer.
speak;Khalid;Yeah, we're on official business today.
speak;SoldierRed1;Oh, Princess Krista!|I apologize for my rudeness. I did not see you there.|How have you been faring?
speak;SoldierRed1;Good to hear!|I'm sure the king and queen would be delighted to see you again.
speak;Khalid;You don't gotta be so shy around these guys, Krista.
speak;Khalid;It's been a rough year. They understand.
speak;SoldierRed2;And greetings to you as well, Princess Krista.|Please make yourself at home.
speak;Khalid;They miss you as much, if not more than I did.
speak;Khalid;They'll end up talking your ear off once you step into the throne room.
speak;Gerolt;Oh, Khalid, what a surprise! I didn't expect you to come back so soon.
speak;Leeann;And Krista! It's such a pleasure to see you again.|Why, if I knew you were coming, we would have had a room prepared for you.
speak;Leeann;Oh, I would have had the chefs prepare a fine feast,|and the maids could have prepared the baths for you and--
speak;Krista;I-It's fine, Your Majesty.|Khalid and I just had something small to take care of here.
speak;Khalid;We were wondering if we could get something from Ervan's room.
speak;Gerolt;Was there something of his that you needed?
speak;Krista;Not exactly. There was a book I lent to him.|I was hoping to get it back.
speak;Gerolt;Is that all? You don't need permission to grab something that was yours to begin with!
speak;Leeann;On that note, this is something of Ervan's that we wished to give to you.
speak;Leeann;Seeing as Astora is without his rider now, and you were the closest to Ervan{tgm}...
speak;Leeann;I'm sure you know what I'm getting at.
speak;Krista;Whoa, whoa! I mean no disrespect, but are you sure about this?|I don't have a lot of experience riding a mount.

speak;Gerolt;We're absolutely sure. Ervan taught you how to ride too back in the day, right?|That's not something you can easily forget.|And I'm sure Astora misses flying about with someone.|Might as well let that rider be someone he trusts.
speak;Krista;Well, when you put it that way, I'll accept this. Thank you.
speak;Khalid;Why don't we hit the stables first, then?|Get you and Astora reunited and all that.
speak;Khalid;There he is. Looks like he's taking a nap.
speak;Khalid;Alright, you big lug, you can get off her now.
speak;Krista;I'll come back later, okay, Astora?|We've got important stuff to do.
speak;Judah;So, you decide to show your face around here again.
speak;Judah;I believe it is my business, Your Highness.
speak;Judah;Why else would she be here?
speak;Khalid;Get off her back about it, already!|She had nothing to do with what happened to him.
speak;Judah;Easy for you to say when you know nothing.
speak;Khalid;You don't know what you're talking about either!
speak;Krista;It's fine, Khalid. You know Judah's always been like that.
speak;Khalid;Yeah, but it feels like it's gotten worse ever since Ervan died.
speak;Krista;He cares about him a lot. He just has a... unique way of showing it.
speak;Khalid;You're way too forgiving, Krista. Seriously.
speak;Khalid;I'm not saying it's a bad thing.|I just don't want him to walk all over you like that.
speak;Khalid;I don't care if he was Ervan's retainer.|He has no right to treat you like garbage.
speak;Krista;Khalid, you don't have to worry about it. Really.
speak;SoldierRed1;I{tgm}...{tgm} I don't know! There must have been spies in our midst.|I'm sorry, Your Highness. If we were more careful{tgm}...
speak;Khalid;No use in cursing the past. We have to defend the castle now!
speak;Krista;We gotta get to the throne room!
speak;Khalid;No need to tell me twice.
speak;Gerolt;The enemy hasn't reached us yet, but it seems like it's only a matter of time.
speak;Krista;We'll drive them out of here. No matter what it takes!
speak;Sven;Seize the throne room, men! We'll take the castle for ourselves!
speak;Sven;Ha, this is going much better than expected.|Those fools had no idea how gradually we slipped under their noses.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Krista;And where's Forrest? He would've tried to wake me up by now.|Maybe he's in the library. I'll go check.
speak;;<red>Move</> with the <red>arrow keys or control stick</>.;;;hint;;;;;2;no_sound
speak;;<red>Interact</> with the environment with the <red>CONFIRM</> button/key.;;;hint;;;;;3;no_sound

name: Intro
_source: speak;Iris;Do my eyes deceive me? No, it truly is!|Aqua! Semi! Thank Great Folia the both of you are unharmed.
speak;Semi;Hello, Lady Iris. Sorry 'bout worrying you.
speak;Iris;I prayed to the Great Folia every night for your safety.|I am overjoyed to see my prayers be answered.
speak;Iris;I feared that the Holy Knights may have found you.

speak;Aqua;Lady Iris, allow me to introduce you to Her Highness,|Princess Krista of Medeas, and her friends.|They are responsible for keeping us safe on our journey back here.|And they have been investigating what has happened to the people of Foliaga.
speak;Krista;It's a pleasure to meet you, Lady Iris.
speak;Iris;The pleasure is mine, Your Highness.|You have my eternal gratitude for ensuring Aqua's and Semi's safety.
speak;Krista;Aw, it was nothing.|Just happened to be at the right place at the right time.
speak;Iris;Please, make yourselves at home. I'm sure the journey here has made you weary.
speak;Zeke;This monestary's ours for the taking, boys!|Grab all the gold and women you can get your hands on!|Show no mercy!
speak;Priest1;Lady Iris! We have an emergency!
speak;Iris;What!? Defend the east and west wings.|I shall take up arms here at the entrance hall.
speak;Iris;I thank you for your aid, Your Highness.
speak;Priest1;We've come to assist you here too, Lady Iris.
speak;Iris;Excellent. Do not let those pirates near this holy place!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Krista;So, Kai, how much longer 'til we reach Mossgrove?
speak;Kai;We just need to keep heading in this direction,|and we'll be in Mossgrove in a day's time.
speak;Krista;Nice! Let's keep up the pace, guys!
speak;Talbot;You ain't gonna go any farther!
speak;Talbot;You'll pay for killin' the captain!
speak;Talbot;I'm gonna finish what the captain started!
speak;Krista;More of that pirate crew from earlier, huh? No problem!|Come on, everyone! Let's take 'em down!
speak;Rembrandt;Pleasure doing business with you, sir.
speak;Jake;Aw, no need to be so formal! Just call me Jake.
speak;Rembrandt;Alright. Well, thank you again, Jake.|I shall take my leave.
speak;Rembrandt;Pirates? Here? And those people to the west{tgm}...{tgm}|Just what is going on?

name: Endings
_source: paired_ending;Krista;Forrest;Krista, Exiled Princess;Forrest, Devoted Knight;Forrest joined Krista in her exile and settled in the countryside of the island of Valona. There, the two wed and raised a son together.

paired_ending;Krista;Kai;Krista, Exiled Princess;Kai, Wandering Ninja;After Krista's exile, Kai escaped to Valona to evade Merinese authorities and to fulfill his promise to her. The two settled in the island's countryside and raised a son together.
#elif;get_support_rank('Forrest', 'Kai') == 'S' and (insert all Krista's paired supports here to be not A+ or S)

paired_ending;Forrest;Kai;Forrest, Devoted Knight;Kai, Wandering Ninja;Upon Forrest's insistence, the two of them followed Krista to Valona where she was exiled. The three of them peacefully lived together in the countryside.

ending;Krista;Krista, Exiled Princess;Krista was exiled to the island of Valona for her crimes. Deciding that Yondo was no longer home for them, Forrest and Kai followed her. The three of them lived the rest of their lives in peace and raised a son together.

ending;Krista;Krista, Exiled Princess;Krista was exiled to the island of Valona for her crimes. She lived her life in peace and married a local village man there. The two of them raised a son together.
ending;Krista;Krista, Exiled Princess;Krista was exiled to the island of Valona for her crimes. Together with Forrest, she lived peacefully in the countryside. The two of them raised a son together.
ending;Forrest;Forrest, Devoted Knight;Forrest joined Krista in her exile and stayed by her side until the end of his days. The two of them raised a son together.

paired_ending;Forrest;Torgen;Forrest, Devoted Knight;Torgen, Heart of Gold;Rumors have circulated that despite Krista no longer being present at the castle, a certain Griffon rider could be seen visiting a certain general's chambers each month on quiet evenings.
ending;Kai;Kai, Wandering Ninja;Kai wandered the earth evading arrest for his treason of Merinas. No one knows where he ended up.
ending;Trevor;Trevor, Talkative Mage;Trevor, now under service of Parker, serves his new employer with unwavering loyalty. Although, he misses his days being by Krista's side.
ending;Chell;Chell, Motherly Pegasus Knight;Chell continued to lead the Medean Pegasus Knights. Her leadership and kindness were an inspiration to her subordinates.
ending;Sam;Sam, Prowling Tiger;Sam returned to Oregot to continue his quest in killing all of Oregot's bandits. His reputation continued to bring fear to the hearts of the local ruffians.
ending;Aqua;Aqua, Kind Priestess;Aqua returned to Foliaga and helped it rebuild from the fall of the Archbishop.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Aqua;The enemy just now{tgm}...{tgm} Their armor, their banners{tgm}...{tgm} They were all{tgm}...
speak;Forrest;The Holy Knights. They knew who we were too.
speak;Kai;But that's impossible. How would they hear about us so fast?
speak;Kai;If those guys know to target us, the rest of the Knights will go after us too.|At this rate, we'll have to skip out on going to Lake Lunaris entirely.
speak;Krista;We're getting low on supplies, though. We need to hit up a town soon.

speak;Aqua;We can go to my monestary, Vergrande Monastery.|It's small, so the Knights will have a harder time getting to it since it doesn't have a|secret passageway.|I'm sure if Semi and I talk to the high priestess, she'll be willing to help us.
speak;Aqua;The only downside is that it will take longer to get to Mossgrove from there compared to|going to Lunaris first.
speak;Kai;Both options pose some benefits.|Your Highness, I'll leave the final decision to you.
choice;LunarisVergrande;Where will you go?;Lake Lunaris,Vergrande Monastery
speak;Krista;Let's head to Lake Lunaris.|We might run into the Knights there,|but we need to get to Oakenfaire as fast as we can.
speak;Krista;Let's head to Vergrande Monastery.|As much as I wanna make a break for Oakenfaire,|we won't last long if we don't stock up.
speak;Aqua;Semi and I will lead the way, then.
speak;Forrest;Understood. Let's rest up and continue onwards at the break of dawn.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;Nice, the fog cleared! Let's keep sailing, everyone!
speak;Kai;Hold on, Your Highness. I have questions for these two.
speak;Kai;I just need to confirm something.
speak;Keisha;Hey, just what do you think you're doing?!
speak;Kai;Pretty interesting bottle you got here.
speak;Keisha;What's it to you, pretty boy?
speak;Kai;This poison's pretty rare, y'know.|So rare that there's only one group of people who know how to make it.
speak;Kai;Oh, so you DO know all about that, huh?|Well, that means our conversation is over.
speak;Kai;Let's go, Princess. We're done here.
speak;Krista;Kai, what was that all about? And what's so important about that bottle?
speak;Kai;This bottle is the key to everything.|Knowing that this was in their possession,|I'm starting to get a good idea of what's going on.
speak;Kai;Just give me time, Princess.|I want to be absolutely sure about this before I say anything more.
speak;Krista;Well, you haven't steered us wrong before. I'll leave it to you, Kai.|I'm sure we'll get more answers the closer we get to Edoyama.
speak;Kai;You took the words right out of my mouth.
speak;Krista;Wh-Whoa, we've got a huge storm coming in! Let's get outta--

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;Alright, looks like everything's in place.
speak;Parker;Let's take care of the rest of these bandits. Then we can start repairing the ship.
speak;Parker;Let's get started with the repairs, then.
speak;Forrest;Your Highness, while sorting through our supplies,|we found other valuables mixed in with them.
speak;Krista;Hey, not bad! Good find, Forrest.
speak;Krista;Well, boys and girls, it took a bit,|but the ship's finally good and ready.|Let's get outta here!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;Looks like they're retreating! Good work, guys!
speak;Iris;Your Highness, I thank you for protecting our humble monastery.
speak;Krista;No problem, Lady Iris. It's the least we could do.
speak;Iris;I pray that you all have a safe journey to the capital.|May Folia's grace be upon you.
speak;Priest1;On behalf of Vergrande Monastery, please accept this.
speak;Krista;That's very kind of all of you, but are you sure it's okay?
speak;Priest1;These gifts are bestowed upon you by the request of Lady Iris.|Please take them.
speak;Krista;Well, if that's the case, then please send the high priestess our thanks.
speak;Zeke;Argh, I can't believe those puny priests and clerics outdid us!
speak;Talbot;Don't look so down, Cap'n! I got an idea.
speak;Talbot;Looks like those soldiers that were helpin' 'em out are goin' thataway.|If we kill 'em, we can come back here and do all the pillagin' we want!
speak;Bandit3;Wow, that's a good idea, Talbot!
speak;Zeke;Shut it, you! Who asked you to speak?!|Still, not a bad idea.|I'll stay here and leave the rest to you.
speak;Bandit3;Talbot, th-they killed the captain! Wh-What do we do now?
speak;Talbot;Quit your blubberin' already! I already got a plan.
speak;Talbot;See those soldiers from earlier over yonder?|We go after 'em, kill 'em, then come back here and do all the pillagin' we want!
speak;Bandit3;Wow, that's a great idea! You're so smart, Talbot!
speak;Talbot;Yeah, yeah. Now, quit yer yakkin' and get movin'!|We're burnin' daylight here!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;Oh no! They've got the stragglers! We have get them back!
speak;Krista;*huff huff* Think we're far away enough?
speak;Forrest;I believe so. Let's not stay put for too long, though.|Kai, you've got the map. Lead the way!
speak;Kai;No need to tell me twice.{br}To Mossgrove, everyone!
speak;Krista;No time! Gotta move! Running from Holy Knights!
speak;Jake;I know! That's why I need your help!
speak;Jake;Thanks. The name's Jake.|You see, me and my girlfriend Anna have been running into trouble with the Knights.

speak;Jake;Point is, we've been able to set up shop all over Yondo back in the day.|It seems like ever since a year ago, everyone's been getting on our case.|And now we gotta sell our stuff in secret.

speak;Jake;I don't know what's gotten into everyone,|but all I know is Anna and I want our livelihoods back!|If we can knock some sense into Foliaga's Holy Knights,|I think it would be a good start. So, what do you say?
speak;Krista;You know what? Any enemy of the Knights is a friend of ours at this point.|We'll help you out, Jake.
speak;Jake;Thanks a million! I can't tell you how much this means to me.
speak;Krista;Sorry, Jake, but we've got our own problems to deal with.|You're gonna have to find someone else.
speak;Jake;Thanks for hearing me out, though.|At least promise me and Anna your patronage in the future!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;*huff huff* Think we're far away enough?
speak;Forrest;I believe so. Let's not stay put for too long, though.|Kai, you've got the map. Lead the way!
speak;Kai;No need to tell me twice.{br}To Mossgrove, everyone!
speak;Krista;No time! Gotta move! Running from Holy Knights!
speak;Jake;I know! That's why I need your help!
speak;Jake;Thanks. The name's Jake.|You see, me and my girlfriend Anna have been running into trouble with the Knights.

speak;Jake;Point is, we've been able to set up shop all over Yondo back in the day.|It seems like ever since a year ago, everyone's been getting on our case.|And now we gotta sell our stuff in secret.

speak;Jake;I don't know what's gotten into everyone,|but all I know is Anna and I want our livelihoods back!|If we can knock some sense into Foliaga's Holy Knights,|I think it would be a good start. So, what do you say?
speak;Krista;You know what? Any enemy of the Knights is a friend of ours at this point.|We'll help you out, Jake.
speak;Jake;Thanks a million! I can't tell you how much this means to me.
speak;Krista;Sorry, Jake, but we've got our own problems to deal with.|You're gonna have to find someone else.
speak;Jake;Thanks for hearing me out, though.|At least promise me and Anna your patronage in the future!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;Nice, they're retreating!|Let's get outta here before more of them come along.
speak;Khalid;Krista! We finally caught up to you!
speak;Krista;Khalid?! What are you and Reem doing here?
speak;Krista;Khalid?! What are you doing here?
speak;Khalid;Reem and I heard about what you did in Foliaga, so we came rushing over to help out.
speak;Reem;By the time we made it to Medeas Castle, you had already left for Merinas, Your Highness.
speak;Khalid;By the time we made it to Medeas Castle, you already were heading for Merinas.
speak;Khalid;{tgm}...{tgm} Hey, we can catch up on things later.
speak;Khalid;Besides, we gotta get a move on, right? The world needs saving, yeah?
speak;Krista;Oh, you're that merchant from before!|Look, I'd love to hear you out, but my friends and I REALLY gotta go.
speak;Krista;Hey, sorry, but me and my friends REALLY gotta go.
speak;Jake;Just a moment is all I need. Please!

speak;Jake;See, my girlfriend Anna and I are travelling merchants.|We used to be able to use this particular sea route to trade goods.|Then, a year ago, the whole route's become a pirate-infested pit!
speak;Jake;Please, you gotta help us get rid of them!
speak;Jake;Anna and I will even make it worth your while.|We can join up with you guys and give y'all access to our rarest wares.|What d'ya say?
speak;Krista;We're in, Jake.|Getting rid of those pirates will make travelling the seas a lot easier anyway.
speak;Jake;Thanks a lot! Here, I can navigate y'all to the route.
speak;Krista;Sorry, but like I said, we're in a huge hurry here.|We don't have time to get sidetracked.
speak;Jake;You hurry along, then! Don't let me keep you hanging!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Forrest;Let's not stay put for too long, though.|Kai, you've got the map. Lead the way!
speak;Kai;No need to tell me twice.{br}To Mossgrove, everyone!
speak;Krista;Hey, you're that merchant from before!
speak;Jake;The name's Jake. Mind if I ask you a favor?
speak;Jake;You see, me and my girlfriend Anna have been running into trouble with the Knights.

speak;Jake;Point is, we've been able to set up shop all over Yondo back in the day.|It seems like ever since a year ago, everyone's been getting on our case.|And now we gotta sell our stuff in secret.

speak;Jake;I don't know what's gotten into everyone,|but all I know is Anna and I want our livelihoods back!|If we can knock some sense into Foliaga's Holy Knights,|I think it would be a good start. So, what do you say?
speak;Krista;You know what? Any enemy of the Knights is a friend of ours at this point.|We'll help you out, Jake.
speak;Jake;Thanks a million! I can't tell you how much this means to me.
speak;Krista;Sorry, Jake, but we've got our own problems to deal with.|You're gonna have to find someone else.
speak;Jake;Thanks for hearing me out, though.|At least promise me and Anna your patronage in the future!

name: Secret
_source: speak;Anna;Hey, you found the Gold Card!{br}You can go ahead and keep that.|Jake and I didn't actually lose it.|It's just a promotional thing for our shop.|We've got shops all over Yondo, so feel free to stop by when you can!|Just keep a sharp eye out. We gotta sell our stuff in secret.|Anyway{tgm}...

name: Secret
_source: speak;Anna;Well, aren't you a bold one, knocking down the wall like that?

speak;Anna;But anyway, congrats on getting a Gold Card!|You can go ahead and keep that.{br}Jake and I didn't actually lose it.|It's just a promotional thing for our shop.|We've got shops all over Yondo, so feel free to stop by when you can!|Just keep a sharp eye out. We gotta sell our stuff in secret.|Anyway{tgm}...

name: Secret
_source: speak;Jake;Well, would you look at that. You have the Gold Card!|Go ahead and keep that. Anna and I didn't lose it.|It's a promotional gimmick for our shop. It was Anna's idea!
speak;Jake;Speaking of Anna, did you happen to run into her on the way here?|I think she said she was gonna set up shop in the woods someplace.|Anyway, wanna see what I've got in stock?
speak;Marina;Yes, I am. I met some kind people who will take care of the Knights.
speak;Marina;And look at what they happened to have.
speak;Jake;Oh, the Gold Card! Feel free to buy anything you want, Miss Marina.
speak;Jake;Well would you look at that. You have the Gold Card!
speak;Jake;Oh, you've met Anna before? Then you already know what that's all about.
speak;Jake;Here's what I got in stock!

name: Secret
_source: speak;Jake;Well, would you look at that. You have the Gold Card!|Go ahead and keep that. Anna and I didn't lose it.|It's a promotional gimmick for our shop. It was Anna's idea!|Anyway, wanna see what I've got in stock?

name: Secret
_source: speak;Anna;Hey, you found the Gold Card!{br}You can go ahead and keep that.|Jake and I didn't actually lose it.|It's just a promotional thing for our shop.|We've got shops all over Yondo, so feel free to stop by when you can!|Just keep a sharp eye out. We gotta sell our stuff in secret.|Anyway{tgm}...

name: Secret
_source: speak;Anna;Hey, you found the Gold Card!{br}You can go ahead and keep that.|Jake and I didn't actually lose it.|It's just a promotional thing for our shop.|We've got shops all over Yondo, so feel free to stop by when you can!|Just keep a sharp eye out. We gotta sell our stuff in secret.|Anyway{tgm}...

name: Secret
_source: speak;Jake;Well, would you look at that. You have the Gold Card!|Go ahead and keep that. Anna and I didn't lose it.|It's a promotional gimmick for our shop. It was Anna's idea!
speak;Jake;Speaking of Anna, did you happen to run into her on the way here?|I think she said she was gonna set up shop in the woods someplace.|Anyway, wanna see what I've got in stock?
speak;Jake;Well would you look at that. You have the Gold Card!
speak;Jake;Oh, you've met Anna before? Then you already know what that's all about.
speak;Jake;Here's what I got in stock!

name: BaseConvo_Shirtless
_source: speak;Sam;Ohhhh, you're talking about how I don't have a shirt.|I guess I should put one on since I'm back at the castle and all that.
speak;Chell;I mean, yes, that would be proper, but{tgm}...
speak;Sam;Well, if you're okay with it, I'll keep being shirtless!

name: BaseConvo_Importance of a Feather
_source: speak;Tsurugi;Mister Kai! May I speak to you for a moment?
speak;Tsurugi;I have something to give you. Here!
speak;Kai;Not trying to say I'm slow, are you?
speak;Tsurugi;Oh, goodness, no!{br}Far from it!|It's just that I wanted to thank you for{tgm}...
speak;Kai;For what? Can't really think of anything I did for you.|We've only just met, after all.
speak;Tsurugi;Oh, I knew this wasn't a good idea.
speak;Tsurugi;Never mind! You can keep the Speedwing! Sorry!!
speak;Kai;I probably would've remembered someone like him.

name: BaseConvo_Looming Danger
_source: speak;Felicity;Ah, Lord Parker.|How goes the preparations for the rest of the journey?
speak;Parker;I'm afraid we may have more pressing matters, Felicity.
speak;Parker;Precisely. It is unusual to see wild wyverns this far north.
speak;Parker;Wyvern RIDERS, on the other hand{tgm}...
speak;Felicity;Anticipating the worst, I take it?
speak;Parker;It's only natural, wouldn't you agree?
speak;Felicity;Oh, I wasn't objecting at all, if that's what you mean.|It pays to be cautious. Especially now, with what we've discovered.

speak;Parker;On that note, would you mind taking these weapons to Krista?|I believe it would be helpful to have these onhand.|And please inform her of our observations, if you would as well.|There are other things I would like to attend to in the meantime.

name: BaseConvo_New Formation
_source: speak;Viola;I'm so happy we found you, Lin! We missed you so much.
speak;Lin;Remember, I'm with you all as a mercenary first and foremost.|This just another job for me.
speak;Viola;B-But we have so much catching up to do.
speak;Chell;No, Lin's right. She's made this decision, so we should respect that.
speak;Chell;With that said, seeing how we're working together now,|I think it would be best if we reviewed a certain battle formation.
speak;Viola;Oh! You mean the Triangle Attack?
speak;Chell;Yes, exactly. Are you in, Lin?
speak;Lin;Well, I guess it wouldn't hurt to practice it a bit.
speak;Viola;Yes! We haven't done this in years! Let's do this!
speak;Chell;Alright, I think we've got the hang of it.
speak;Viola;That was awesome! I can't wait to do it again for real!

name: BaseConvo_Pray for Safety
_source: speak;Aqua;I'm alright. Thank you for asking.
speak;Aqua;Though, I am worried about everyone back in Vergrande Monastery.
speak;Semi;I'm sure they're fine.|The clergymen there are good with magic, so they can defend themselves well enough.|Once this is all over, wanna see if we can pay them a visit?
speak;Aqua;That's a good idea!|I'm sure everyone is wondering where we went.
speak;Aqua;For now, I'll pray for their safety. Would you care to join me?

name: BaseConvo_Moonlight
_source: speak;Kai;You know why they call this place Lake Lunaris?
speak;Kai;Every night, the moonlight reflects off the surface of the lake.|I've heard it's a beautiful sight.
speak;Kai;It would probably be romantic coming out here one night.
speak;Forrest;Kai, you're going somewhere with this. So, out with it already.
speak;Kai;I'm not going anywhere with it, really. Just making observations.
speak;Kai;Speaking of which, Her Highness at least thought the lake was pretty.
speak;Kai;There what is? Like I said, I'm just making observations.
speak;Kai;Forrest, my friend, I have no idea what you're talking about.|Do you think I'm insinuating something?
speak;Forrest;{tgm}...{tgm} I feel like this is a trap.
speak;Kai;Would it make you feel better if I said you being in love with the princess|is basically an open secret?
speak;Kai;Thanks for the enlightening conversation, Forrest.
speak;Forrest;Open secret{tgm}...?{tgm} No, he must be joking.

name: BaseConvo_Swimsuits
_source: speak;Forrest;This may just be me being ignorant of Merinas' cultural practices,|but why is everyone in the water in their undergarments?
speak;Kai;Yup, they're a common sight in Merinas. Especially in its coastal towns.|They don't soak up water easily and they keep you covered up|when you're out for a swim.
speak;Kai;We could buy one for Her Highness.
speak;Forrest;Wh-Why? I wasn't thinking about Princess Krista in a swimsuit.
speak;Forrest;N-No. We shouldn't be wasting our funds on such things.
speak;Kai;But you know, a swimsuit would really show off her legs--
speak;Forrest;We are ending the conversation here!

name: BaseConvo_Hand Holding
_source: speak;Felicity;Why did we have to stop in a large city like this?|Couldn't we have gone somewhere else?
speak;Krista;I figured you'd be out here.
speak;Felicity;I am quite fine, thank you.
speak;Krista;Aw, don't give me that! You're trembling like a leaf.
speak;Krista;The crowds are making you nervous, huh?
speak;Krista;I know you don't like being around a ton of people, but there's a festival going on!|It's supposed to be fun!
speak;Krista;And you don't have to be alone either. We can check things out together!
speak;Felicity;Are you sure it's alright? I wouldn't want to bring down the mood.
speak;Krista;If I wasn't okay with it, I wouldn't be offering.
speak;Krista;Here. We can even hold hands like we usually do.

name: BaseConvo_Justice Squad
_source: speak;Celeste;Everyone here? Good!|Let the very first Junior Justice Alliance meeting commence!
speak;Michael;Um, Celeste, I have a question.
speak;Celeste;Ah yes, Michael, second-in-command. You may speak!
speak;Michael;What{tgm}...{tgm} is all this about?|You explained absolutely nothing when you gathered all us up like this.
speak;Celeste;I'm glad you asked! I'm sure you're all familiar with the Sacred Five?
speak;Cole;The five legendary heroes who led the charge during the War of Divides?
speak;Celeste;With Yondo in danger and the five of us together like this{tgm}...
speak;Celeste;I believe it's time for the Sacred Five to make their comeback!
speak;Michael;You do realize that each of the Sacred Five came from each of Yondo's five countries?|And that none of us are from Fuegsol or Oregot?
speak;Cole;I actually don't know. I'm adopted.
speak;Celeste;Aw, never mind.{br}Doesn't matter anyway.|I believe each of us are one-to-one matches to the Sacred Five!
speak;Celeste;As the healer, you are Zinnia, the devoted cleric to Folia!
speak;Celeste;From now on, you'll be referred to as "Justice Green"!
speak;Michael;Despite Lucy not being from Foliaga?
speak;Celeste;You're Haldor, Oregot's stalwart warrior!|You shall be{br}"Justice White"!
speak;Celeste;You're Rohit, the brains of the group from Fuegsol!|You shall be{br}"Justice Red"!
speak;Michael;Wasn't he a burly wyvern knight, though?
speak;Celeste;You're Izumi, the refined spearfighter of Merinas!|You will be{br}"Justice Black"!
speak;Celeste;I'm Aurea! The charismatic leader of the Sacred Five from Medeas!|You can refer to me as{br}"Justice Yellow"!
speak;Michael;I don't know where to begin with this one.
speak;Michael;Aurea was a swordswoman of finesse and grace, Celeste. Which you are no--
speak;Lucy;I don't think the accuracy of it all matters, Michael.
speak;Lucy;This sounds like fun either way!
speak;Cole;I agree as well, but what do we do from here exactly?
speak;Celeste;A very good question, Justice Red!|We gotta do what any good world-saving team does.
speak;Lucy;Figure out what the enemy is planning?
speak;Celeste;All very good suggestions, but no.
speak;Celeste;What we need is a super cool team pose!
speak;Michael;Celeste, that is the last thing we need--
speak;Celeste;And I've got the perfect idea for the formation!|So, I'll go here. Justice Green and Justice Red will--
speak;Michael;I didn't sign up for this...

name: BaseConvo_A Strong Drink
_source: speak;Taylor;Hey! Joshua! Sam!|Want to go see what the taverns of Merinas have to offer in drinks?
speak;Sam;Hey, why not? Yeah, I'm down.
speak;Taylor;Hey, bartender! Three drinks for three thirsty men.
speak;Man3;There's wine, ale, scotch, beer, whiskey, mead{tgm}....{tgm}|Also sake.
speak;Taylor;Never had sake before. Give me a mug full.
speak;Sam;Yeah, you have no idea of how strong it is.
speak;Taylor;It'll be fine! I've had strong stuff before.
speak;Man3;It's your mug of sake, sir.
speak;Taylor;I said a MUG. This can hardly be called a cup.
speak;Man3;My apologies, young man, but it is very strong.|Most only have a swallow or two.
speak;Taylor;I've had strong liquor before. Get me a MUG.
speak;Taylor;In fact, make it a pint.
speak;Taylor;Like I said, it'll be fine! What could go wrong?
speak;Taylor;How strong could it be, really?
speak;Taylor;Now THIS is more like it.
speak;Taylor;You two know *hic* Alex, right? Lemme tell y'all 'bout her.
speak;Taylor;A WOW-man. She's got *hic* HUGE boobs.
speak;Joshua;And we need to know this because?
speak;Taylor;Don' interrupt me while I'm drinkin'
speak;Taylor;She's got serious honkers! A real set of BADONKERS!
speak;Sam;Sorry about that, bartender.|Thanks for the drinks, and I'm sorry about{tgm}...{tgm} him.
speak;Man3;Thank you for taking care of him.|Here, have some sake on the house. It's fine in small doses.
speak;Joshua;I got him Sam. Let's go back with the others.

name: BaseConvo_Roused Suspicions
_source: speak;OldMan2;Tell Hayato to be wary of them.|They seem like capable fighters.
speak;Bandit2;Yeah, I'll let 'im know.|And you said this girl's from Medea?
speak;Kai;Thought the mayor was suspicious too, Forrest?
speak;Kai;Any idea who he's talking to?
speak;Forrest;No, but I do have theories.
speak;Forrest;We must proceed with caution, Kai.|Things aren't what they seem here.

name: BaseConvo_Anxieties
_source: speak;Trevor;Oh, Lord Parker.|In all truth, no. That ghost{tgm}...
speak;Trevor;Er{tgm}...{tgm} Yes. That is precisely it.
speak;Trevor;Knowing the ghost captures women is{tgm}...{tgm} concerning.
speak;Trevor;How would a ghost be able to tell the difference|between a man and a woman in the middle of the night?|They were human once, yes? They must still have their human-level perceptions.
speak;Parker;Perhaps it's a supernatural ability?|They might be able to just tell.
speak;Trevor;As fascinating this conversation is, Lord Parker, I must{tgm}...{tgm} er.|Make preparations for tonight. So long!
speak;Parker;Hm. Poor boy must have a fear of ghosts.

name: BaseConvo_Reconsider
_source: speak;Khalid;Krista, just what the hell are you thinking?!
speak;Khalid;Putting yourself in danger like this{tgm}...
speak;Khalid;There are better ways to help these people, you know.
speak;Krista;Come on, don't look at me like that.
speak;Krista;You're really making me reconsider the plan here.
speak;Khalid;And you should! Krista, are you listening to yourself?|You wouldn't do something like this! You{tgm}...
speak;Khalid;Look. I just{tgm}...{tgm} I don't want to lose you too, y'know?
speak;Krista;I get it. Really. But you have to trust me on this.
speak;Krista;I'll come back alive. I promise.

name: BaseConvo_Do Not Explain
_source: speak;Viola;I wish we could've stayed at the inn with everyone else.
speak;Chell;I know, Viola, but we have to stay outside the village so|that we can come in for back up later tonight.
speak;Felicity;I'm sure we'll have proper sleeping arrangements after this.
speak;Viola;Y'know, I've been thinking about this for a while now{tgm}...
speak;Viola;Her Highness has been getting captured by bandits a lot lately, hasn't she?|It's kinda weird.
speak;Viola;I just don't get it!|It's not like Her Highness actually has FUN getting kidnapped, right?

name: BaseConvo_Trust in a Leader
_source: speak;Krista;Our army is just getting bigger and bigger, huh, Forrest?
speak;Krista;It's cool to have all these people join us. But it's kinda{tgm}...
speak;Krista;Everyone is putting their trust in me, and I dunno if I deserve it.
speak;Forrest;You've been working hard to get this far, and everyone can see that, Your Highness.|You are more than deserving of their trust.
speak;Krista;But the only reason I'm working so hard is to make up for{tgm}...
speak;Krista;I don't know how long I can keep this up.
speak;Krista;Everyone's gonna see me for what I really am eventually. And the thing is{tgm}...
speak;Krista;I'm scared of what's gonna happen when they do.|I don't want to lose what we built up.
speak;Forrest;Your Highness, you have nothing to fear.|If you can't bring yourself to have faith in your own righteousness,|then believe in me who can do it for you.
speak;Forrest;You haven't changed at all, Krista. You're still that loving person I knew a year ago.|And the others can see that too.{br}I know they do.
speak;Krista;I'll{tgm}...{tgm} I'll keep trying my best. For everyone!

name: BaseConvo_One's Faith
_source: speak;Ecco;Hey, kid. Mind if I join you?
speak;Michael;Um, I'm Michael, by the way.
speak;Ecco;So, you used to be one of the Holy Knights, huh?
speak;Michael;I just wanted to help people.|The Knights in Florene Village weren't like this. They protected us!
speak;Michael;And they were so kind and strong{tgm}...
speak;Michael;I wanted to be like that too.
speak;Ecco;Life's disappointing like that sometimes.|Better to figure that out sooner rather than later.
speak;Michael;B-But even so, not all the Knights can be like this, right?|There's gotta be more of them who still fight for what's right.|For what the Great Folia would want.
speak;Ecco;Hate to break it to you, Michael, but faith in the gods is overrated.
speak;Michael;H-Huh?! But, you're a monk, aren't you?
speak;Michael;Hearing you of all people say something like that{tgm}...
speak;Ecco;I've been out of the monk life for a long time.|I've been out there living the mercenary life instead.
speak;Ecco;And I much prefer how things are now.|Being a mercenary gives actual practical benefits.|Money. World experience. Stuff like that.
speak;Michael;That may work for you, but the Great Folia has provided so much for his people.|I can't turn away from him that easily.
speak;Ecco;Well, you're still just a kid. You'll figure it out eventually.|I'll give you some advice, though.
speak;Ecco;When no one's there beside you, not even the gods, you've still got one thing to rely on.
speak;Ecco;You're a good kid, Michael. I can tell. But don't rely on Folia for everything.|Keep your head up.|You can be the Knight that Foliaga needs if you've got faith in yourself.
speak;Michael;Th-Thank you, Miss Ecco. I'll keep that in mind.
speak;Ecco;And here, take this with you too. I don't need it anymore.|You'll probably get more out of it than me.

name: BaseConvo_Training Together
_source: speak;Chell;Oh, Sam, keeping up with your training, I see.
speak;Sam;Huh? Oh, hey Chell!|*huff* You gonna *huff* train up too?
speak;Chell;Oh Medea his chest is glistening with sweat!;;;thought_bubble
speak;Chell;And his biceps are tense and flexed...;;;thought_bubble
speak;Chell;Anyway, yes, I was planning on practicing my axe techniques.
speak;Sam;Say, how about we practice together?|It's been years since I saw what you can do up close.
speak;Chell;That sounds like a wonderful idea, Sam. Let's begin!
speak;Sam;That was great, Chell! You really have gotten big!
speak;Chell;Sam, what do you mean by{tgm}...
speak;Chell;You know what? Never mind. I don't think I want to know.
speak;Sam;What? Was it something I said?

name: BaseConvo_Sharing Tents
_source: speak;Forrest;Your Highness, there is something I wish to discuss with you.
speak;Forrest;Concerning tents and sleeping arrangements, there is a bit of a dilemma.
speak;Forrest;That is partially the issue, yes.|However, it is more who is sharing tents that is the overall problem.
speak;Krista;Yeah, I guess that makes sense.|Adding more people to the group can cause problems like that.

speak;Forrest;I have taken note of groups we should not be concerned with.|Ecco and Anil have their own tent and share it.|Taylor, Alex, and Lucy have no problem sharing one together.|Aqua and Semi will share a tent, I'm sure.|And Kai and I will still share a tent.
speak;Forrest;As for Chell and Sam, they shared a tent during our return trip from Oregot,|so I'm sure that this arrangement will not change.
speak;Krista;Then that just leaves me, Trevor, and Michael.
speak;Krista;Well, with Michael being such a nervous wreck,|I doubt he'd be comfortable sharing a tent with a girl.
speak;Krista;But with Trevor's preference for having a tent to himself{tgm}...
speak;Krista;Yeah, I can see why you're having trouble, Forrest.|But, y'know, I'd be okay with sleeping outside--
speak;Krista;In that case, I'll see if Trevor will be okay if he and I share a tent.|We've known each other for half a year now, so maybe he'll be comfortable enough with me.
speak;Krista;{tgm}...{tgm} Forrest, if you're so concerned about THAT happening,|maybe Kai and I should trade places--
speak;Krista;H-Huh?? But that would solve the problem, wouldn't it?|Besides, I can trust you to not try to--
speak;Forrest;That's not{tgm}...!{tgm} I mean, it's just that being with you{tgm}...
speak;Forrest;I apologize, Your Highness. Your initial idea is fine. My concerns are trivial.
speak;Forrest;I shall inform Trevor of the sleeping arrangements, then.
speak;Krista;No way. That's ridiculous! He'd never do that with me.
speak;Krista;He has so many reasons not to.

name: BaseConvo_Bargaining
_source: speak;Man1;Greetings! May I interest you lovely ladies in some fine jewelry?|I only carry the best. And at cheap prices too!
speak;Viola;Ecco, look at that ring! The red gem on it is so shiny.
speak;Ecco;Hold on, lemme take a better look at it.
speak;Ecco;Just how much are you charging for this, buddy?
speak;Ecco;800? For this cheap old thing? Please.
speak;Ecco;You'd be lucky if I'd be willing to pay 200 for this piece of junk.
speak;Man1;Why you{tgm}...{tgm} Alright, fine. 400 gold it is.
speak;Ecco;Here you go, sir. Pleasure doing business with you.
speak;Ecco;Just a bit of bargaining, Viola. No harm done.
speak;Ecco;Besides, it was his own fault for undercharging it to begin with.
speak;Viola;You mean that ring is usually worth more?
speak;Ecco;Yup. I don't think the old geezer realized it, but this is an Energy Ring.|They're worth WAY more than just 800 gold.
speak;Viola;Wow, you knew what kind of ring it was right away?|You're so smart, Ecco!
speak;Ecco;What can I say? I've got an eye for these things.

name: BaseConvo_Teach a Man to Fish
_source: speak;Taylor;Hey, Felicity! Whatcha up to there?
speak;Taylor;You're real focused on the fish there.|Wait, are you trying to catch one? You don't even have a rod!
speak;Taylor;I may be good at fishing myself, but even I don't have that confidence.
speak;Felicity;Watch and maybe you'll learn a thing or two.
speak;Taylor;Whoa, that's a big one! Nice job, Felicity.
speak;Felicity;This will make for an excellent meal for the army.
speak;Taylor;Wait, I've got an even better idea for it.
speak;Felicity;{tgm}...{tgm} I have a bad feeling about this.

name: BaseConvo_Pure Hydration
_source: speak;Trevor;Aqua, considering you have the most knowledge on Foliaga's Holy Knights,|is there anything you would recommend that we should purchase to combat them?

speak;Aqua;Weapons that could pierce through heavy armor is a good start since|there are many armored soldiers within their ranks.|Something that could protect us from magic would be essential as well,|since they have many powerful mages too.
speak;Trevor;I do recall Sam giving us a vial of something when we were in Oregot.
speak;Aqua;Yes, Pure Water! That's exactly what I was talking about.
speak;Aqua;Speaking of which, that stall over there has some. Let's go!
speak;Trevor;So, how DOES one use it, exactly? Do you drink it, or--
speak;Aqua;Please don't drink the Pure Water.

name: BaseConvo_Gated Community
_source: speak;Semi;You'll pop a blood vessel if you keep thinking that hard.
speak;Krista;Oh, hey, Semi! Quick question for ya.
speak;Krista;Mind looking at this gate here? I just wanna know if you can lockpick it.
speak;Semi;Yeah, I can give it a look.
speak;Semi;The lock's simple enough, so it'll be an easy job.
speak;Semi;What got you so interested in this gate anyway?
speak;Krista;I just wanna be on the lookout for things that might get in the way of us leaving town.|If the Knights spot us, they might lock us in.
speak;Semi;Huh. Pretty observant. I guess you're not as dumb as I thought you were.

name: BaseConvo_Family Reunion
_source: speak;Aqua;Azure! My dear brother, you're here too?|I thought you were still travelling the world with your troupe.
speak;Azure;I was, but I wanted to stop by the monestary to see how you were doing.
speak;Azure;When I heard from Lady Iris that you were not here, I feared the worst.
speak;Azure;So, I stayed behind to wait for your return.
speak;Aqua;I'm sorry for worrying you, but as you can see, I'm alright.|More importantly, have you heard what's been going on in Foliaga?
speak;Azure;Yes, I have. In fact, that's what had me worried.
speak;Azure;The thought of you captured by the Knights{tgm}...{tgm}|I hoped and prayed that was not the case.
speak;Aqua;Well, Princess Krista of Medeas is investigating things right now.|Semi and I have been assisting her.
speak;Azure;You don't say? Do you think she would not mind if I helped as well?
speak;Aqua;I'm sure she would be more than happy to have you on board!|Having a dancer with us is sure to be a great benefit.
speak;Azure;Excellent. I will do my best.

name: BaseConvo_A Unique Blade
_source: speak;Forrest;Pardon me, Lady Iris. May I ask a favor of you?
speak;Forrest;Her Highness' sword has gotten a lot of use,|so I was wondering if you know of anyone who could repair it.|It's one of a kind, so we cannot just get a replacement for it.
speak;Iris;We have our own smith who tends to our Knights' weaponry.|We shall take care of it right away.
speak;Forrest;That is a relief! I thank you.
speak;Iris;And there we are. Good as new.
speak;Forrest;Thank you again, Lady Iris.|I'm sure Princess Krista will be overjoyed to see her sword in such good condition.

name: SupportFelicityJoshua
_source: speak;Felicity;Joshua, what is the meaning of this?
speak;Joshua;Oh, these swords aren't mine. Well, except Old Iron here.|I offered to clean everyone's swords.
speak;Felicity;That is NOT what I was referring to, Joshua.
speak;Felicity;Look around you!|Her Highness has been very gracious in granting you a palace chamber,|and you let it get like this!|The state of this room is appalling!
speak;Joshua;What do you mean? There's no dust or rats or anything.
speak;Felicity;Oh sweet Medea! Where are your boots? Here on the nightstand?|Where's your armor? Hung up? No! It's thrown on the reading table.
speak;Joshua;You mean I can't temporarily put them there?
speak;Felicity;Of course not! Where did you grow up?
speak;Felicity;Don't answer that. I don't want to know.
speak;Joshua;Soooo{tgm}...{tgm} you want armor and clothes in the closet instead?
speak;Felicity;Yes, it would make my job easier.
speak;Felicity;Wait, isn't that Princess Krista's sword?
speak;Joshua;Yes, it's seen some heavy use.|I offered to sharpen it and clean it up. A few knicks in it too.|A little light for my liking, but it's a good blade. Well balanced.
speak;Felicity;You are something else.|Your room is worse than a rat's nest, but you keep your weapons and armor well-maintained.
speak;Joshua;If you don't maintain your weapons, they'll fail you when you need them most.
speak;Felicity;All of that is well and good,|but could you please maintain your chambers better?
speak;Felicity;Oh, next time you want to sneak out to the tavern,|I can get you out without Forrest knowing.
speak;Joshua;That woman is something else. Reminds me of one of my aunts.
speak;Joshua;Alright, just a little grime off the blade here, anddddd{tgm}...
speak;Joshua;Can't say I remember anyone using this axe before.|I wonder who it belongs to?
speak;Felicity;Ah, there you are, Joshua. Have you seen my--
speak;Felicity;Aha! I had a feeling my axe was with you.
speak;Joshua;Wait, you're saying this is yours?|I never expected you to know how to use martial weapons. Especially not axes.
speak;Joshua;I figured you'd prefer to be on the sidelines.|Provide support from a distance with that magic-y stuff you do.
speak;Felicity;I do not put myself in the line of fire if I can help it.|But having a Plan B can be useful just in case something goes wrong.
speak;Joshua;Makes sense to me. Still, if you miss, it'll be costly.|Re-orienting yourself after a whiff takes time.
speak;Felicity;Oh, I'm well-aware. But you know I can be light on my feet.
speak;Joshua;Yeah, but you can't depend on that all the time.
speak;Felicity;Well, if you think that, how about a quick spar?|I'll show you that my reflexes are more reliable than you think.|I'll help you sneak over to the tavern again if you win.
speak;Joshua;Hah! Sure thing, Felicity. Let's go!
speak;Felicity;Joshua, can't you move quietly?|The idea was to sneak through the servants' halls. That means NO noise.
speak;Joshua;I'm trying Felicity, but these halls are a little small and narrow.
speak;Felicity;That's because we don't hire lumbering, mountain men as maids.
speak;Maid1;Oh, am I in your way Miss Felicity?
speak;Joshua;You okay? Stubbed your toe or something?
speak;Felicity;No, I am NOT okay, Joshua!
speak;Felicity;She will think I'm sneaking a secret lover into or from my quarters!|That floozy hypocrite!
speak;Joshua;So? Who cares? I don't see how what she thinks matters.|It's not going to affect your standing with the princess or her parents.
speak;Felicity;It's the principle, Joshua!|I don't want unneeded attention or people talking about me.
speak;Joshua;Fuck 'em. Who gives a shit?|It's none of her business or|her damn place to back-talk someone as hard-working as you.
speak;Felicity;At least someone realizes I work hard around here.
speak;Joshua;You clearly work your ass off.|If she gives you hell, tell her to fuck off. Tell her where she can take her bitch ass.
speak;Felicity;Hee-hee. You sure you're not related to Her Highness?
speak;Felicity;Anyway, here's the back door. Have fun at the tavern.
speak;Joshua;Why don't you come too this time? I think you need to unwind a little.
speak;Joshua;You really want to deal with the other servants now?
speak;Felicity;It's been a millenia since I've taken it easy.
speak;Joshua;Huh, wonder what that was about?
speak;Felicity;What are you waiting for, Joshua? Come on!

name: SupportFelicityViola
_source: speak;Viola;Hey, Felicity, mind clearing up something for me?
speak;Viola;I'm trying to do the math in my head, and well{tgm}...
speak;Viola;Her Highness hired you seven years ago, right?
speak;Felicity;Oh, Viola, don't you know it's rude to ask a lady her age?
speak;Felicity;Besides, I stopped keeping track a long time ago.
speak;Viola;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Well, you look like you're around my age,|so that would mean you would've still been a teenager when you met Princess Krista.
speak;Viola;But that's not right! You look just like you did seven years ago.
speak;Felicity;You can say I aged quite gracefully, then.
speak;Felicity;As entertaining as this conversation is, Viola, I must return to my chores.|If you'll excuse me{tgm}...
speak;Viola;Either I'm bad at math or Felicity's hiding something.
speak;Viola;{tgm}...{tgm} I should probably review my textbooks.

name: BaseConvo_Living The Dream
_source: speak;Ecco;Anil, my friend, we totally hit the jackpot this time.
speak;Ecco;Just think of how much gold we're gonna get!
speak;Ecco;Do you think it would be too forward to ask our kind benefactor for our pay soon?
speak;Anil;[We just met her, so yes, of course it's too soon.]
speak;Ecco;*sigh* I had a feeling you'd say that.
speak;Ecco;Honestly, Anil, you gotta live a little.|This is the opportunity of a lifetime!
speak;Anil;[Unlike you, I'm enjoying things in moderation.]|[Besides, I'd rather finish the job first.]
speak;Ecco;You're too honorable for your own good, you know that?

name: BaseConvo_A Maids Duty
_source: speak;Felicity;Your Majesties, I have something to report.
speak;Thalia;Please let this be good news, Felicity.
speak;Felicity;I apologize, but I'm afraid Her Highness will be leaving the castle again.
speak;Felicity;This time to Oakenfaire in Foliaga.
speak;Thalia;She had only just returned home!|What business does she have at Foliaga's capital?
speak;Felicity;She had found two refugees from there in Oregot.|It seems Her Highness has agreed to help them investigate certain political matters.
speak;Thalia;Then, those rumors about the Archbishop were true{tgm}...
speak;Bryant;It's a delicate situation.|We had hoped to look into things ourselves when the time was right.
speak;Bryant;Knowing Krista, she will go on this mission of hers|even if we try to persuade her not to.
speak;Thalia;She certainly takes after you in that regard.
speak;Bryant;Regardless, this is much different from her usual escapades to Oregot.|We cannot let her do as she pleases.|Felicity, can we trust you to keep an eye on her?
speak;Felicity;I had anticipated this, so I already started packing supplies for the journey.|I also convinced Viola to accompany me on this venture.
speak;Bryant;Haha! Your intuition always astounds me, Felicity.|We'll leave this to you, then.
speak;Thalia;I pray that Krista does not face any danger on her journey.|However, it would ease my worries if you gave her this to aid her.

name: BaseConvo_Take the Load Off
_source: speak;Taylor;You know what this calls for, Alex?|A nice drink to celebrate another successful mission!
speak;Alex;Please tell me you're referring to a nice cup of tea this time.
speak;Taylor;I mean, if the weather were a little colder, sure.
speak;Taylor;But nah. I'm talking sbout a nice pint of beer for the both of us!
speak;Alex;Well, at least it's not anything TOO strong.
speak;Taylor;Of course not! We just got back to the castle.|Unless you want something stronger to take the load off.
speak;Taylor;Alright, lemme just get these poured out.
speak;Taylor;A toast to a successful rescue mission. Cheers!

name: BaseConvo_One Year Ago
_source: speak;Krista;Azalea, Samegoro, and Ervan{tgm}...{tgm} Why them?
speak;Forrest;Has anything similar happened in Oregot?
speak;Parker;The Oregotian Council is in chaos. Their leadership has completely fractured.|Two of their leaders have vanished without a trace,|leaving only three of them left to rule.
speak;Krista;And this all happened a year ago too?
speak;Krista;Damn it! What the hell is going on?
speak;Kai;Why hasn't Medeas been targeted yet?
speak;Kai;From an outside perspective, one could draw some conclusions.
speak;Parker;Hold on, Forrest.|Now, Kai, I understand your logic. However, there is one thing that doesn't add up.
speak;Parker;The late Prince Ervan was not the ruler of Fuegsol at the time.|Even when he was alive, he was engaged to Princess Krista.|He would have ruled Medeas alongside her.
speak;Parker;Since that is the case, King Gerolt, Queen Leeann, or even his brother Khalid|would have been more logical targets.
speak;Parker;Once Prince Ervan got married, Prince Khalid would have been next in line|to the throne.
speak;Forrest;An anomaly that could be key to solving this mystery.|We need to figure out what it can tell us.
speak;Kai;Alright, fair point. Leave no stone unturned and all that.
speak;Krista;I have a feeling we'll have more answers once we reach Edoyama.|Keep your eyes and ears open as we move forward, everyone.
if;game.check_alive('Forrest') == True or game.check_alive('Kai') == True or game.check_alive('Parker') == True
if;game.check_dead('Forrest') == True or game.check_dead('Kai') == True or game.check_dead('Parker') == True

name: BaseConvo_Retirement
_source: speak;Rembrandt;This village is so small and peaceful.|Perhaps when this is all over, I should retire here.
speak;Lucy;Oh, hello, Mister Rembrandt! What are you up to?
speak;Rembrandt;Just enjoying the peace and quiet. Care to join me?
speak;Lucy;The air feels so fresh and clean here. There's a nice breeze too.
speak;Rembrandt;This village being nestled in the mountains most likely has something to do with it.
speak;Lucy;Medeas has nothing like this. It's plains as far as the eye can see.
speak;Lucy;Maybe I should take my mother here one day.
speak;Lucy;My mother isn't feeling well, so I think a change of scenery would help.
speak;Rembrandt;Either way, I'm sure she would appreciate it, Lucy.
speak;Lucy;Oh, by the way, I found this pretty feather on the ground earlier.|You can have it if you want, Mister Rembrandt.
speak;Rembrandt;I'll take it. Thank you, Lucy.
speak;Lucy;I'm gonna get going. See you later!

name: BaseConvo_Prep Work
_source: speak;Kai;No need to be coy, Felicity. I know you're there.
speak;Kai;Look on the bright side. I didn't notice you as quickly this time.
speak;Felicity;Don't try flattering me.|We both know you were feigning ignorance.
speak;Felicity;Just curious about what you're up to.
speak;Kai;If you must know, I'm making preparations for our journey to Merinas.|Considering how we had to take down the Archbishop,|I figured we may need to confront Emperor Samegoro too.
speak;Kai;From what I remember of his forces, he has a good number of ninjas serving him.
speak;Kai;They'll more than likely wield weapons laced with poison, so I'm stocking up on Antitoxins.
speak;Felicity;Any other information on the emperor's forces, Kai?
speak;Felicity;You did work for him for a time, after all.
speak;Kai;Well, I'm done here. If you'll excuse me{tgm}...
speak;Felicity;Oh yeah. He's DEFINITELY hiding something.

name: BaseConvo_Target Practice
_source: speak;Forrest;I will leave you to it, then.
speak;Forrest;Are you sure? I do not wish to distract--
speak;Forrest;You're shooting as well as you did a year ago.
speak;Forrest;If only you were this dedicated with your history lessons.
speak;Forrest;{tgm}...{tgm} Prince Ervan taught you well.
speak;Forrest;I remember the two of you conversing like this during archery lessons.
speak;Forrest;Was that part of the training regimen?
speak;Krista;Oh, Medea, he was such a dork{tgm}...
speak;ErvanFlashback;What was that one book you were reading again?
speak;ErvanFlashback;Ah, isn't that one about the village boy who befriends a beast who|lived in an underground cavern?
speak;KristaFlashback;Pretty good. Could lend it to you later.
speak;ErvanFlashback;Mind telling me more about it?
speak;KristaFlashback;You're just gonna complain that I spoiled the whole thing for you|when you actually start reading it.
speak;ErvanFlashback;Heh. Don't try to butter me up now.
speak;ErvanFlashback;Hmm{tgm}...{tgm} I suppose I'll let you off easy with that answer this time.
speak;KristaFlashback;Why do you like hearing me talk about basically nothing, anyway?
speak;ErvanFlashback;If you can keep focused on your target even with distractions,|you'll get better at archery.
speak;ErvanFlashback;I like hearing your lovely voice.
speak;Krista;Why{tgm}...{tgm} did things have to turn out like this{tgm}...?

name: BaseConvo_Teacher and Student
_source: speak;Parker;We're going to leave Medeas soon, Cole. Do you have your things ready?

speak;Parker;This will be unlike the training I had you undergo for the past few months.|There will be people out there who will intend to harm you,|and you must make sure you defend yourself.|No holding back. Understand?
speak;Parker;I do not mean to scare you, Cole, but that is the reality of the situation.|You have been doing well with your studies,|and I believe this is something you can handle.
speak;Parker;Of course. If I did not think that,|I would not have had you accompany me in the first place.
speak;Parker;While I would prefer you to continue your studies in theoretical magic applications,|there may not be another opportunity to put your knowledge into practice.
speak;Parker;And as I said before, you are capable of taking on this task.
speak;Parker;You can do this, Cole. I believe in you.

name: BaseConvo_Nimble Fingers
_source: speak;Krista;Wait, what did you call me?
speak;Krista;Actually, I could get used to that.
speak;Krista;Shoot, no, I'm getting distracted here.
speak;Matthew;I can undo pesky locks and take little things that people won't miss.|All qualities of nimble fingers, no?
speak;Krista;Yeah, but I thought you meant{tgm}...
speak;Krista;That you were, y'know, good with your hands!
speak;Matthew;Doesn't that mean the same thing?
speak;Krista;No, not like that! I mean like{tgm}...
speak;Matthew;Heh, maybe I don't need to rush back to Ostia after all.

name: BaseConvo_Other Parts
_source: speak;Sam;Uh, Chell?|Why are you stretching like that in front of a mirror?
speak;Chell;Sam!|You should know a man should knock before entering a lady's chambers.
speak;Chell;Especially when he never wears a shirt.;;;thought_bubble
speak;Sam;Why? Is there a bodybuilding contest coming up?
speak;Chell;Bodybuilding? No, that's not it.|Do you remember when we reunited in Oregot?
speak;Sam;Sure do! Uncanny how all of you were there.
speak;Chell;"Uncanny" is certainly a way to put it.
speak;Chell;At any rate, do you remember what you said about me?|That I had gotten bigger too?
speak;Chell;You said the same thing when we were training the other day.|By "bigger" did you mean{tgm}...
speak;Sam;What's wrong? I don't get why you're so confused.
speak;Sam;I was talking about your muscles! You've clearly been training hard all these years.|You look strong.
speak;Chell;Then, you weren't talking about my{tgm}...{tgm} other parts?
speak;Sam;No. Wait, other parts?|What is that supposed to mean?
speak;Chell;That does make me feel better, though.
speak;Chell;Anyway, I'm heading to the training yard now if you wish to join me!
speak;Sam;"Other parts"? What did she mean by that?
speak;Sam;What other parts does she have?
speak;Sam;Her muscles look great though. I think I'll join her.

name: DeathNonConditional_Poison
condition: (unit.get_field('DeathQuote') or (unit.get_field('DeathQuoteCh15') and game.level.nid == '15')) and unit2.nid is None

name: FightAdler
_source: speak;Adler;Medean forces, stand down!|Your presence is unwelcome here!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightAdlerKrista
_source: speak;Krista;Wait, how do you know who I am?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Adler;It matters not. Your journey ends here!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: Arena
_source: #Add a layer in the map editor to turn the whole map into the Arena terrain type
# Find tier of class of player unit to determine enemy's tier
# Randomly choose the enemy's class from the pool
level_var;ArenaEnemyKlassList;[k.nid for k in DB.classes if 'ArenaIgnore' not in k.tags and k.tier == game.level_vars['EnemyTier']]
# Calculate level range for enemy and pick level at random
# Calculate arena wager based on enemy level
# This is just a way for the enemy to counter attack at range if need be. You can take this out if you want.

# Equip enemy with weapon. The order of the weapons in this list is based on the order of classes in the Class editor. There is probably a cleaner way to find what weapon to equip a certain class with.

level_var;EnemyWeaponList;['Iron Sword', 'Iron Sword', 'Iron Sword','Iron Lance', 'Iron Lance', 'Iron Lance', 'Iron Lance', 'Iron Lance', 'Iron Lance', 'Iron Axe', 'Iron Axe', 'Iron Axe', 'Iron Axe', 'Short Bow', 'Lightning', 'Fire', 'Flux', 'Iron Lance', 'Iron Lance']

level_var;EnemyWeaponList;['Lightning', 'Iron Sword', 'Iron Axe', 'Iron Sword', 'Iron Sword', 'Iron Lance', 'Iron Axe', 'Iron Lance', 'Fire', 'Iron Sword', 'Iron Axe', 'Iron Axe', 'Iron Axe', 'Short Bow', 'Lightning', 'Fire', 'Flux', 'Lightning', 'Iron Axe', 'Iron Sword']

level_var;EnemyWeaponList;['Iron Sword', 'Iron Sword', 'Iron Axe', 'Iron Sword', 'Iron Lance', 'Iron Sword', 'Iron Sword', 'Iron Lance', 'Iron Axe', 'Iron Axe', 'Short Bow', 'Lightning', 'Fire', 'Lightning', 'Iron Axe', 'Iron Sword']

speak;;What are you wasting my time for?;64,8;160;noir
