# Calculate arena wager based on enemy level
speak;;What! You don't have any money! Get out of here!;64,8;160;noir
choice;ArenaChoice;Would you like to wager {var:ArenaWager} gold?;Yes,No;backable
speak;;Good luck. Don't get yourself killed.;64,8;160;noir

speak;Joshua;Hey, you're my opponent this round?|Let's make this interesting, then!|See, I hit pretty hard, so most people go down easy if they're up against me.|If you survive for one round, I'll say that you won. Sound like a plan?
speak;;So you won, eh? Here's your prize. {eval:2*game.level_vars['ArenaWager']} gold.;64,8;160;noir
speak;Joshua;Not bad. I like you!|What's that? You need people to join your army?|If there's more people like you in it, then count me in!
speak;;What are you wasting my time for?;64,8;160;noir
speak;;What! You don't have a weapon! Get out of here!;64,8;160;noir

name: KristaMarinaTalk
_source: speak;Marina;Are you here to fight the Knights?
speak;Krista;Uh, kinda? More like we're trying to get away from them right now.|But ultimately, yeah, we're on opposing sides.
speak;Marina;Please let me help you, then!|The Holy Knights have been nothing but trouble for the past year.|I want Foliaga to know peace again.
speak;Krista;Well, who am I to turn down a helping hand?
speak;Marina;Marina. I'll do my best for you!

name: ForrestMarinaTalk
_source: speak;Marina;Are you here to fight the Knights?
speak;Forrest;"Fight" would not be the term I would use at the moment.
speak;Forrest;But, yes, they are against us.
speak;Marina;Please let me help you, then!|The Holy Knights have been nothing but trouble for the past year.|I want Foliaga to know peace again.
speak;Forrest;No disrespect, madam,|but you do not appear to have any combat experience.
speak;Marina;That may be true, but I am a dancer.|My dances have magical properties that can help you all.
speak;Forrest;Is that so? If that's the case, you may come along.|On the condition that you do not put yourself in unnecessary danger.
speak;Marina;That should go without saying, sir knight.
speak;Forrest;I only wished to give you a fair warning.
speak;Forrest;From here on out, I will not be held accountable for your actions.|Now, may I ask for your name?
speak;Forrest;Forrest. Now, keep my words in mind, Miss Marina.

name: TalkKristaRembrandt
_source: speak;Rembrandt;You there! Young lady! Do you need assistance?
speak;Krista;With the pirates? Yeah, some help would be very much appreciated.
speak;Rembrandt;You hardly ever see a pirate crew take their assault to shore like this.|Did you do something to provoke them?
speak;Krista;To be fair, they're the ones who started it.|They were trying to raid a local monestary, so we stopped them.
speak;Krista;Needless to say, they weren't too happy about that.
speak;Rembrandt;How petty. Though, that's how ruffians of any kind tend to be.|It's decided. I'll help you. Who might you be?
speak;Krista;Krista, princess of Medeas. And you?
speak;Rembrandt;Rembrandt, former soldier of Fuegsol's royal army.
speak;Krista;"Former" soldier? Aw man, now I feel bad for dragging you to the battlefield.
speak;Rembrandt;Worry not, Your Highness. Though I prefer to settle things peacefully,|there are times blades are needed to quell a conflict.

name: TalkKristaRembrandt
_source: speak;Rembrandt;Excuse me, young lady. Are you alright?
speak;Krista;Could be better, could be worse. Who are you?
speak;Rembrandt;My name is Rembrandt.|I just happened to be passing through this area and saw your wrecked vessel in the distance.|Knowing that there were survivors from the wreck is a relief.
speak;Rembrandt;But these bandits aren't making things easy for you.
speak;Krista;Yeah, we've got our hands full.
speak;Krista;I know this is a lot to ask for since we just met and all,|but mind giving us a hand here?
speak;Rembrandt;That's exactly what I came here for.|This is no trouble at all.

name: TalkMarinaRembrandt
_source: speak;Marina;Well, isn't this a pleasant surprise?|Mister Rembrandt, wasn't it?
speak;Rembrandt;Yes. And you're{tgm}...{tgm} Miss Marina, correct?
speak;Marina;How sweet of you to remember.
speak;Marina;If anything, I'm more surprised you remember little ol' me.
speak;Rembrandt;We can discuss more of that later.|It seems you and your friends are having trouble with these bandits.
speak;Marina;And you'd be right.|The brutes suddenly attacked us right after we got shipwrecked!
speak;Rembrandt;How horrible. But worry not, Miss Marina. I'm here to help.
speak;Marina;Thank you, Mister Rembrandt.|It truly is wonderful to be reunited with you.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Ferrach;So, you think you've won? Far from it!|This is only the beginning, spawn of Medea. You are only delaying the inevitable.
speak;Krista;Dammit, quit it with the cryptic stuff! Just what are you--
speak;Krista;Green hair and golden robes{tgm}...{tgm} It's you!
speak;Ferrach;I see my reputation precedes me.
speak;Ferrach;Ask and you shall receive, spawn of Medea.
speak;Krista;Who are you?! Stay away from the Archbishop!
speak;Ferrach;Ask and you shall receive, spawn of Medea.
speak;Krista;Hey! We're not through with you!!
speak;Aqua;Your Highness, we must tend to the Archbishop.
speak;Aqua;Your Highness, we must tend to the Archbishop.
speak;Krista;Why do you keep calling me "Medea"?|I'm just his descendant, so why--
speak;Krista;Huh? "Medea"?|Your Excellency, snap out of it! I'm not--
speak;Aqua;What a relief{tgm}...{tgm} She is still breathing, at least.|As long as her wounds are taken care of, she should be--
speak;KristaFlashback;So, Ervan, what's this super cool thing you wanted to show me?|Another ancient artifact or something?
speak;ErvanFlashback;Why, yes it is.|It's a pendant that's allegedly at least one thousand years old.|The merchant at the marketplace said it's supposed to be a good luck charm.
speak;KristaFlashback;You better not have been duped.

speak;ErvanFlashback;I have a good feeling about its legitimacy.|Most modern holy symbols and the like are mainly made of metals or alloys.|And as you can see, this pendant seems to be mostly from stone.
speak;KristaFlashback;Oooohhh. Yeah, I see what you mean.|So, what's this symbol, then? I don't recognize it at all.

speak;ErvanFlashback;I'm not sure. That's why I bought it in the first place.|In fact, it's one of the main reasons why I came to Medeas today.|I'm hoping the castle library may have some books on it.
speak;KristaFlashback;That, and you wanted to see your lovely fiancee, right?
speak;ErvanFlashback;You know I don't need an excuse to do that.
speak;KristaFlashback;But no seriously, mind if I tag along with the whole research thing?
speak;ErvanFlashback;Do you even need to ask?|I was under the assumption you would help anyway.
speak;Krista;We didn't find anything that day,|so he ended up doing research on his own later on.;;;thought_bubble
speak;Krista;Ervan... Just what did you find?|If you were still here, could you have done something?;;;thought_bubble
speak;Krista;She's alive, yeah. But she isn't looking too good.
speak;Priest1;I shall fetch the clerics to tend to her immediately.|However, what happens now?
speak;Priest1;Foliaga has been in turmoil for an entire year.|Even if Her Excellency makes a full recovery,|it doesn't mean the nation itself will follow.

speak;Kai;Ensure the Archbishop sees to a speedy recovery.|You clergymen are in a position to rule temporarily, I'm sure.|Take care of her duties in her stead|and assist her in bringing Foliaga back on its feet.
speak;Priest1;Understood. I thank you for your wisdom, kind sir.
speak;Kai;Of course. You seemed preoccupied with your own thoughts.
speak;Kai;At any rate, we should return to the castle immediately.
speak;Kai;Not only has Foliaga been on a downward spiral for the past year,|but so has Yondo as a whole.
speak;Kai;The more time passes, the worse things get.
speak;Kai;We need to plan our next move before it's too late.
speak;Krista;Felicity! Come on! We gotta go!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Kai;Mind giving us some space, Princess?
speak;Ryuuji;Look, I know I've been gone for a while--
speak;Kai;"Gone"?! You were captured by pirates, and now you're suddenly their captain?|What the hell!?
speak;Ryuuji;Damn, five whole years and you're still an impatient brat.
speak;Ryuuji;Long story short, the old captain liked me enough to let me live.|Then he let me take over the crew.
speak;Kai;How can you be so nonchalant about this?
speak;Kai;I thought I lost you.|For so long, I wondered what I'd do without you.|And now you're here in front of me again.
speak;Kai;I wasn't prepared to have you see me like this.
speak;Ryuuji;Speaking of which, why are you with Medean royalty?|What happened to--
speak;Kai;Things are getting bad, so I had to do some investigating.
speak;Ryuuji;Fine, fine. We can talk more about that later.
speak;Ryuuji;So, where are you all headed?
speak;Kai;Edoyama. We need to get there as soon as we can.
speak;Ryuuji;I'd be careful if I were you. I've been hearing things about the emperor.
speak;Ryuuji;Now hold on. I don't operate like that anymore, Kai.
speak;Kai;Anything I can do to make you spill?
speak;Ryuuji;Let me make an offer.|If you tell me what you've been doing the past five years,|I'll tell you everything I know and my crew will be at your disposal.
speak;Ryuuji;This info's for your ears only.
speak;Ryuuji;With how everything's been lately, I can't trust them royal types, y'know?
speak;Ryuuji;So no word of this goes to your new boss, alright?
speak;Kai;What makes you think I won't just relay this information to her anyway?
speak;Ryuuji;Don't play dumb with me, ya brat.|I know how that head of yours works.
speak;Kai;You've got yourself a deal, Kenji.
speak;Krista;So, I finally got the mango, and that goose was STILL honking its neck off--
speak;Taiga;Hahaha!! Man, you're a riot, Krista!
speak;Kai;Your Highness, we're good now. The Wyrmfang Pirates agreed to help us.
speak;Krista;We got a whole pirate crew on our side?! That's so cool!
speak;Taiga;We're working together now? Nice!|You better tell me more of that story, then, Krista.
speak;Krista;Sure, sure. We've got all the time in the world!
speak;Krista;Let's keep going, everyone! Onwards to Edoyama!
speak;Krista;Sorry, Kai. That didn't work out the way I intended.
speak;Kai;It's{tgm}...{tgm} It's fine. I was probably wrong about him anyway.
speak;Krista;Not much we can do about it.

name: SouthGateWarning
_source: speak;Lorelei;They're escaping! Prepare to close the gates!
speak;Krista;Let's get on the other side of those gates before they close!

name: NorthGateWarning
_source: speak;Lorelei;They're approaching the northern gate!|Prepare to close the uptown gates!
speak;Krista;You know the drill, guys. Move!

name: PrepMarketTutorial
_source: speak;Jake;Oh hey, since we're here, you can buy stuff from us when you <red>Prepare</red> for battle.|Just let us know when you have to <red>Manage</red> your gear.|We'll set up a <red>Market</red> for you guys to shop through.|Pretty convenient having a couple of merchants around, huh?
speak;Anna;And don't worry, even if we get hurt real bad out there,|you can always depend on us to supply you with merchandise.

name: Seize
_source: speak;Anna;First fort's seized! Keep it up, everyone!
speak;Jake;Got another one! Just a few more to go!

name: DevilAxe
condition: any_unit_in_region('Lake', nid='Sam') or any_unit_in_region('Lake',nid='Chell') or any_unit_in_region('Lake',nid='Taylor')
_source: speak;Sam;Alright, this should make a good vantage point--
speak;Sam;Oh no! I dropped my axe!
speak;Chell;If I fly over the lake, I should make it to the farther forts in no time.
speak;Chell;My axe! It fell into the lake!
speak;Taylor;Alright, the fort by the lake is in sight.|Just gotta go around and--
speak;Taylor;Aw no! I dropped my axe in the lake!
speak;LakeSpirit;Greetings, young one. I am the guardian spirit of this lake.|Did you drop the axe in my right hand, or the one in my left?
speak;Sam;The one in your right, of course!|The one in your left hand looks a little strange{tgm}...
speak;Chell;The one in your left hand looks nothing like mine.|So, the one in your right.
speak;Taylor;It's the one in your right!
speak;LakeSpirit;For your honesty, you may take both axes.
speak;Sam;Oh, it's alright. I'll just take my own axe--
speak;Taylor;That's really nice of you. Thanks!
speak;Sam;This axe is giving me a bad feeling{tgm}...
speak;Chell;Looking closer at this axe, I'm not sure if I really want it.|I feel a bad energy from it{tgm}...
speak;Taylor;Hmm{tgm}...{tgm} This axe is a little{tgm}...
speak;Taylor;Yeah, I dunno if I want this anymore.

name: Event
_source: speak;Matthew;Lucky, is that you?! Man, am I glad to see you.|It's good to see a familiar face around here.
speak;Krista;Whoa, hold on there! Who are you? I have no idea who you are.
speak;Matthew;What do you mean? It's me, Matthew! Remember?
speak;Krista;S-Sorry. I think you got me mixed up with someone else.
speak;Matthew;Ah, sorry. It's just that you look like someone I knew.
speak;Matthew;Hey, mind if I stick with you, though?|I have no idea where I am, and I need to go back home.
speak;Matthew;I can make it worth your while.
speak;Matthew;She may not be her, but she sure acts like her.

name: ReinforceWarning
_source: speak;Krista;I think I hear footsteps coming from the basement.|We'd better wrap things up soon.

name: SpawnXiang
_source: speak;Xiang;Medea's kin{tgm}...{tgm} I feel her approaching.{br}Just as was foretold.|I shall clear a path for her.

name: TalkKristaXiang
_source: speak;Xiang;Daughter of Medea{tgm}...{tgm} you finally arrive.
speak;Krista;Uh, I know Medea's an ancestor of mine and all,|but that's a bit much, don't you think?|More importantly, who are you?
speak;Xiang;I am Xiang. I foresaw your arrival, daughter of Medea.
speak;Krista;Nice to meet you.|Now, let's drop the whole "daughter of Medea" thing, okay?|You can call me "Your Highness", "Princess Krista"{tgm}...{tgm}|Even just "Krista" is fine.
speak;Krista;{tgm}...{tgm} We'll work on that later.

name: TalkFelicityXiang
_source: speak;Xiang;You have a certain power within you.
speak;Xiang;You are with Medea's kin, yes?
speak;Felicity;You mean Princess Krista? Why do you want to know?
speak;Xiang;I foresaw her arrival to this place.|Though, you being with her is curious.|Considering what you are--
speak;Felicity;Hey, hey, hey, keep your mouth shut about that.|Look, if you have business with Her Highness, I'll let you tag along|as long as you don't tell anyone about what you know about me.

name: GameOver_Poison
condition: game.check_dead('Krista') and game.level.nid != '15' and unit2.nid is None

name: GameOver
condition: game.check_dead('1') and game.check_dead('2') and game.check_dead('3') and game.check_dead('4') and game.check_dead('5') and game.check_dead('6') and game.check_dead('7') and game.check_dead('8') and game.check_dead('9')

name: GameOver
condition: game.check_dead('Forrest') == True or game.check_dead('Trevor') == True or game.check_dead('Kai') == True

name: Outro
_source: speak;Aqua;I believe so. Though it's just its entrance hall, it's quite beautiful.
speak;Semi;We're not here for sightseeing, remember?|Let's figure out how to get into the temple.
speak;Ferrach;You fools! How did you let the Medeans get past our defenses?
speak;SoldierGreenFemale;H-Have mercy! There was nothing we could do!
speak;Ferrach;Because of you, the Medean forces are now at the capital.|What do you have to say for yourselves?! If I had half a mind, I'd--
speak;Azalea;The both of you are dismissed. You may return to your posts.|Do not fail us again.
speak;SoldierGreenFemale;We will not let you down!
speak;Azalea;Ferrach, I respect your wisdom and have found you to be a competent advisor for the|past year. However, things have gone too far.
speak;Ferrach;Too far? Whatever could you mean?
speak;Azalea;It's one thing to punish ne'er-do-wells and heretics for their sins.|But to think that those with blackened hearts are within our entire clergy{tgm}...{tgm}|That's unthinkable!

speak;Azalea;The Holy Knights, the bishops and clerics of Folia{tgm}...{tgm}|They have all vowed to serve the Great Folia with the utmost piety.|None of them would even consider turning their backs on him.
speak;Azalea;We must release the prisoners we have and pray to the Great Folia for his forgivness.
speak;Ferrach;Is that what you truly think?
speak;Ferrach;As you were saying, Your Excellency?
speak;Ferrach;Go on and rest, milord. It has been such a long day for you, hasn't it?
speak;Ferrach;Do not worry about a thing, milord.|Your humble servant Ferrach shall take care of everything from here.
if;{v:knightHelp} == True and game.check_alive('s1') == True and game.check_alive('s2') == True
speak;Matthew;Sorry, but I don't think I will.
speak;SoldierGreenFemale;I-I've got a lance and I'm not afraid to use it!
speak;Matthew;Relax, I'm not here to hurt anyone.|Wrong place, wrong time is all.
speak;Matthew;And your friend here's just knocked out.|Get out of here and take care of him, alright?|We can just pretend none of this happened.
speak;SoldierGreenFemale;Fine, whatever! Not a word of this to anybody!
speak;Matthew;What a strange place{tgm}...{tgm} It's nothing like Ostia. Not at all.|I'll just keep snooping around here. I'm sure I'll find something of use.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Forrest;We must proceed with caution. A powerful enemy awaits us.
speak;Krista;Look alive, guys! The end's in sight!
speak;SoldierGreen;You there! Are you the ones responsible for destroying the Charm Stones?
speak;Krista;The weird red orb things? Yup, that was us!
speak;Priest1;We must humbly thank you for freeing us from their spell.|Those of us who were cursed had no ill will towards your group, princess of Medeas.
speak;Krista;Yeah, we had a feeling that was the case. Are you guys doing alright?
speak;SoldierGreen;Still feeling a bit light-headed, but nothing a good night's rest can't fix.
speak;SoldierGreen;I'm just glad all of us are back to our normal selves.
speak;SoldierGreen;I'm just glad most of us are back to our normal selves.
speak;Priest1;We shall tend to the others and make sure they are well.
speak;Priest1;As a token of our appreciation, please take this with you.
speak;Krista;That's very kind of you, but you guys probably need that more than we do.
speak;SoldierGreen;Don't even worry about it. Just take it!
speak;Priest1;Good luck on your mission, Your Highness.|Please bring Her Excellency back to her senses!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;Alright, Port Gildress is safe and sound!|Onto the ship, everyone!
speak;Kai;Hmm{tgm}...{tgm} Now why would that pirate girl have{tgm}...?
speak;Krista;Kai, come on! We gotta go!
speak;Man2;Your Highness, we of Port Gildress must humbly thank you for your assistance.
speak;Krista;No need for thanks. We just did what we had to.
speak;Man2;Please take this as a token of our appreciation.
speak;Krista;Wh-Whoa there! Are you sure?|Especially with those pirates--
speak;Man2;It's the least we can do, Your Highness.|Port Gildress will be back to its former glory in due time.|Please do not worry about us.
speak;Krista;It'll be smooth sailing from here.
speak;Krista;Come on, no need to be *crabby* about it.
speak;Krista;Because, y'know, we're out at sea and--
speak;Parker;One more terrible pun out of you, and I'm throwing you overboard.
speak;Krista;Oh, come on! That one was good!!
speak;Taiga;Still bummed about Shinobu leaving, Cap?
speak;Ryuuji;"Bummed," no. More annoyed, if anything.
speak;Ryuuji;That kid's way in over her head. Defecting like that was stupid of her.
speak;Taiga;Aw, good riddance! We don't need crewmates like her to keep us afloat.
speak;Taiga;Our good ol' Captain Ryuuji is all we need!
speak;Ryuuji;No need to flatter me like that, Taiga.
speak;Tetsuya;Captain! A royal Medean's ship's approaching!
speak;Ryuuji;Is that so? A nice big haul's sailing right up our doorstep.|Let's pay them a visit.
speak;Ryuuji;Sail onwards, crew! We've got a ship to raid!

name: BaseConvo_Touch Base
_source: speak;Kai;If you don't mind, Lady Iris,|would it be possible to get your perspective on what's been going on in Foliaga?|It may help us with our investigation.

speak;Iris;Yes, of course.|I'm sure you are aware that many of Foliaga's citizens are vanishing.|Though most people believe it merely to be rumors, the Holy Knights are truly to blame.|But even more so, the Archbishop is the one commanding them.
speak;Krista;Yeah, we figured out all that on our own the hard way.
speak;Kai;Anything you can disclose about the Archbishop herself?|Has she exhibited behavior like this in the past?
speak;Iris;This is beyond unusual for her.|She treats her people with the utmost kindness and respect.|She would never do something like this under normal circumstances.
speak;Iris;Something changed one year ago.|That is approximately when people started to disappear.
speak;Krista;N-No. It's nothing. Carry on, Lady Iris.
speak;Iris;Now that I think of it, there was something{tgm}...
speak;Iris;Or rather, someone different in the Archbishop's presence.

speak;Iris;When I would go to the Grand Temple of Folia in the capital,|I would catch a glimpse of someone at her side.|A young man whom I've never seen before.|He had green hair and wore golden robes.
speak;Iris;There is an unusual energy about him. I cannot place what it could be.
speak;Iris;I assume he may have an aptitude for magic.
speak;Kai;Sounds like we've got a lead.
speak;Kai;Anything else noticable about him, Lady Iris?
speak;Iris;I apologize, but that is all I know.
speak;Kai;That's alright. You've been a great help.
speak;Krista;Yeah! We'll keep an eye out for our mystery man.

name: BaseConvo_Stained Glass
_source: speak;Viola;Oh, Felicity! Looking at the pretty windows?
speak;Felicity;Ah, Viola. Yes, I suppose you can say that.
speak;Viola;They're really beautiful. Is this what Folia's supposed to look like?
speak;Felicity;At any rate, it would be wise to touch base with Her Highness, would it not?|I'm sure she's curious about how you've been doing.
speak;Felicity;Your sister is most likely wondering how you're faring as well.
speak;Viola;Oh, good idea! See ya later, Felicity!
speak;Felicity;If things remained the same{tgm}...{tgm} we'd have no need for things such as these{tgm}...

name: BanditTag
_source: if;game.get_unit('{banditUnits}').generic == True and 'Tile' not in game.get_unit('{banditUnits}').tags and game.get_unit('{banditUnits}').team in ['enemy','enemy2','enemy_1','enemy2_1']

name: FemaleTag
_source: if;game.get_unit('{femaleUnits}').generic == True and 'Tile' not in game.get_unit('{femaleUnits}').tags and (game.get_unit('{femaleUnits}').team == 'enemy_1' or game.get_unit('{femaleUnits}').team == 'other')

name: FightPeony
_source: speak;Peony;This is your last chance!|Surrender now, or I will show no mercy!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightPeonyCeleste
_source: speak;Celeste;You Knights have done nothing but make|my friends and family miserable! This ends here!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Peony;How dare you speak of the Holy Knights that way?|I will make you eat those words!;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: TalkKristaCeleste
_source: speak;Krista;Hey, you! You don't look like you're one of the Knights.
speak;Celeste;I'm not. My name's Celeste. I'm here looking for my friend Michael.|He joined the Knights recently and I'm worried about him.
speak;Krista;He wanted to help us and fought well until the end.|I wouldn't have asked for a better knight.
speak;Krista;Y'know, you can join us too. We're trying to take down the Knights.
speak;Krista;Michael, huh? I don't think we ran into any Knights with that name.
speak;Krista;But anyway, we're trying to take down the Knights too.
speak;Krista;Bad stuff's going down, and I have a feeling that's why you're against them too.
speak;Celeste;Exactly! I'd love to join forces with you all. For Foliaga's sake!
speak;Celeste;And to honor Michael's memory too.
speak;Celeste;Oh, one more thing! Some of the Knights are under some sort of mind control magic.|If we get rid of those red gems on the walls, those Knights will fight on our side.
speak;Krista;Hey, that's actually pretty useful!|Let's break 'em when we see 'em!

name: TalkMichaelCeleste
_source: speak;Celeste;Michael! I'm so glad I found you!|Those Knights didn't try to brainwash you, did they?
speak;Michael;Brainwash?? Wait{tgm}...{tgm} is that what's going on here?
speak;Celeste;Yeah, I saw it with my own two eyes back home.|Everyone who was against the Archbishop got mind controlled.
speak;Celeste;The Knights back in Florene Village{tgm}...{tgm} they{tgm}...
speak;Celeste;And Mother{tgm}...{tgm}I {tgm}...{tgm} I don't know if she's okay{tgm}...
speak;Celeste;And that's why I'm here. To save you!|Last I checked, you were still undergoing your training,|so I came all the way to the capital to bust you outta here!
speak;Celeste;So they DID get you too!
speak;Michael;Wh-What?! No!|I was about to say I'm working with the princess of Medeas to sort out this mess.
speak;Celeste;Woah, really? I should get in on this too!|Think that'll be okay?
speak;Michael;W-Well, she seems to be okay with anyone joining.|I'd probably ask her permission first--
speak;Celeste;I'm sure it'll be fine! She'll onboard anyone. You said so yourself!|Anyway, I'm gonna beat up some Knights and crack some gems!
speak;Michael;Please, for the love of Folia, don't cause too much trouble{tgm}...
speak;Michael;And what was that last thing about cracking gems? Does Celeste know something?
speak;Michael;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} I should probably let the others know about this.

name: FightFerrach
_source: speak;Ferrach;You must have a death wish.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightAzalea
_source: speak;Azalea;You{tgm}...{tgm} have no right{tgm}...{tgm}{br}to oppose me{tgm}...;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightFerrachKrista
_source: speak;Ferrach;So, spawn of Medea, you finally arrive.|How was the journey here? Not too much trouble, was it?;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Krista;Hmph, wouldn't you like to know.;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Ferrach;Normally, I am one for formalities.|However, I find them to be unnecessary here.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Ferrach;My master harbors no respect for Medea's ilk. Nor do I.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightFerrachForrest
_source: speak;Ferrach;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} My, my. This is certainly a surprise.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Ferrach;That does not matter at the moment, does it?|In fact, I'd say YOUR identity is much more interesting.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Forrest;What are you going on about?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Ferrach;If only you knew just what you were.|You of all people serving Medea's ilk{tgm}...;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Ferrach;Hah! Oh, the irony of it all{tgm}...;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightFerrachFelicity
_source: speak;Ferrach;How laughable!|To think someone like you would be allied with Medea's kin.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Felicity;Just what is going on here? Why are you doing this?|Why now of all times?;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Ferrach;You have no business knowing that.|After all, you have chosen your side.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None
speak;Ferrach;My master has no patience for traitors.;;;boss_convo_left;;;;;;;None

name: FightAzaleaKrista
_source: speak;Krista;Hey, snap out of it! I don't wanna fight you.|And I know you don't want this either!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None
speak;Krista;But this is for your own good!;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: MusicChange
_source: # No music hints for Fog of War maps! #

name: OutroKaiDeath
_source: speak;Kai;Argh{tgm}...{tgm} This wound's pretty deep. I can't work like this.
speak;Krista;We gotta get you back to the castle right away.|I can have the clerics tend to you--
speak;Kai;And leave you without a tactician? No way.
speak;Kai;I'll be taking it easy on the sidelines, Princess.|Don't worry about me, alright? I can still walk, y'know.|Can't fight probably, but that's not the only reason I'm here, right?

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;After saving Krista from the clutches of the Grash Mountain Bandits,|Forrest and the others make their way out of the nation of Oregot and back to Medeas.|With them still in bandit territory, the journey back home won't be a smooth one.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;With their new companions Chell and Sam, Krista and her retainers head southward|towards the Detri bandit clan's fortress to assist Sam in his never-ending quest to|eradicate every bandit in Oregot.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;Krista and her party escape from the Detri bandit fortress|with their new friends, Aqua and Semi, in tow.|They make way to Sam's place to rest for the evening.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;After the assault on Fuegsol Castle, Krista and friends strategize their next move.|However, the looming threat of Circ and its forces plagues our heroes.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;After the assault on Fuegsol Castle, Krista and friends strategize their next move.|However, the looming threat of Circ and its forces plagues our heroes.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;After an evening run-in with bandits, Krista and friends continue on their way to the|Oregot-Medeas border.|Though they make way at the break of dawn, more danger awaits them on the road ahead.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;Worried for the safety of her companions,|Krista heads deep into the Medregot bandit fortress to|release them from the ruffians' clutches.;;;overworld_narration
music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;Krista and friends cross the Oregot-Medeas border and|escape the hordes of bandits pursuing them.|They head back to Medeas Castle to recuperate and plan for the mission ahead.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;Krista and friends cross the Oregot-Medeas border and escape the bandit fortress.|They head back to Medeas Castle to recuperate and plan for the mission ahead.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;After defending the village of Windbrook from Foliaga's Holy Knights,|Krista and friends make their way towards Lake Lunaris to prepare for|the rest of their journey to Foliaga's capital.|The sun begins to set, so the party makes camp in the forest for the evening.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;Despite knowing the dangers, Krista and friends continue onwards towards|Lake Lunaris to stock up on supplies as they venture further into Foliaga.;;;overworld_narration
music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;Deciding to take caution, Krista and friends make their way to Vergrande Monastery|with Aqua and Semi taking the lead.|Though the Holy Knights are temporarily thrown off their tracks,|a new threat awaitens the party.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;Krista's vessel hits a storm and is sent off course across Merinas's seas.|Now shipwrecked, our heroes attempt to regain their bearings and plan their next move.;;;overworld_narration
music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;With the Scourge Sisters apprehended,|Krista and crew continue to sail northward to Edoyama.|They make a pitstop at the affluent Gintoki Island where they may finally|catch a break for once.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;Krista and friends make no delay in saving their friends from the Holy Knights' grasp.|They quickly trek to the outskirts of town and chase down the Knights.;;;overworld_narration
music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;Agreeing to help Anna and Jake, Krista and friends travel deep within the former village|of Hache Valley to ambush the Holy Knights stationed there.;;;overworld_narration
music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;After eluding the Holy Knights once again,|Krista and friends continue onwards and arrive in Mossgrove.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;Agreeing to help Anna and Jake, Krista and friends travel deep within the former village|of Hache Valley to ambush the Holy Knights stationed there.;;;overworld_narration
music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;With her companions rescued from the clutches of the Holy Knights,|Krista continues onward and arrives in Mossgrove.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;Agreeing to help the travelling merchants Anna and Jake,|Krista and friends set sail and prepare to confront the troublesome pirate crew.;;;overworld_narration
music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;With the Wailing Zephyrs out of the way, Krista and friends|set sail towards Shizukawa Isle to prepare their ambush on the enemy stronghold.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;After defending Vergrande Temple from the Seagrave Pirates,|Krista and friends continue onwards to Mossgrove.|Little do they know that they have not seen the last of this persistent pirate crew.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;Agreeing to help Anna and Jake, Krista and friends travel deep within the former village|of Hache Valley to ambush the Holy Knights stationed there.;;;overworld_narration
music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;Dealing with the Seagrave Pirates once and for all,|Krista and friends continue onwards and arrive in Mossgrove.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;With their new companions Anna and Jake at their side,|Krista and friends continue onwards and arrive in Mossgrove.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;Rising out of Foliaga's tunnels, Krista and friends finally arrive in Oakenfaire.|They pass through the entrance hall of its monestary and enter the courtyard|where danger lurks and awaits their arrival.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;Securing a path to the Grand Temple of Folia, Krista and friends push forward|and prepare to confront the Archbishop.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;Leaving Archbishop Azalea in the care of her most trusted clergymen,|Krista and friends return to Medeas to prepare for their new mission:|Saving Yondo from the dark forces that threaten it.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;Supplied with a seaworthy vessel, Krista and crew sail towards Merinas.|Although, with the Wyrmfang Pirates ready to intercept them,|the journey there won't be as smooth as they may think.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;With Samegoro subdued, Krista and friends head back to Medeas castle and plan|their next move.|During their journey back, one question loomed in the back of Krista's mind:|Who or what is Circ?;;;overworld_narration
speak;;This is the end of Act 2. Thank you for playing!;center;;hint;;;;;2;no_sound
speak;;Please leave feedback on the FEUniverse thread.;center;;hint;;;;;3;no_sound
speak;;Please also consider joining the Discord server!;center;;hint;;;;;3;no_sound
speak;;Links to both are in the Readme file.;center;;hint;;;;;2;no_sound

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;With the threat of the Wyrmfang Pirates now gone,|Krista and friends continue onwards towards Edoyama.The party decides to make a pit stop at a small island just off the coast of Medeas.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;Krista and friends prevent the pirate Daigo and his crew's raid on Aotani Village|and continue their journey towards Edoyama.|A heavy fog rolls in on the open sea. And with it, a new threat.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;With their ship's repairs completed, Krista and friends set sail again.|They renavigate themselves back on track and sail towards Edoyama once more.|They make a pitstop at the affluent Gintoki Island where|they may finally catch a break for once.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;At sunrise, Krista and crew board their ship and set sail once again.|After a few day's time at sea, they drop anchor on the Ikezora Isles to rest.|Despite their brief moment of respite, danger never ceased to follow our heroes.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;With the path to Ikezora Village clear, Krista and friends take a well-deserved rest and|plan their approach as they proceed closer to Edoyama.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;With the Riptide Pirates eradicated,|Krista and her new companions Anna and Jake set sail towards Shizukawa Isle|to prepare their ambush on the enemy's stronghold.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;After saving Shizukawa Village's women, Krista and crew set off for Fort Daijima.|They drop anchor north of its island and prepare for their assault.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come
speak;;With the shogun Masashi no longer a threat, Krista and friends sail onwards|towards Edoyama and prepare to take on Emperor Samegoro.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;Bursting through the front lines and past the front gate,|Krista and friends charge onward into Merinas Castle and prepare to ascend|to its top floor where Emperor Samegoro awaits.;;;overworld_narration

name: Outro2
_source: music;A Hint of Things to Come

speak;;Bursting through the front lines and past the front gate,|Krista and friends charge onward into Merinas Castle and prepare to ascend to|its top floor where Emperor Samegoro awaits.;;;overworld_narration

name: OutroSemiDeath
condition: game.check_dead('Semi') == True and (game.level.nid in ['3', '4', '5', '6', '8'] or game.level.nid == '7a' or game.level.nid == '7b' or game.level.nid == '7bb' or game.level.nid == '7x')
_source: speak;Krista;Man, your hand looks real bad, Semi{tgm}...
speak;Krista;We'd better leave you here at the monestary until you recover--
speak;Krista;We'd better take you back to Vergrande Monestary to recover--
speak;Krista;We'd better take you back to the castle to recover--
speak;Semi;Besides, I promised Aqua I would do whatever it takes to bring peace to Foliaga.
speak;Semi;I'm not giving up just because of a broken hand.
speak;Krista;Alright! Just don't push yourself too hard.

name: OutroForrestDeath
_source: speak;Krista;Forrest! Oh dear Medea, are you okay?!
speak;Forrest;I'm sorry, Your Highness. I was too careless.
speak;Krista;Dammit, quit it with the formalities already.
speak;Krista;I{tgm}...{tgm} I thought you were gonna die out there.
speak;Krista;We are getting you back to the castle right this instant.
speak;Forrest;No! I refuse to leave your side.
speak;Krista;You are in no condition to fight. I won't allow you to keep going like this.
speak;Krista;No "buts". This is an order, Forrest.
speak;Forrest;I won't participate in battle. I can promise you that.|I{tgm}...{tgm} I need to know that YOU'RE safe.
speak;Krista;But I swear, if I catch even a glimpse of you raising a weapon,|you're getting your ass sent back to Medeas. Understood?

name: OutroFelicityDeath
_source: speak;Krista;Oh Medea, don't joke around like that!
speak;Krista;You really could've died back there.
speak;Felicity;If it's any consolation, the wounds aren't that serious.|I don't think I'll still be able to fight alongside you, though.
speak;Krista;*sigh* I knew I should've left you at the castle when I had the chance.
speak;Felicity;You know I'd still follow you, though.
speak;Krista;It's for that reason I'm letting you still travel with us.|Just take it easy, okay?

name: OutroSamDeath
_source: speak;Krista;I knew it! I knew you got hurt!
speak;Krista;I swear to Medea, if you were planning on heading to the fortress like that--
speak;Sam;I have a job to do, Krista.
speak;Krista;I don't care! I'm not letting you get more hurt than you are now.
speak;Sam;I'm not backing out of this.
speak;Sam;I won't fight, okay? But do you think you guys can step in for me?|Once we're done, we can head straight back to Medeas.
speak;Sam;But with my arm like this, I don't think I'll be swinging my axe for a while.
speak;Krista;We gotta get you back to the castle as soon as we can.
speak;Sam;Fine by me. We gotta get you guys out of Oregot safely first.

name: OutroChellDeath
_source: speak;Chell;I'm alright, but my arm{tgm}...{tgm} It's{tgm}...
speak;Krista;We gotta get back to the castle fast.
speak;Krista;You just stay on the sidelines 'til then, alright?
speak;Chell;Of course, Your Highness.|We must make sure we make a safe return home!

name: OutroKhalidDeath
_source: speak;Khalid;Hey, it's okay. I'M okay. See? I'm here.
speak;Khalid;Come on, let's dry those tears now.|Won't do any good for the army's morale if they see you like this, y'know?
speak;Krista;Khalid, are you sure you're alright?
speak;Khalid;It's gonna take more than this to bring me down, Krista.
speak;Khalid;I'm still as big and strong as ever! See--
speak;Krista;Okay, Mister Tough Guy, I get it.|Just make sure you take it easy, alright?
speak;Khalid;Will do, Krista. Don't have too much fun out there without me.

name: OutroTsubakiDeath
_source: speak;Tsubaki;Ah, Krista, I'm so sorry. I{tgm}...
speak;Krista;There's no need to apologize, Tsubaki. How are you holding up?
speak;Tsubaki;There's a sharp pain whenever I move my arm,|and I feel a bit lightheaded.
speak;Krista;Say no more. We'll have the clerics tend to you when we can--
speak;Tsubaki;W-Wait! I still wish to join you.
speak;Tsubaki;I wish to help you bring peace back to Yondo.|I intend to follow through on this even if it means staying on the sidelines.
speak;Tsubaki;Thank you, Krista. I won't let you down!

name: OutroAquaDeath
condition: game.check_dead('Aqua') == True and (game.level.nid in ['3', '4', '5', '6', '8', '9'] or game.level.nid == '7a' or game.level.nid == '7b' or game.level.nid == '7bb' or game.level.nid == '7x')
_source: speak;Krista;Whoa, don't get up so suddenly!
speak;Krista;Let's take you back to Vergrande Monestary.
speak;Krista;Let's take you back to the castle.
speak;Krista;It'll be hard for you to keep up with your leg banged up like that.
speak;Aqua;I thank you for your concern, Your Highness. But I refuse to stay behind!
speak;Aqua;I promised Semi I would not give up on bringing peace to Foliaga{tgm}...
speak;Aqua;So, please let me stay! I beg you!
speak;Krista;Hm{tgm}...{tgm} Okay, but please don't overexert yourself.|I'll see if Forrest can let you ride with him on his horse.
speak;Aqua;I am truly grateful, Your Highness.

name: Heroism
condition: unit2.nid == 'Taichi' and ('Bandit' in unit.tags or 'Dark' in unit.tags) and has_skill('Taichi', 'Heroism_Proc') == False

name: Outro
_source: speak;OldMan1;Thank you all for your aid, kind travellers.|I don't know what could have happened without you.
speak;OldMan1;Please take this as a token of our appreciation.
speak;Krista;Heh, think I'd be used to this by now.
speak;Krista;As much as we appreciate your kindness, sir, are you sure this is okay?
speak;OldMan1;Of course. It is the least we can do.|Please stay safe on your journey to Edoyama.
speak;Krista;Thanks a lot. You guys stay safe too!
speak;Agrona;Medea's child is already within Merinas territory.
speak;Agrona;I will have to exert more force to impede their progress for good.
speak;Agrona;That one pirate crew should be in the vicinity. I'm sure they will do.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;That was a lot of fun!
speak;Krista;Aw, you don't have to be so stiff about it!
speak;Krista;You definitely enjoyed it more than you're letting on.
speak;Krista;There we go! Told you this was a good idea.
speak;Yumi;You guys did an amazing job there! The crowd was absolutely loving it!
speak;Krista;Aw, thanks! I'm glad everyone was having a good time.
speak;Yumi;With that said, mind if I join you guys?|I wanna see you all in action more.
speak;Forrest;I'm sorry, miss, but I would have to advise against that.|We are currently on our way to Edoyama and--
speak;Yumi;You're doing something about the emperor, right?
speak;Forrest;What? How do you know about that?
speak;Yumi;I've been hearing things. Let's just put it that way.
speak;Yumi;Besides, things around here have gotten worse ever since the emperor{tgm}...{tgm}|Well, I don't know EXACTLY what's wrong with him, but something changed!|And I wanna put a stop to it.
speak;Krista;Well, I'm all for more help. You can join us!
speak;Joshua;Hey! I just wanted to say great job! And I heard you guys are recruiting?|I want in!
speak;Forrest;Do you even know what we're recruiting people for?
speak;Joshua;Nope! And I don't care.|You guys are strong and that's all that matters.
speak;Krista;Anyway, it's been a long day. Let's all rest up and set sail again tomorrow.
speak;Sam;Aw, yeah! That tournament really got my blood pumping!|Hm? What's that flying overhead?
speak;Sam;Woah! That's one strong-looking wyvern.|Its rider isn't that bad looking either{tgm}...{tgm}|Seems like she's heading north too.{br}Maybe we'll run into her?

name: Outro
_source: speak;Kai;Remember that vial of poison those other pirates had a while back?
speak;Kai;I didn't wanna say too much in front of the enemy,|but that poison they had was created by the emperor's ninjas.
speak;Kai;And you've noticed how the other bandit groups and pirate crews we've faced|have been lacing their weapons with that poison too, right?
speak;Parker;That dark influence that was on the Archbishop has|already gotten its grasp on Samegoro.
speak;Kai;And a tight one, at that.|Considering he's supplying them with his private arsenal and all.
speak;Krista;This is like the situation in Foliaga.
speak;Krista;We gotta get to Edoyama as soon as possible!|If this keeps going, who knows what's gonna happen?
speak;Parker;Let us rest in Ikezora Village for the time being.|We can discuss a strategy once we've settled in.
speak;Tsurugi;Pleasure doing business with you, Miss Lin.
speak;Tsurugi;I think I'll be sticking around!
speak;Tsurugi;Let's just say I also happen to know someone in this army.
speak;Tsurugi;So, I'm going to travel alongside you, just not as a client anymore.
speak;Lin;Are you sure? We might run into more bandits and such.|I wouldn't want to put you under unnecessary danger.
speak;Lin;If that's what you want, I won't stop you, Mister Tsurugi.
speak;Samegoro;Agrona. How fares the resistance against the Medean forces?
speak;Agrona;Not well, Your Majesty.|They continue to advance to the capital with no signs of slowing.
speak;Samegoro;Send our most powerful forces against them.|They cannot under any circumstance reach the capital.
speak;Samegoro;Ah, Tsubaki. Is something troubling you?
speak;Tsubaki;I think we should reason with them, Father!|If we talk things out, then maybe--
speak;Samegoro;Tsubaki, I will not repeat myself.|It is is not up for discussion.

speak;Samegoro;The Medeans are concerning themselves with something that|is not theirs to trifle with.|Their penchant for meddling has gone back for thousands of years, Tsubaki.|The time to put an end to it is now!
speak;Nagisa;Let's just drop it, Lady Tsubaki.
speak;Tsubaki;Oh, Nagisa, why can't Father listen to reason?|He's more open than this.
speak;Tsubaki;On top of that, there must be a good reason the Medeans subdued Folia's archbishop.|Medeas has always stood for peace in Yondo, so why go to these lengths?
speak;Nagisa;That damn woman has poisoned the emperor's mind, Lady Tsubaki.|It's even more evident now than ever before.
speak;Nagisa;As for the Medeans, who knows.
speak;Nagisa;I'm sure there's more to this than it seems.
speak;Tsubaki;If Kenji and Kai were here, I'm sure they'd know what to--
speak;Nagisa;Kenji's dead and Kai is a dirty traitor.
speak;Tsubaki;Kenji might still be out there. And Kai{tgm}...{tgm} He{tgm}...{tgm} He wouldn't{tgm}...!
speak;Nagisa;I was really hoping we wouldn't have to resort to this,|but we have no choice.|It's time we take matters into our own hands.
speak;Nagisa;If the emperor won't give us permission to face the Medeans,|we'll do it without his permission.|It'll take some sneaking and prepping, but if we're careful, we can pull it off.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Anna;Thanks for all your help, Your Highness.|We couldn't have done this without you.
speak;Krista;Don't sweat it!|I'm just glad those pirates won't be a problem anymore.
speak;Jake;To tell you the truth, Anna and I were the only merchants using this route|ever since Emperor Samegoro started acting weird a year ago.
speak;Jake;But now that the most dangerous pirate crew's out of the picture,|more trade ships should be coming this way!|No need for us to do all the heavy lifting anymore.
speak;Krista;What are you trying to say?
speak;Anna;Jake and I were talking it over, and we wanna join you guys!|You're trying to bring peace back to Yondo, right?|Well, we wanna fight for that cause too.
speak;Krista;Hey, I'm all for it! Welcome to the team, you two.
speak;Anna;And as thanks for protecting the merch, you guys can have this!
update_achievement;AnnaJake;It's a Staple!;Recruit Anna and Jake

name: Outro
_source: speak;BanditFemale3;Thanks for all your help, Princess.
speak;BanditFemale3;We managed to get everyone back home safe thanks to you.
speak;Krista;No problem! I'm glad everyone's okay.
speak;Woman3;Everyone that was still on the island, at least{tgm}...
speak;BanditFemale3;We managed to get most everyone back home safe and sound.
speak;Woman3;Your Highness, you remember what that thug said? About sending us to Edoyama?|Everyone else must be there!
speak;Krista;All the more reason we should head there.
speak;Krista;We'll bring 'em back. Don't you worry.
speak;BanditFemale3;Speaking of which, take this with you.|Who knows what's waiting for you guys at the capital.
speak;Krista;Thank you. We'll retun the favor by bringing back the villagers!
speak;Kai;Must be still in the village.
speak;Krista;Huh, weird. Kai, you and the others board the ship.|I'll catch up once I find him.
speak;Krista;Man, where is he? He wouldn't do things last minute like this.
speak;Krista;There he his! But what's he doing with the mayor?
speak;Forrest;If I had half a mind, I'd--
speak;Mayor;S-Sir, please be reasonable! It was for the sake of Shizukawa Village!|You understand, don't you?
speak;Forrest;My liege could have died because of your actions.|If she did, I would not hesitate to "rectify" the situation.
speak;Mayor;But, she lives! S-So, please let me go...!
speak;Forrest;... Fine.|However, if I find that you still intend to bring harm to Her Highness...
speak;Forrest;Ah, Your Highness. Is everything alright?
speak;Krista;Oh, uh, yeah.|It's just that it's time to board the ship and all that.
speak;Forrest;I apologize. I did not mean to delay our departure.|Let's be off, then.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;Alright, you. We just need to get some info outta you,|then we can just pretend none of this happened.
speak;Masashi;Why should I listen to you?!|Shouldn't your commander be the one conducting this interrogation?
speak;Masashi;What? I was told the Medean princess herself would be leading the charge.
speak;Masashi;You must be joking! A noblewoman like you claim to be wouldn't be so{tgm}...
speak;Masashi;Uncouth! Unrefined! How dare you call yourself royalty?!|Why, no man with any self-respect would ever consider marrying--
speak;Krista;Change of plans, Kai. He's a dead man.
speak;Kai;Whoa, whoa, whoa. Let's put the sword down, Princess.|We're here for gathering intel, remember?
speak;Krista;Look. We got off on the wrong foot.
speak;Krista;We are still very much on the wrong foot.
speak;Krista;And if you don't want my foot in your ass, you better cooperate. Got it?
speak;Krista;So, what's Samegoro trying to accomplish here?|Why's he working together with bandits and pirates?|What's he doing with all those detained citizens?

speak;Masashi;I-I don't know, I swear I don't!|All I know is that Samegoro has been|bringing droves of Merinas' people to the capital.|Things have changed ever since that woman Agrona was appointed as a shogun.
speak;Kai;Agrona{tgm}...!{tgm} Damn it, I knew it!
speak;Kai;What do you know about that woman?|Where did she come from? What's her aim?
speak;Masashi;I don't know about her origins, but she's definitely influencing the Emperor.|She's brainwashed him, making him believe in some false god{tgm}...
speak;Masashi;I've heard things. Talk of some supposed other Great Beast called "Circ".
speak;Masashi;I don't know much beyond that, but Agrona has sown these seeds in his mind.
speak;Masashi;A false god, citizens imprisoned by their own leader, ruffians running the country{tgm}...
speak;Kai;So many pieces to the puzzle, but where do they all fit{tgm}...?
speak;Kai;Well, no use on dwelling on it right now. Not yet, anyway.
speak;Kai;Since you so kindly cooperated, we'll let you live. Right, Princess?
speak;Krista;Oh. Uh. Yeah. Right.|We'd better get going. We gotta end this once and for all.
speak;Masashi;Ah, wait! Take me with you!
speak;Masashi;I would like to assist you in bringing the emperor back to his senses.|After all, I failed in stopping you. He will have my head for that.
speak;Masashi;So, I may as well join you all! I'll live, and I can lend you my strength.|A perfect proposition, wouldn't you say?
speak;Kai;Let's take him.|He might be able to give us more insight about what's going on in Edoyama.
speak;Masashi;Thank you very much! I will not fail you!|My name is Masashi, by the way. Let us do good work together, Your Highness.
speak;Masashi;My retainer Hikaru will be joining as well.|We will do our best for you!
speak;Agrona;Fort Daijima has fallen, Your Majesty.
speak;Samegoro;They will be at our doorstep soon, then{tgm}...
speak;Samegoro;We must fortify our defenses right away.|We cannot allow the Medeans to reach us.
speak;Tsubaki;They didn't have to do that, did they?
speak;Tsubaki;From the reports, they were in a position to just head straight to Edoyama.|Why did they have to take the fort by force?
speak;Nagisa;I know you wanted a peaceful solution, but I'm not sure if the Medeans are seeking that.
speak;Tsubaki;I won't let them hurt Father!|If they wish to confront him, they'll have to go through me first.
speak;Nagisa;Lady Tsubaki, no!|I understand, but you can't put your life in danger like this.
speak;Tsubaki;I don't know what their reasons are, Nagisa.|All I know is that I can't lose anyone else. Especially not Father.
speak;Nagisa;But stay behind me. It's my duty to protect you, after all.
speak;Tsubaki;Of course. I may be scared, but I'll be ready!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Krista;Alright, we're in! Let's go, everyone!
speak;Kai;No. I can't doubt my deductions.|She's not gonna be in the way. Not her or Nagisa.
speak;Kai;I hope I don't run into her here.
speak;Kai;Huh? Er, yeah. I'm good, Princess.
speak;Krista;I dunno what's gotten you shaken up, but this'll be over soon.|We got this far, so let's see it to the end!
speak;Tetsuya;Captain Ryuuji! Everyone's ready and accounted for!
speak;Ryuuji;Kai and the Medeans held up their end of the bargain,|so now it's time for us to return the favor.
speak;Ryuuji;Scale the walls! Get into the throne room!|We'll meet you all up there, crew!
speak;Nagisa;Sounds like there's a commotion coming from inside.
speak;Nagisa;Last chance to back out, Lady Tsubaki.|I can still stay at the front lines while you remain in your room.
speak;Tsubaki;No. I've made my decision and I will stand firm.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Agrona;It seems we have failed here too.|I will have to report this to Lady Soromir.
speak;Krista;They keep slipping through our fingertips.
speak;Tsubaki;Father, what are you talking about? What about Medea?
speak;Tsubaki;You know that mark? Krista, what is going on?

speak;Krista;Tsubaki, all of Yondo's in danger.|Back in Foliaga, Archbishop Azalea was under a similar spell to your father,|and she bore the same mark on her neck.|Agrona and her allies are responsible for this.
speak;Tsubaki;But, what does it all mean? What do they hope to gain from all this?
speak;Krista;I do have one question, though.
speak;Krista;Do you know about something called "Circ"?
speak;Tsubaki;C-Circ? Why do you know about that?
speak;Krista;Heard the name a while back. It's apparently another Great Beast?
speak;Tsubaki;Another Great Beast{tgm}...{tgm} That does not seem entirely wrong.
speak;Tsubaki;I've heard things that Agrona has said to my father.|She said that Circ birthed the Great Beasts,|and he ruled over Yondo alongside his children.
speak;Tsubaki;I apologize, Krista. That's all I know.
speak;Krista;Well, it's something, at least. This'll help, Tsubaki.
speak;Krista;And, I know this is a lot to ask,|but your father's gonna be out of commission for a while.|Merinas is gonna need you to step up to rule in his place until he recovers.
speak;Krista;It's really sudden, but there's no way he can rule Merinas in his current condition.
speak;Krista;And with you being next in line to the throne, well{tgm}...

speak;Tsubaki;You said the archbishop was under the same spell that|my father was under, correct?|If that's the case, I want to help others not suffer the same fate!|I can have one of father's advisors look after Merinas in my absence.
speak;Krista;I'm all for it if you are. Welcome to the team, Tsubaki.
speak;Tsubaki;I will do just that, Krista.|Please bring peace to Yondo!
speak;Krista;You can count on me, Tsubaki.|I won't let anyone else suffer like your father did.

name: BaseConvo_Tea Time
_source: speak;OldWoman1;And that will be 500 gold, dear.
speak;Alex;Thank you very much, ma'am. Have a good day.
speak;Taylor;Hey, Alex! Got some new tea brewing?
speak;Alex;Mm-hmm. I bought some from a woman in the village.|Would you like some?
speak;Taylor;Of course! I like the way you brew tea.|You always get it just right.
speak;Alex;Just give me a moment. The leaves need a little while longer to steep.
speak;Alex;And here we are. One fresh cup of Merinese green tea.
speak;Taylor;Aw yeah, that hits the spot!|Hell, this is even better than the green tea you usually make.
speak;Alex;I'm glad you like it. I may just have to get more when I can.

name: BaseConvo_Too Many Ears
_source: speak;Taiga;You've been actin' all weird since we joined up with the Medeans, Cap.|What's up?
speak;Ryuuji;No business of yours, Taiga. Or anyone's, really.|Got too many ears around to openly talk about it.
speak;Taiga;You're making no sense at all!{br}You tell me about everything.|Like that one time it was blackjack night with the boys and you--
speak;Ryuuji;Too many ears around for that too, Taiga.
speak;Ryuuji;It's gotta do with the past, alright?
speak;Taiga;Ohhhh. Got it. So, back when you weren't "Ryuuji", huh?
speak;Taiga;What? At least I didn't say that your real name was K--

name: BaseConvo_Exchanging Info
_source: speak;Kai;I see{tgm}...{tgm} Yup, just like in Foliaga alright.
speak;Ryuuji;Except Samegoro's got pirates and bandits under his belt too.|And he's been handing out a good amount of coin for all those prisoners.
speak;Kai;Glad to see you haven't fallen into that.
speak;Ryuuji;Just what kinda guy do you take me for?
speak;Ryuuji;I might plunder and kill like a regular ol' pirate now, but I've got standards.
speak;Ryuuji;And hey, one last thing about Samegoro's forces.
speak;Ryuuji;Keep an eye out for a woman named Agrona. She's bad news.
speak;Kai;She was appointed as one of Samegoro's shoguns over a year ago.
speak;Kai;There was always something fishy about her.|I never could figure out what it was exactly. She was way too elusive.
speak;Kai;With what we know, I feel like we're getting close to an answer.
speak;Ryuuji;We'll just keep our eyes and ears open, then.
speak;Kai;Thanks, Kenji. I knew I could count on you.

name: GoldEarned
_source: # Find tier of class of player unit
elif;unit2.level - unit.level > 4 or {v:playerClassTier} > {v:enemyClassTier} or unit2.level == unit.level

name: Outro
_source: speak;Tsubaki;Kai, it's so good to see you again, truly!
speak;Tsubaki;Hold on for a moment{tgm}...{tgm} Kai?! Is that you?
speak;Kai;Shoot{tgm}...{tgm} I didn't expect to run into you two.
speak;Kai;Guess there's no point in hiding anymore.
speak;Kai;I haven't told you the whole truth.|I did work for the emperor. Not as a mercenary, but as his daughter's retainer.
speak;Tsubaki;It's true. Kai, you left all those months ago{tgm}...{tgm} Why?
speak;Kai;There were more important things to attend to.
speak;Nagisa;You have some nerve showing your face around here, Kai.|You run off to Merin knows where, then you come back with some floozy under your arm?
speak;Nagisa;Oh, sure. You say all that then you come back with some floozy under your arm?
speak;Kai;Why does everyone think I'm some skirt-chaser?
speak;Kai;Out of all the things I expected you to say{tgm}...
speak;Forrest;This "floozy" happens to be the Medean princess.|Any further disrespect towards her will not be taken lightly.
speak;Tsubaki;P-Please pardon my retainer's rashness.|She meant no disrespect.
speak;Krista;So, I'd love to get introductions out of the way,|but time isn't exactly on our side here.

name: KristaErvanFlashback
_source: speak;Ervan;I can still see out of that eye, thankfully.
speak;KristaFlashback;You can tell me. It can't be that bad.
speak;ErvanFlashback;Alright, just promise you won't laugh.
speak;ErvanFlashback;I was in the garden one day, and I climbed up one of the fig trees.
speak;KristaFlashback;Aw, that's it? I thought it would've been worse.
speak;ErvanFlashback;W-Worse? What do you mean worse?
speak;KristaFlashback;I was expecting something like{tgm}...{tgm} you slipping in the public baths and|accidentally pulling down someone's pants while trying to steady yourself.
speak;ErvanFlashback;I don't know what I was expecting, but it was NOT that.
speak;KristaFlashback;Despite how you got it, I think that scar makes you look cool, Ervan.
speak;KristaFlashback;Yeah! I think you should show it off more.
speak;KristaFlashback;You'll have this attractive, rugged war-hero aura about you.
speak;KristaFlashback;And if you start getting some muscles too{tgm}...{tgm} Oh yeah{tgm}...
speak;ErvanFlashback;Though, I wouldn't mind hearing more of how you'd see me as a "rugged war-hero."

name: Crate Death
_source: speak;Krista;We're gonna be stranded here{tgm}...{tgm} Oh, no{tgm}...

name: GameOver
_source: speak;Sam;Argh, there's too many of them!

name: KristaBryantSwordGet
_source: speak;Bryant;Krista, the situation in Yondo has gone dire.|For that reason, I believe it is time to inherit your birthright.
speak;Bryant;Yes. Now, come. To the underground vault.
speak;Krista;The blade crafted from the bones of Medea himself{tgm}...
speak;Krista;Father, are you sure about this?|Am I really worthy of this weapon?
speak;Bryant;I would not have brought you here if I did not think so.
speak;Bryant;You have followed Medea's teachings and walked in his footsteps well.|Your exploits since your time in Foliaga are proof enough.
speak;Bryant;You are strong and have a good heart, Krista.|I am not saying this as just your father, but as king of Medeas as well.|Medea's Tooth belongs in your hands.
speak;Bryant;Good. Now, perform the rite, just as your ancestors have done.
speak;Krista;"O, Divine Medea, hear the pleas of thy flesh and blood."|"Grant me temperance. Grant me patience. Grant me strength."|"And may thy blessing protect me and those I hold dear."
speak;Bryant;And may Medea grant these boons upon you, Krista.

name: AumStaff
_source: # Create a choice menu listing the dead units
choice;AmaterasuChoice;Who to revive?;{e:','.join([unit.nid for unit in game.get_all_units_in_party('Dead')])};;vertical;center;;Global AumRevive;type_unit;scroll_bar
# (Raise chosen unit's level to be comparable to rest of party?)

name: FightFelicityVanguard
_source: speak;Felicity;To think a golem was amongst our enemies{tgm}...{tgm}|I shouldn't be surprised, but{tgm}...;;;boss_convo_right;;;;;;;None

name: BaseConvo_Scouting Mission
_source: speak;Masashi;Ah, Edoyama{tgm}...{tgm} It has been too long since I last came here.
speak;Masashi;Though, there seems to be more of a tense atmosphere than usual{tgm}...
speak;Masashi;Well, hello there, ladies.|What might you be doing on this fine afternoon?
speak;SoldierPurpleFemale1;Emperor Samegoro deployed us here to guard|against the upcoming assault from the Medeans.

speak;SoldierPurpleFemale2;Mm-hm. Apparently they're coming really soon!|He wants the castle protected from all sides.|We even had to put all the civilians under lockdown and everything.|Seems like this is gonna be big!
speak;Masashi;He already prepared for their arrival? Did he have that little faith in me?;;;thought_bubble
speak;Masashi;No, he must have taken extra precautions.|Or perhaps Agrona saw the result of the battle and|reported to the emperor right away.;;;thought_bubble
speak;Masashi;Ah, yes I am. There is no need to worry about me, my delicate little flower.|I just remembered I had other matters to attend to.
speak;Masashi;Yes, it is certainly a shame that I cannot spend more time with|you lovely ladies for much longer.
speak;Masashi;Alas, I must depart. Until next time, my loves!
speak;Khalid;Let's see{tgm}...{tgm} What can we gather from a bird's-eye view?

speak;Khalid;A good amount of soldiers at the front gate,|and it looks like it's reinforced just as much on the other sides.|Hmm{tgm}...{tgm} There's a moat around the front gate too.|I wonder if we can cross that somehow?
speak;Khalid;I'd better report this all to Krista.

name: BaseConvo_Buried Past
_source: speak;Ryuuji;They're gonna find out eventually, y'know.
speak;Kai;You'd think that, but it's practically impossible at this point.

speak;Kai;My past is on a need-to-know basis.|As far as anyone knows, I'm just a regular ol' mercenary.|Who I was before Krista hired me has nothing to do with me anymore.|You of all people would understand.
speak;Ryuuji;You almost got caught in the act, though. That's why I'm saying this now.
speak;Kai;Just an oversight on my part.
speak;Kai;Besides, our goal now is to take down Samegoro.|The old man's gonna be too far gone to recognize me if|the situation in Foliaga is anything to go by.
speak;Kai;Those two have been attached at the hip ever since you left.|And there's no way Tsubaki would get anywhere near the front lines.|There's no need to worry about them.
speak;Ryuuji;You just have it all figured out, dontcha?
speak;Ryuuji;Still, one loose thread leads to a tattered cloth, Kai.|That's all I gotta say.

name: BaseConvo_A Brighter Future
_source: speak;Felicity;The more we discover, the more questions I have, Xiang.
speak;Felicity;Ferrach and Agrona{tgm}...{tgm} Just who are they? What is their aim?
speak;Xiang;They may wish to start a war. Another War of Divides.
speak;Felicity;Something you foresaw, I take it?
speak;Felicity;Then we won't let it come to that.
speak;Felicity;That's just one possible future, right?
speak;Felicity;Then I'll do everything in my power to prevent that.
speak;Felicity;You'll do the same too, right, Xiang?
speak;Xiang;I have chosen this path to bring a brighter future.
speak;Xiang;Krista is our key to peace. We must support her by any means necessary.

name: BaseConvo_Secret Stock
_source: speak;Anna;Say, Kai, considering your "connections,"|mind hooking Jake and I up with some trade secrets?

speak;Kai;I can't exactly share these things without consequence, Anna.|I may not be working under the emperor anymore,|but if word gets out that his ninjas' techniques reached outsiders' ears,|anyone who knows them will be put at risk too.
speak;Kai;But, that doesn't stop me from modifying a few things here and there.
speak;Kai;So, what did you wanna know about?
speak;Anna;That poison that you lace your weapons with.|Mind making a variant of it?
speak;Anna;I feel like it'll be a useful tool in our arsenal.
speak;Kai;That I can do. Just give me some time and I'll see what I can cook up.
speak;Kai;Hey, Anna. Here's a recipe for that poison.|The ingredients should be fairly easy to come across or at least be affordable to acquire.
speak;Kai;Don't ask how I tested it, by the way.
speak;Anna;I wasn't going to, but now I'm concerned.
speak;Anna;Well, either way, thanks, Kai.|Jake and I will get this stocked up right away!
alert;Poison Vial now available in Base Shop stock!;MerinasPoison

name: BaseConvo_Like Old Times
_source: speak;Tsubaki;All of us are back together again.

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: speak;Naoko;Yo, princess! Heard that your army's low on numbers.|Captain Ryuuji said to battle alongside you guys to help even the odds.|Let's go and make some heads spin!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: speak;Izumi;Hey, looks like your army's lackin' in numbers.|Well, I'm here to help! Let's get 'em!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: speak;Tadashi;Seems like you're a bit outnumbered here.|I'm steppin' in! You can thank Captain Ryuuji for that.

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: speak;Tetsuya;Yo! Need help there? Looks like your army's lookin' pretty weak.|The captain said to step in if yer strugglin', so here I am!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: speak;Kasumi;Cap'n Ryuuji said to help y'guys out if things were gettin' rough.|And now here I am! Let's go!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: speak;Nobuyuki;The captain said to help the front lines if our numbers were thinning.|Let's make quick work of these guys, yeah?

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: speak;Rie;You guys havin' trouble? Don't worry, I'm here to help!|Captain Ryuuji's got your back!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: speak;Shouhei;Yer army's lookin' scant here, eh?|Not to worry, Cap'n Ryuuji said to come in just in case somethin' like this happened.|We got yer back, Yer Highness!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: speak;Emi;Your Highness! Runnin' into trouble?|Captain Ryuuji said to join the team if things are looking rough.|Let's do our best!

name: DeploymentCheck
_source: speak;Hideaki;Captain Ryuuji said to join up with you all if things looked rough.|Let's crush these guys!

name: Exit
_source: speak;Krista;{tgm}...{tgm} Let's just head to the library.;bottom;200;;;;;;;;None
speak;Krista;(That leads to the dining hall.);bottom;200;;;;;;;;None;no_talk
speak;Krista;(It's locked. Did someone leave the key somewhere?);bottom;200;;;;;;;;None;no_talk
speak;;<red>New objective:</> Find the library key.;center;;hint;;;;;2;no_sound
speak;Krista;(I still need to find the key.);bottom;200;;;;;;;;None;no_talk
speak;Krista;(I've checked everywhere. Except for my bedroom, but why would it be there?);bottom;200;;;;;;;;None;no_talk
speak;Krista;(I guess it wouldn't hurt to look.);bottom;200;;;;;;;;None;no_talk

name: KirazSkillCheck
condition: game.get_unit('Kiraz').position != None and (game.level.nid in ['24'] or game.level.nid == 'DEBUG')

name: Interact
_source: speak;Krista;(Can't go back to bed yet.);bottom;200;;;;;;;;None;no_talk
speak;Krista;Huh. It was here all along?;bottom;200;;;;;;;;None
speak;;<red>New objective:</> Go to the library.;center;;hint;;;;;2;no_sound
speak;Krista;(A bunch of textbooks. They're getting pretty dusty...);bottom;200;;;;;;;;None;no_talk
speak;Krista;(No reason to leave the castle.);bottom;200;;;;;;;;None;no_talk
speak;Krista;Maybe it fell into the pond?;bottom;200;;;;;;;;None
speak;Krista;Anywhere on the bookshelf{tgm}...?{tgm} Nope. Nothing.;bottom;200;;;;;;;;None

name: KristaForrestBaseConvoErvan
_source: speak;Krista;Oh, Forrest. Sorry, I didn't see you there.|Did you need something?
speak;Forrest;I only wished to check up on you.|Since... well. You know.
speak;Forrest;Krista, are you sure His Highness died that day?
speak;Krista;I saw his body with my own two eyes.|He was dead. I know he was.
speak;Forrest;But who else could have that been if not Prince Ervan?
speak;Krista;Forrest, I'm scared.|I don't know what's going on, and it's terrifying me.
speak;Krista;Ervan died, and it's all my fault...!|Why does he keep haunting me like this...?|I can't take it anymore...!
speak;Forrest;Krista... We'll figure it out together.|Trust me.

name: KristaKaiBaseConvoErvan
_source: speak;Krista;Kai, please hear me out. I--
speak;Kai;Hear you out?!|You're telling me you had a good reason for killing your fiancee in cold blood?
speak;Krista;You have no idea what you're talking about!
speak;Krista;I didn't mean to do it. I just...
speak;Krista;Kai, I loved him. You know that!
speak;Kai;To think I let my guard down and trusted you for even a second...
speak;Kai;What an utter fool I was!
speak;Kai;Just goes to show you can't trust anyone in this world.
speak;Krista;Kai, you can't honestly mean that...
speak;Kai;At one point, I didn't.|It was because of you I actually thought there was a bit of good left on this earth.|For once, you've proven me wrong about something.
speak;Kai;You want to know what the most frustrating thing is?|There's still so many unanswered questions.
speak;Kai;So, regrettably, I still have to work with you to get all the info I need.
speak;Krista;Why do you want to look more into this?|I told you everything. There's nothing more, Kai.|I know you don't trust me anymore.|What's the point of sticking around someone you can't trust?
speak;Kai;Like I said, there's still unanswered questions.
speak;Kai;Believe it or not, not everything revolves around you, Princess.
speak;Krista;What are you trying to say?
speak;Kai;We need to figure out what Circ's Talons are trying to do.|What are they trying to achieve? How can we stop them?|Sure, your actions were the catalyst, but there's a bigger picture here.
speak;Kai;Hmph. You royals are all the same.|Saying that you're acting for "the good of the people" when in reality,|you're just in it for yourselves.
speak;Kai;As soon as you're out of the picture,|you don't give a damn about anything else.
speak;Kai;I don't want to hear it.
speak;Kai;I see where you stand, Princess.|That's all I need to know.
speak;Krista;Fine! Run off! I don't care what you do anymore!
speak;Krista;I don't... *sniff* I don't care... Idiot...

name: ForrestKaiBaseConvoErvan
_source: speak;Forrest;This is about Prince Ervan, isn't it?
speak;Kai;Intuitive as ever.|Now, I wish these words didn't have any truth to them, but...|Prince Ervan's death was Princess Krista's doing, wasn't it?
speak;Kai;You didn't happen to be an accomplice in this?
speak;Forrest;No, I wasn't there.|She only told me the truth later that day.|That's all.
speak;Kai;Heh. So, this is your idea of "protecting" her?|Keeping her dark secret to the grave?
speak;Kai;How cruel, Forrest. Letting Trevor and I be under employ of a murderer-
speak;Forrest;Quiet! Don't you dare sully her name like this!
speak;Kai;She sullied it herself the moment she got his blood on her hands!
speak;Forrest;And what would you know about protecting someone?|You abandoned your liege!
speak;Forrest;You left her in the hands of her father who was in no condition to watch over her.|Do you feel no guilt for that?
speak;Kai;I feel no guilt for making sure I live for another day.
speak;Forrest;Her life was at risk because of your actions.|You had a duty, Kai!
speak;Kai;I'd rather not die a brainless lapdog!
speak;Kai;You're a damned fool, Forrest.|This devotion... No, this obsession towards her will only lead to your downfall.

speak;Forrest;What you see as obsession is my unwavering loyalty.|I promised to stay by her side even if it meant following her into the darkness.|I have accepted this fate a long time ago. I will not abandon her. Ever.

name: SpawnJudah
_source: speak;Judah;Damn it, what is going on here?!|I must protect the king and queen. None shall pass me!

name: DiningCutscene
_source: speak;FelicityDream;What could you have done differently?;bottom;200;noir;;;;;;;None

name: KingBedCutscene
_source: speak;Bryant;Where will you go from here?;bottom;200;noir;;;;;;;None

name: Ervan
_source: speak;Ervan;Krista. It's so good to see you.
speak;Ervan;Krista? Is something wrong?|Come here. I can help.
speak;Krista;E-Ervan, you're dead{tgm}...!{tgm}|You're supposed to be dead!
speak;Krista;Stop! It's{tgm}... {tgm}It's not you! It can't be!
